la smras pa ni/ /bzhon pa bzhon che mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum+bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis/ /ri sngo'i mdog
ldan sprin gyi kha dog mthun par gyur pa yi/ /glang po stong phrag nyi shu snyes cig myur du bstad par gyis/ /glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes glo la brgyus/ /gser
dang nor bus rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud/ /rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ /dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rngo ga lcang
lo bzang 'khril ba'i/ /rta mchog stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du stong gyis te/ /gser dril g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas dbyangs pa gyis/ /skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos
shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag /mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rno thogs pa/ /stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du bcos te bshams gyis la/ /sgyu 'phrul
'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni srung bar gyis/ /lum+bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khroms brgyan par gyis/ /gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad
brgyan par gyis/ /lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal bar khroms/ /de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbran par gyis/ /'khor rnams kyis ni de skad
tshig thos skad cig tu/ /bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum+bi ni yang brgyan byas te/ /rgyal gyur rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol/
ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin kun bgyis dus bab lha gzigs shig /mi yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur tam/ /khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med
rnams la 'di skad smras/ gang zhig nga la snying nye nga la dga' bar 'dod pa dag /nga yi bka' bzhin bgyis te bdag gi lus kun brgyan par gyis/ /spos mchog ngad kyi dri
zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos/ /'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo bar gyis/ /brang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par
gyis| |rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad de ring kun gyis bstan par gyis/ /'khar rnga rgyud gcig gling bu'i pi wang rdza rnga dum dum pheg/ sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang
bsham par gyis/ /sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing / /lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur ba khyed kyis gyis/ /shing rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo
sgyu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis/ /bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod/ /na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te/ /gang du'ang yid
du mi 'ong mi mthun sgra rnams mi grags gyis/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe/ /rta dang glang po shing rta rkang thang dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung / /rgyal po'i sgo
drung lhags tshe sgra chen mang po grag par gyur/ /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grag /de tshe bkra shig don du dril bu brgya stong bkrol bar byas/ /shing rta
de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la/ /lha rnams stong gis lha yi khri yang legs par bshams pa byas/ /rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan bzhin ldan par byas/ /
rma bya khrung khrung ngang pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan che phra kun nas 'khor bar bsgrengs/ /lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis
bkab| |lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las ni shing rta de la lta/ /lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan pa sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de/ /gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul seng+ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa/ /
de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa dag tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing me tog sna tshogs 'thor/ /de ring lum+bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltams gyur
te| |'jig rten gyi skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren par byed/ /gsum cu rtsa gsum bdag po dbang po'ang lam gyi byi dor byed/ /tshangs pa skye bo mi srun sel cing sngon du 'gro
bar gyur/ /lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod pa de la lta/ /de ni 'di
snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin snyam byed/ /gang la skyong ba bzhi dang tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /mchod pa rgya chen byed pa 'di ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /
srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong / /gang yang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod pa'i sems can de med de/ /yang na mgo 'gas yang na de dag srog dang
bral bar 'gyur/ /'di ni lha yi dam pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri
bzhi stong gis ni kun nas bskor/ glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang
ldan pa| go cha legs par bgos pa/ sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/ shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du bdar/ rgyal
po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su skyes pa'i shAkya rgan pa dang / gzhon pa dang / bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bsrungs/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i slas glu dang rol ma'i
dbyangs sgra ni byed/ 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdob sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / klu'i bu mo
brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis
brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o/ /lum+bi ni'i nags tshal de thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag gis
btab cing lha'i me tog gis gtong bar gyur to/ /nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na shing ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang / me tog dang /
'bras bu bskyed par gyur to/ /nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa
bzhin no/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul du lum+bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las babs te/ mi dang lha'i bu mo dge gis yongs su bskor cing shing drung nas ni shing drung
dag tu 'gro/ nags tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag /ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la lta zhing de rim gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/ yal ga shin tu
rnam par 'byes pa/ lo ma dang / dog pa bzang po dang ldan pa/ mi dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dang phul du bya ba'i dri'i ngad
dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs dpyangs pa/ nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba/ rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams
rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yal ga ring zhing shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ blag sha zhes bya ba sa'i phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzang
la yangs pa/ rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu skyes pa/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/ lha'i glu dbyangs blangs
pa| gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis thor tshugs dang cod phan mngon par btud pa'i spyi bos mngon
par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing blag sha des mngon par btud de phyag byas so/ /de nas lha
mo sgyu 'phrul ma nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gi phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs nas blag sha'i yal ga las bzung ste tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil
du bltas nas bya smyang byed cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang bkur sti byed par gyur
to| |byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe rnam par de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so/ /de zla ba bcu tshang nas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran zhing shes
bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/ gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa de lta bu med par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe lha'i
dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/ de gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi ba'i lheb mos lus dang yan lag
thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na 'dug cing ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa
de'ang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyen du bteg ste mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /de
ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas
ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de sa la babs par gyur ma thag tu pad+ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di'ang brtol te byung ngo / /klu'i rgyal po
chen po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khod nas bsil ba dang / dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub
sems dpa'i lus bkrus so/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma
thag tu spos chu sna tshogs dang / me tog sil mas lus 'khru zhing mngon par 'thor ro/ /bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rnga ma gnyis dang / rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur
te| |de pad+ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/ seng+ge'i lta stangs dang / skyes bu chen po'i lta stangs kyis rnam par lta'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba lha'i mig thogs pa med pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang / grong
rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang ljongs su bcas/ yul du bcas/ mi dang lhar bcas pa rnams mthong bar gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ ting nge 'dzin nam/ shes rab bam/ dge ba'i spyod pas bdag dang 'dra ba de lta bu gang la la
zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems can gang yang ma
mthong nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/ zhum pa dang bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsam pa dran par byas te/
bsams brtags nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par bya ste/ sus kyang bstan pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad
kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma dag kyang
skyes par gyur to/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor
nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas te nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa'o/ /'di ni nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes seng+ge ltar
tshim par gyur pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med par bya'o zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /bdud
dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me gsad pa'i phyir chos kyi char sprin chen po'i char phab ste/ de dag
bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs logs
su gom pa bdun bor nas steng du lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras
mngon par go bar gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / /dge slong dag /de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten du sa g.yo ba chen po
shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba'ang byung bar gyur to/ /mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgrar bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /
de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang dus mtshams so so'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang / rnam par
dag par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las kyang dal bu dal bus phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog
dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa babs par gyur to/ /rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba/ 'jam pa/ dri zhim po dag kyang ldang bar gyur to/ /phyogs thams cad
kyang mun pa dang / rdul dang / du ba dang / khug rna med cing / rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang tshangs pa'i sgra chen po mi snang zhing zab pa grag
par gyur to/ /nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/ reg na mchog tu bde ba/
sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur
to| |byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu tshim par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
mug dang / dregs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / chags pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams
cad spangs par gyur to/ /sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to/ /bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to/ /
chang gis ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to/ /smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to/ /
rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra thos par gyur to/ /yan lag dang nyid lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob
par gyur to/ /btson ra na 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar par gyur to/ /mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nad
du bya ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun chad par gyur to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar
gyur to| |gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun
'dor ba'i tshe chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sa'i phyogs der de'i tshe zhig par mi
'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa mdzad de/ dge slong dag /de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag
pa gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe glu'i sgra chen po'ang byung bar gyur te/ gar
gyi sgra chen po'ang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe me tog dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang char du mngon par
bab par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa
'jig rten du byung ba'i che bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i
chos dang ldan par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
ltar bdag ni lan bzhi'am/ lan lngar yang / lan bcur yang / lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang / lan brgya'i bar du yang / lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa/ mi mkhas pa/ lhag
pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa/ khengs pa/ ma bsdams pa/ sems g.yengs pa/ nem nur gyis 'khor ba/ the tshom mang ba/ dad pa med pa/ dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur pa/ dge sbyong gi tshul
dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas yid mi ches shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas gcig
la gcig 'di skad du/ kye khyed cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa btsog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la'ang 'di lta bu'i
longs spyod yod ces bya ba dang / de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/
skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can legs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang du mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi shes so/ /dge slong
dag /sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro ba dang / mngal na gnas pa ni shin tu'ang bzang ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la
snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ lhar gyur pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ sems can rnams zhum par 'gyur zhing /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyi/ bdag cag ni mi tsam
du zad pas na/ bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so zhes zhum par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur pa
de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de ni bdag cag gis tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems so/ /kun dga' bo/ /de dag ni/
de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la'ang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul lta smos kyang ci
dgos te/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar skyes bu glen pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i zil gyis non pa/ mi gtsang bar bying ba/ rim gro'i zil gyis non pa/
ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos spong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos// //
'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu'i mdo sde
bzang po la'ang spong zhing mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag kyang 'byung lags pa lta/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de dag ni mdo sde 'di
lta bu spong zhing mi snyan pa brjod par yang ma zad de/ sdig pa rnam pa du ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed cing dge sbyong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ tshe rabs 'phos nas ni ci lta bu zhig tu
mchi| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par byas te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur pa btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spu g.yos nas sangs rgyas la phyag
'tshal lo zhes brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di thos nas bdag ni brgyal
ba dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de dag gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod
pa can du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing yid mi
ches pa dang / spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad
du ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ la la zhig gis
mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skye ba'i sems can de dag gis ni thob pa legs par thob pa yin te/ de dag gis
'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o/ /de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o/ /de dag gi spyod pa ni legs par spyad pa'o/ /de dag gis ni snying po blangs so/ /de dag ni ngan
song gsum las grol ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo/ /de dag gis dad pa
thob pa ni don yod do/ /de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs par zos so/ /de dag gis ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no/ /de dag ni/
bdud kyi zhags pa gtubs pa yin no/ /de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las brgal to/ /de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu byung ngo / /de dag gis ni mchog tu dga'
ba'i dngos po rjes su thob bo/ /de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs so/ /de dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te/ mchod par 'os pa'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten
na 'byung bar dkon pa'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su bzung ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun
pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dad pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te/ kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni/
nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod
kyi| mthong na ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ la la ni mthong bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi/ thos pas ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ la la ni mthong na'ang dga'
zhing yid du 'ong la thos na'ang dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ gang yang rung ste la la zhig mthong ngam/ thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong
bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ste/ de dag ni de bzhin
gshegs pas gzigs so/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgrol bar bya ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o/ /de dag ni de
bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bzung ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid kyi tshe'ang
sems can su'ang rung ste/ 'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas mi 'jigs pa slong na sems can de dag las nges mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo/ dad pa la brtson par gyis shig /'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pas bcol ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so/ /nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsal to/ /kun
dga' bo/ grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du'ang 'gro ste/ thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin na/ sngar ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong bar
gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/ gang nga la brten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen cing / sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' po ste/ de dag ni bdag cag gi'ang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs
so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ mdza' bo gang yin pa de ni mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de'ang de la sdug cing yid du
'ong ba yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'i/ dad pa tsam yang skyed par gyis shig /ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang gtad de/ de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag cag gi'ang mdza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing / bsam pa rdzogs
par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig la bu ngag nyan cing mthun par 'dzin pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur la/ skyes bu de'ang
mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/ pha de shir zin kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin du
gang su'ang rung ste pa la dad na/ de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/ de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o/ /de dag ni pa la skyabs su dong ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang
po mnga' ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du mi gsung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo yang dag par gsung ba ma
'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyi/ kun dga' bo/ dad pa la brtson par gyis shig /
'di ni ngas khyod la bcol ba'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ngag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing
lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dri med
rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan nyi zla'i 'od ldan pa/ /lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag drug cu de yi tshe/ /skad cig de la lum+bi nir lhags lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la smra/
mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed lags/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchi ci bgyi ci 'tshal bka' stsol cig /bdag cag khyod kyi phyag
rjed nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags/ /khyod kyis dgyes shing bde ba'i nyams skyes mi dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol/ /rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo
myur skyed 'gyur/ /ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing / /stong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang / /ji ltar
dog sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug tu g.yos las na/ /khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra grags 'jig rten 'das pa'i sras bltams 'gyur/ /ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par
mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang / /nam mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang / /ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams
brgya stong yang / /dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun phan bltams par 'gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang / /
dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid/ /skyes bu seng+ge brtul zhugs grub pa de yang rtsib logs g.yas nas byung / /gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing
'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltams/ /brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dang te thub pa de yang blangs/ /zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzang bkye bas
thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te/ /lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi
g.yab mo phyung / /de tshes 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pad+ma mdzes/ /sna tshogs mngon thon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris zhabs bzhag ste/ /gom
pa bdun du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni/ /rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin
lha mchog nam mkha'i dkyil na'i khod gyur te/ /gtsang zhing dang la mdzes pa'i spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku yang bsil/ /klu yi rgyal gnyis bar snang gnas nas grang
dro'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtong / /lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos
len| |stong gsum 'di'ang rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /'jig rten rnam
par 'dren pa bltams pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dag zhi/ /mi yi 'dren pa rgyal ba la/ /lha rnams me tog sil ma 'thor/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi/ /brtan pa gom
pa bdun du bzhud/ /sa phyogs gang du zhabs bzhag pa/ /der ni pad+ma bzang ba'i mchog /rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag /sa las mngon du thon par gyur/ /de ltar gom pa bdun
bzhud nas/ /rga dang 'chi bsel ba yi/ /sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung brjod do/ /'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te/ /de nas don ldan
gsung phyung ba/ /nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren/ /nga yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes/ /mi yi 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /lha dbang bcas dang 'jig
rten skyong dag rab tu dad sems skyes/ /spos chu mchog gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang bsil/ /klu yi dbang po rnams kyang lhan cig mthun par byas nas ni/ /dri zhim
spos chu dag gis rgyun gyis sku yang bsil ba byas/ /lha gzhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang bla ni gnas nas su/ /dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil/ /
gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni/ /bar snang 'khod de lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed/ /skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas zas
gtsang de la dgar smras pa/ /lha gcig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa bltams/ /de ni nges par 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang
phyug gdung rabs rin chen 'tsho ba/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di gdugs mang gcig 'gyur phas kyi dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur/ /de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rgyal po'i
mdun du de song ste/ /lha gcig 'byor ba rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur na/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum phrag lnga ni btsas pa skyes par gyur/ /
kun kyang gzhan gyis mi thub stobs dang ldan zhing tshan po che dang 'dra/ /skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las dgyes pa'i sgra gson lha/ /'dun pa can la sogs pa 'bangs
kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur/ /bsngags ldan gyis ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur te/ /chibs mchog dam pa gser gyi 'od ldan rnga rngog lcang
lor 'khril ba lags/ /mtha' 'khob khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du/ /rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyi legs par rgyal gyur lha/ /da
ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha gcig rgyal bar spyon/ /gser gyi dra bas
mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag /nam mkha' las ni sgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis/ /sbrum ma la sogs nag gu zal lu dag dang
be'u ni drug stong 'brangs/ /lhan cig lha mchog bltams shing de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs/ /rje gcig rgyal por gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa
bltams pa yi/ /yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong bgrangs pa/ /rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol/ /myur
du rgyal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par zhugs/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / skad cig de la sbyin pa'i gtong ba'ang de bas rgya cher
gyur to| |ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya'ang btsas par gyur to/ /grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang / bran mo brgyad brgya dang / 'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang / rte'u
mo khri dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rte'u pho khri dang / ba lang gi phrug gu mo lnga brgya dang / ba lang gi phrug gu pho lnga brgya po dag kyang btsas shing 'brangs par gyur nas de dag
thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas sna grangs yi ger bris te sras phu gzhon nu rtsen pa'i phyir byin par gyur te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems
dpa' nyid kyi mthus gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas a shwad+tha'i sdong po skyes par gyur to/ /gling phra mo rnams su'ang tsan+dan gyi nags tshal skyes
par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi khor yug tu'ang skyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag byung bar gyur to/ /gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen du
'bus te sgo ston par gyur to/ /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam
du bdag gi bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang dag par grub
par gyur gyi/ 'di'i ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas bu 'di'i ming
don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas ma'i glo g.yas pa'ang ma ral ma nyams shing sngon
bzhin du gyur to/ /der khron pa lan gsum ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur/ spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzid bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i spos
kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar dri zhim po khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar
gyur to| |lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang / rnam par byug pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku
la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa
legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du
lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te byang chub sems dpa'
ma'i drung du lhags te bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems
dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te bltams pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga
dang ldan pa ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig
ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum+bi ni'i nags tshal du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas
rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to/ /shAkya'i tshogs thams
cad kyang 'dus nas kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to/ /sbyin pa dag kyang byin no/ /bsod nams dag kyang byed do/ /bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim
par byas so/ /su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la'ang de byin par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa'ang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su sprul te gral gyi thog ma la
'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur to/ /ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing / /ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na/ 'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi/ /bde ba
mdzad cig bltams par mngon/ /ji ltar rab rib med 'od kyis/ /lha dang nyi zla'i 'od rnams kyang / /mi snang zil du brlag pa las/ /bsod nams 'od cig byung bar mngon/ /
mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing / /rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan las/ /'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon/ /ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing / /
'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur pas/ /tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su/ /gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon/ /sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing / /sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las/ /
'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi/ /thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing / /pad+ma chen po thon pa las/ /nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /
'jig rten mgon du byon par 'gyur/ /lha yi spos kyis spags gyur la/ /'jam pa'i rlung gi ngad ldang zhing / /sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las/ /'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon/ /
gzugs khams gnas pa'i lha brgya po/ /'dod chags bral ba 'di dag kyang / /thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud pa las/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas su byon/ /mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing / /lha
rnams kyis ni mi mthong yang / /phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las/ /'di ni ded dpon chen por byon/ /me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing / /chu klung thams cad mi g.yo la/ /sa yang dal bus
g.yo ba las/ /'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par
gyur te/ de shi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis lha mo sgyu
'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so snyam na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag /'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyang btsas te zhag bdun lon nas ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung
nam snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag /de ltar zhag bdun lon nas thog ma ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta bus skyed mos
tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong 'gyur bas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs
so| |de zhugs pa dang / bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs te mdun du 'dong bar
gyur to| |bu mo lnga stong ni shing ta la'i yal ga thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni spos chu'i ril ba b+h+ring gar thogs te lam chag chag gis 'debs
shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni nags tshal gyi me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba khye'u tshang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni bzang
por sgyur ba'i rin po che thogs te lam gyi byi dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni stan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bram ze lnga stong ni
dril bu thogs te bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /glang po lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /rta nyi khri ni gser gyi
rgyan gyis bkab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
bas legs par brgyan te byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ go cha sra ba bgos pa
bzhi khri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha grags pa grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /shing rta gang la
byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo rgyan thams
cad kyis chas pa rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyi khris shing rta de drangs te lha'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni mi'i bu mo gcig 'dug /mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i bu mo gcig
'dug kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi tshor/ mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag med par ma gyur to/ /dge
slong dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer der
'jug pa'i tshe rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/ kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir
gshegs su gsol/ kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kha lo sgyur pa dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/
kye dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kun nas spyan
mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid mnga' ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i
sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun tu'ang
zhugs par byas te zla ba bzhi lon pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzang chen po der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs
par gyur to/ /de na shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/ phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems kyis yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub
sems dpa' btsa' ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / nyams su blang bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang / de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o/ /
bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro/ /de na shAkya ches bgres ches bgres pa de dag na re/ bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu/ thor bu gzhon nu la gzugs
dang dar la bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya ba mi nus so/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni gzhon nu'i
sru mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang lags par bskyed par nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang mnyes par nus so zhes thams cad gros gcig
tu 'dus te/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dad par byas nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI sa gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rim gror
ma ma sum cu rtsa gnyis bkod par gyur te/ de la brgyad ni pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni nu ma snun pa'i ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni rtsen grogs kyi ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni dri
ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsags te dpyad pa/ ji ltar gzhon nu 'di 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur
ram| 'on te ma yin gyi/ rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang / de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po nag po zhes bya ba mngon par
shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las/ des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil na'ang lha'i bu mo mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang / dga' zhing phan tshun 'dong ba mthong nas
des bsam pa/ ma la bdag gis rnam par blta ba zhig tu bya'am snyam nas/ des lha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas
gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
lus legs par brgyan pa zhig btsas par mthong nas bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u shes par gyis shig /dzam+bu'i gling du rin po che chen po byung ste/ ser skya'i
gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsas so/ /de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba
dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang /
glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bu stong
yod par 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni
sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang / chos dang mthun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing
mngon par phab ste/ dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro/ /de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ tshur shog de
bltar 'dong ngo / /de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang 'grogs te ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas lding ste ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
chen po ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul brtul nas rkang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dong ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin
nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do/ /dge slong dag /de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang
po 'dus pa mthong ngo / /de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang ma la chab sgo na drang srong zhig mchis so zhes gsol
cig /de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po'i ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang thal mo sbyar te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas/ gzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag ni/ rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal
lo zhes mchi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/ mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig /de nas mi de
rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/ nang du bzhud cig /de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ rgyal bar spyon cig /rgyal bar spyon cig /sku tshe ring bar srungs shig /chos bzhin du rgyal po
mdzod cig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po la yon chu dang rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te shin tu legs par yongs su bkur nas stan la bdar te/ de
stan la bde bar 'dug par shes nas zhe sa dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong / sngon mthong bar mi dran na 'dir ci la
byon ci zhig bzhed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyi sras shig pa bltams par gyur pa
de lta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyi/ langs kyi bar du cung zad cig zhes shig /drang srong gis smras pa/
rgyal po chen po/ skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub
sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda byas so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis
kyis shin tu legs par blangs te drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro/ /de nas drang srong nag pos byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par rnam par spras pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa las 'phags pa'i lus
can/ nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyi gang zag 'di byung ngo / /kye ma
'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis
la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa mthong ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha'
bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang / gal
te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur
ba mthong nas des de lta bu mthong ba dang / mchi ma blags te dus nas shugs ring phyung ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te dus nas shugs ring 'byin
par mthong nas dngangs te mi dga' zhing rings par rings pa drang srong chen po de la smras pa/ drang srong / de ltar bshums mo blags te bshums pa dang /
shugs ring 'byin pa ci zhig nongs/ gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba'am zhig mi gda' 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la
'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad du du ba'ang ma lags/ 'di la mi dge ba'ang gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag nyid du bar bas so/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te nas gzer la/ gzhon nu don thams cad 'grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus
kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur
te| tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/
yongs su byang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos de thos nas skye ba las yongs su ma grol ba rnams
grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i
chos can rnams ni rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol
bar 'gyur/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta
ba ngan pa sna tshogs kyi thibs pos khebs pa lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni lam drang pos mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang
btson rar 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang /
ling tog gis mig ldongs ba rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus zug pa rnams la ni zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen
po| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
mang por brgya la brgya lam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol
bar 'gyur zhing 'chi ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang / bdag gi nad ma mchis pa 'di la'ang
'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni de'i slad du du zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring 'byin pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag cag
gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba ltar na ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po/
gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ /'di lta ste/ gzhon
nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ /gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no/ /rgyal po chen
po| gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing du grub cing lcang lor 'khril la g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / dpral
ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes pa ni kha ba dang dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags
so| |rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags
bzang ba dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /
ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang / 'gram pa seng+ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / mdun mtho ba dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser
'dra ba dang / bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag bus mor sleb pa dang / ro stod seng+ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni shing
n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / spu re re nas skyes pa dang / yan lag gi spu g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang / 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su
nub pa dang / bral legs par zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dwags kyi rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang / sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / zhabs kyi gong mtho
ba dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub
pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan la/ mu khyud dang bcas/ lte ba dang bcas pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen
po| gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes
bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no/ /rgyal po chen po/ mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/ mtshan
de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mchis te/ de dag dang
ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen
po| dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /
sen mo mdog snum pa dang / sor mo rnams zlum pa dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / tshigs mi
mngon pa dang / zhabs mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni phyag
gi ri mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang / phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang / sgros
bim pa ltar dmar pa dang / sgra mi drag pa'i tshig dang / ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang /
snyan zhing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag ring ba dang / sku'i na bza' gtsang
ma phun sum tshogs pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / bsnyengs ba mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang / shin tu
dpa' bar mdzes pa'i sku dang / rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang / pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya che la shin tu gang ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon
nu don thams cad grub pa ni sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa dang / sku ya yo ma mchis pa dang / sku rim gyis legs par grub pa dang / lte ba zab pa dang /
lte ba ma yo ba dang / lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang / drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / snang ba dam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing rab rib ma
mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang / seng+ge'i stabs lta
bu'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i 'gros dang / dku zlum pa dang /
dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rnyongs pa dang / rked pa gzhu'i 'chang bzung ltar phra ba dang / mdog gi snyes pa sngo ba'am/ nag pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa
lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba rno ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / shangs legs par mtho ba dang / spyan
gsal ba dang / spyan dri ma med pa dang / 'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po
chen po| gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma nag pa dang / smin ma rgyun chags pa dang / smin ma rim gyis gzhol
ba dang / mkhur ba rgyas pa dang / mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang / sdang ba dang khro ba'i mdog med pa dang / shin tu rig pa'i dbang po dang ldan
pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang / dbu yongs su
rgyas pa dang / dbu skra nag pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mi gshor ba dang / dbu skra mi 'dzing pa dang / dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang / dbu skra lcang
lor 'khril ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni dbu skra dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / sdong
ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dbu skra dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di dag ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/ de dag dang
ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal
po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan
las langs te byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing / /drang srong rnams kyis mchod
gyur te| |'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten pas/ /bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po dang / snag gi tsha bo
mis byin dang bcas te kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas gos bskon te bskor ba byas so/ /de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam
mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mis byin/ khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas
'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhig dang / de ni khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad
ces bya ste/ lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrog pa/ /lha yi drang srong nag po ri sul gnas pas mthong nas dga' mchog thob/ /'di na srog
chags rnams kyi dga' skyed sangs rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di ci/ /bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur/ /lha 'am 'on te lha mi na yang na nam
mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad mthos ci/ /lha yi mig gi phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas/ /phyis
yangs ri mtsho la rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong / /'od gsal mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing / /ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i myu gu thon gyur
la| |shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzang rgyas sna tshogs 'bras bus brgyan gyur las/ /srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gsal/ /sa 'di thams cad
mnyam shing dri med lag mthil bzhin du snang ba dang / /lha rnams dga' zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen rmad
byung 'phyo ba las/ /dzam+bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog chos kyi 'byung gnas nges par 'byung / /ngan song zhi zhing sdug bsngal bral te sems can rnams
ni bder ldan la/ /lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dang ldan par rgyu ba dang / /ji ltar lha yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba grags pa las/ /srid pa gsum
'dir dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi ltas su gdon mi za/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mig gis rnam bltas na/ /ser skya'i grong na rgyal po zas gtsang grong
khyer dam pa yod pa der/ /mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong / /mthong nas dga' mgu rangs shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang
skyes par gyur/ /de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de rang gi slob ma lhan cig rings su dong / /phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog gi sgor 'dug ste/ /zhabs 'bring
srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas/ /sgo ba de la smras pa chab sgor drang srong phyin ces myur du gsol/ /de mnyan myur du pho brang nang phyin rgyal po la
ni de bsnyad pa/ /lha gcig drang srong rgas 'khogs dka' thub chen po can zhig chab sgor mchis/ /drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang du mchi bar dga' zhes mchi/ /
rgyal po chen po nang du gtang ngam mi gtang bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos khyod song nang du bos zhes bsgo/ /drang srod nag pos sgo ba'i tshig
thos dga' mgu bde dang ldan par gyur/ /skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos pa ltar/ /drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du
mngon par dga'/ /rgyal po rgyal gyur sku tshe ring srung gsol zhes dga' bas de skad smras/ /snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing des pa stan la 'dug/ rgyal pos gus
par smra byas drang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir byon rgyu ci thub pas bdag la myur du gsungs/ /khyod kyi sras bltams gzugs mchog pha rol phyin
cing gzi brjid che dang ldan/ /mthu chen mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan mnga' ba/ /rgyal po khyod sras thams cad don grub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste/ /de
slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yong ma mchis/ /legs so legs par byon te mnyel tam ma mnyel khyod mthong bdag dga' 'o/ /mchog sbyin gzhon
nu de nyal de ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyi/ /re zhig yud tsam gzhes dang 'di ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs bar
'gyur| |gang tshe kha lo sgyur mchog zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od mnga' de sad ba/ /de tshe rgyal pos 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang nyi las 'phags 'od pang blangs te/ /
'di ltar drang srong lha mis mchod pa gser mchog gzugs ldan de gzugs shig /drang srong nag pos de yi rkang pa mdzes pa 'khor lo'i mtshan can mthong / /de nas langs te
thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag nyid chen po bstan bcos mkhas pas pang du blangs nas bsam zhing bltas/ /des ni mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan gyi
mchog gis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ /mgo lcogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa des ni de la rnam gnyis mthong / /stobs ldan 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'am
sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur/ /shin tu mi dga' lus dang sems kyi mchi ma blags te shugs ring phyung / /rgyal po mchog kyang dngangs par gyur nas bram ze ci slad
bshums zhes smra/ /drang srong nag pos bdag gi don grub ba gegs shig ma gzigs sam/ /drang srong ci slad bshums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs bdag la med par
gsungs/ /khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ /bdag la bdag nyid rgas shing 'di ltar 'khogs par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid/ /'di ni sangs
rgyas 'jig rten mchog 'gyur chos kyang yang dag ston par 'gyur/ /bdag gis dga' ba thob pas yid kyis mi mthong ngo zhes de slad du/ /'di yi sku la mtshan rab sum cu rtsa
gnyis dri med mnga' ba las/ /rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso
por byon/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /drang srong lung bstan de thos rgyal po dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur/ /de nas langs te thal
mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/ /stobs mchog ldan pa khyod ni lhas mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste/ /srid gsum kun gyi 'gro ba'i ded dpon mchog
gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong dga' bas tsha bo de la smras pa nga yi gdams ngag nyon/ /gang tshe 'di ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro la 'khor lo bskor thos pa/ /de tshe myur du
thub pa'i bstan la rab byung mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /dang srong dam pa de yi rkang la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/ /'di 'dra'i sras mnga' khyod kyi thob pa rgya chen legs par
thob ces smras/ /'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur/ /drang srong mchog de ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas bdag gnas dgon par phyin// //
'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po drug pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i bu
dbang phyug chen pos gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
dang / thabs dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub can/ spyad pa legs par spyad pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
chen po dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha legs par
bgos pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pas byung ba/ bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ rtul ba nges par byas pa dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi
dmag tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/ dga' ba'i bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ ye shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/ bdud kyi stobs mthar
'byin pa/ stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po/ /lha dang mis mchod pa/ mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/
'byung ba'i bsam pa can/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/ legs par skye bas skyes pa/ 'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa/ bu ram shing pa'i rgyal po'i rigs
su skyes nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/ de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ tshur shog /bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing rim
gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /lha'i bu nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' la phyag
'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de dag kyang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang bkur sti byed par bya
ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de ni lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma rgyal ba 'phel
ba'ang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na'i lung bstan pas lung bstan te bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang
phyug chen po lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad 'od kyis
rgyas par bkang ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / sgo bas rgyal po la gsol te/ rgyal pos gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te byang
chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs
te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ dgyes pa'i dam par dgyes par mdzod cig /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen
po| byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang / gzhon nus lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kha dog dang /
gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal gyis zil gyis non pa las na/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mang po dang lhan cig tu
byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro chen po byas te/ de kho na'i lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo / /de la 'di skad
ces bya ste/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltams pa/ /lha yi dbang pos shes nas dga' ste lha la smras/ /de thos 'gyur ba'ang bskal pa bye mang shin tu dka'/ /tshur shog
mi yi dbang po de la mchod du 'deng / /rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/ /gtsug phud mdzes pa 'phyang ba rnam par dag pa'i lha/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang
ba ser skya'i gnas mchog tu/ /myur du lhags nas rgyal po'i sgo yi drung na sdod/ /de dag rnams kyis sgo ba la ni yid 'ong smras/ /rgyal po'i pho brang song ste thugs su chud par gsol/ /
chab sgo bas kyang chig de mnyan nas nang du song / /thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /lha gcig rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe ring du srungs/ /bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag
'od can chab sgor mchis/ /rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/ /zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'od/ /rgyal po da dag gang du mchi yang grib mi
gda'| |sug pa 'dor yang gom pa'i sgra dag thos mi 'gyur/ /dog sar rgyu ba bgyid kyang rdul ni yong mi ldang / /skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms mi 'gyur/ /de dag lus
kyi 'od ni shin tu rgya chen gsol/ /tshig kyang yid du mchis te mi la dpe ma mchis/ /zab cing 'jam mnyen snyan pa 'byung ba'i gnas las na/ /de dag
mi ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid/ /me tog mchog phreng phyug pa dar gyi lda ldi dag /kun gyi lag na thogs nas gus dang bcas par sdod/ /rgyal po lha rnams
de dag gzhon nu lha yi lha/ /blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i slad du mchis su nges/ /rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas/ /song ste kun kyang pho brang nang du
gshegs zhes gyis/ /de dag yon tan spyod lam khyod kyis smras ltar na/ /rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba ni mi la gang yang med/ /sgo bas thal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal
pos gnang gi khyed cag nang du bzhud du gsol/ /lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yid rangs te/ /lha yi gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs/ /lha mchog de
dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas ni/ /rgyal po stan las langs te thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khri gdan bshams pa 'dir/ /thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs
kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol/ /nga rgyal dregs med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur/ /bdag cag ci slad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol/ /khyod sras rnam dag sku
mnga' bsod nams chen po bltams/ /shin tu legs pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar 'tshal/ /gang gi 'gro ba gang dang sbyor ba gang cir 'gyur/ /mtshan bzang mtshan gyi cho
ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal/ /de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang bar mdzod/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyi yan lag brgyan pa blta bar 'tshal/ /rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor
ba de rab dga'/ /gzhon nu me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba pang du blangs/ /lha mchog gtsug phud 'phyang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen/ /thog ma sgor byung stong gsum 'di dag kun tu g.yos/ /
lha mchog de dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni/ /zangs mdog dri med rnam dag gzi brjid ldan mthong nas/ /gtsug phud 'phyang ba de dag myur du langs par gyur/ /dri ma med pa'i
'od kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta ba dpal can dang / /'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong dang / /mdzod spu nas ni rgya
chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las/ /bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal/ /mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su/ /yang dag yon tan
ji ltar don mthong de la bstod/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang nyon mongs dgra bsal ba'i/ /sems can rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung / /yongs rtog 'dod chags yul gyi
gtsub mas bskyed pa yi/ /rnam gsum mes ni srid gsum kun 'bar yongs gdungs par/ /dpa' khyod chos kyi sprin gyis stong gsum bkad nas ni/ /'chi
med char gyis nyon mongs gdung ba zhi mdzad 'gyur/ /byams pa'i gsung mnga' thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong gsung du sgrog mdzad pa/ /
stong gsum kun tu go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen myur du sgrog /srid pa'i 'dod chags bcings bying srid pa'i rtser gnas
pa| |mu stegs can gyi tshogs dan log par lta ba bcom/ /khyod kyi rgyu la brten dang stong pa'i chos thos nas/ /seng+ges wa tshogs bzhin du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs
chen po'i du ba ma rig bsgribs bsal te/ /kun tu byung ba skye bo nges par snang byed pa'i/ /ye shes 'od 'phro shes rab 'od rig gzigs pa yis/ /'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po
bsal bar gsol/ /gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung / /lha dang mi rnams kyis ni rnyed pa rgya chen thob/ /rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen
'dis| |ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni gtod par 'gyur/ /ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char phab nas/ /bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas
sangs rgyas legs zhes de dag tshig brjod cing / /lha tshogs de dag tshul du shis par mkha' las dong / /bltams pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar
byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo btsas pa de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas par
gyur te| de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo
nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang
byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/ /blon po'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang /
bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen
par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyi/ de bas na grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig /
srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / tshong dus dag ni mdzes par gyis shig /bkra mi shis pa sgur po dang / zhar ba dang / 'on pa
dang / lkugs pa dang / dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang / gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig /bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig /bsod
nams kyi rnga ni rdungs shig /bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig /grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par spud cig /rol mo sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa shin tu
yid du 'ong ba dag ni len zhing rdobs shig /khams kyi rgyal po thams cad ni sogs shig /tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi
dag ni gcig tu sdud shig /bu mo'i shing rta ni shoms shig /bum pa gang ba rnams ni snyen cig /bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig /lha khang rnams ni
shin tu brgyan par gyis shig /dge slong dag /de nas rgyal pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang gi khyim du song nas skye
rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mI la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu lha khang du bkur gyi/ rgyan gyis legs par brgyan par gyis shig /legs so zhes skye
rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mIs de ltar mnyan te gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas shin tu
yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis sru mo la smras pa/ ma/ bdag gang du bkur/ smras pa/ bu/ lha khang du bkur ro/ /de nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum ste bgad nas sru mo la tshigs
su bcad de smras pa/ bdag btsas de tshe stong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs pa lha min lto 'phye chen po dang / /nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dang gzhon nu
yang / /spyi bo rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal na/ /de ring ma yis gang du bdag bkur bgyi ba yi/ /lha gzhan bdag gi gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis/ /lha
rnams kun las bdag 'phags lha yi lha lags te/ /bdag 'dra'i lha yang ma mchis gong ma ga la mchis/ /'on kyang 'jig rten rjes bsnyegs tsam du bdag mchi'o/ /bdag
gi rnam 'phrul skye bos mthong na dgar 'gyur zhing / /rim gro bkur sti shin tu che bar bgyid 'gyur la/ /lha mis 'di ni lha yi lha zhes rig par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de ltar
grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan nas bkra shis thams cad bshams te rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu pang du blangs nas bram ze dang / grong
rdal ba dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye dus
bskor te srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / tshong dus rgyan tshad med pas brgyan pa dag nas bdug spos dri zhim pos ni bdugs/ me tog sil ma ni/
gtor/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang gi bun long ni cher gyur/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra
ni phyung ste song bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas
me tog gi char phab ste/ sil snyan sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs
pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer te lha khang du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang /
de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lta ste/ gu lang dang / skem byed dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas nas langs te byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi
brgya stong ni kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa
drug tu g.yos so/ /lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dum dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /lha gang dag gi gzugs gang
yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag smra bar gyur to/ /ri rgyal ri mchog ri rab nam yang yungs kar 'bru la phyag mi 'tshal/
rgya mtsho klu rje gnas ni nam yang ba rjes chu la phyag mi 'tshal/ /nyi zla 'od byed srin bu me khyer 'od byed de la phyag mi 'tshal/ /bsod nams shes rab rigs byung legs ldan lha
rnams gang la'ang phyag mi bzhes/ /yungs 'bru ba rjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dra bar gyur pa ni/ /stong gsum 'di na lha mi gang yang rung ste nga rgyal gnas pa lags/ /ri rab rgya
