dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nag go /e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so/ /e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o/ /sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes
pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang med par gyur to snyam du shes so/ /dge slong dag /ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo//
dge slong dag /ngas mngon par shes te/ ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa zos so/ /dge slong dag/ khyod 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i 'bras
che ba snyam du sems par gyur na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ de'i tshe'i 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam mo/ /dge slong dag /ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig zos pas lus myur du snga
ma bzhin du gyur te/ e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma nya mang gu ma'i mdog 'dra'o/ /sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i
bar du'o/ /dge slong dag /ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung du nyid la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /ngas mngon par shes
te| ngas zas su til 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa zos pa nas de'i kha dog 'jam po med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong dang / ngas 'di snyam du
bsam ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas mi za bas dag par sems te/ bdag gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas
dge slong dag /de nas zas mi za bar 'dug go /dge slong dag/ ngas ma zos pas lus shin tu bskams shing nyam chung ba dang / rid par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/
ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang / ka li ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyis 'gyur dang / sum 'gyur dang / bzhi 'gyur dang / lnga 'gyur dang / bcu 'gyur gyis nga'i yan lag
dang / nying lag skem par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ rtsib logs ni srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs dang / bzhon pa'i bres khang lta bur gyur to/ /sgal tshigs ni
lan bu blas pa lta bur gyur to/ /mgo'i thod pa ni/ ku ba kha bo lta bur gyur to/ /mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to/ /dge slong dag /nga legs
par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskyod na/ sgur por gyur te 'gyel to/ /sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang / ba spu rul pa thams cad
lus las lhags so/ /gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de'ang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur
to| |nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang 'di ltar e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nag go /e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so//
e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o/ /sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang med par gyur to snyam du shes so/ /de'i tshe rgyal
po zas gtsang ma'ang nyin re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i drung du pho nya gtong ngo / /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du
bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang / ye shes
chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir til 'bru gcig dang / rgya shug 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru
gcig gis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa bstan te yid dman pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas ji ltar 'dug
pa bzhin du gnas te spyod lam nyams pa med do/ /nyi mas bab nas kyang grib ma la ma song ngo / /grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo / /rlung dang nyi ma dang char pa'i skyabs
ma btsal to/ /sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sdig sbrul ma bskrad do/ /bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs ma bor ro/ /bskum pa dang / smyang ba ma byas so/ /
glos phab pa'am/ khas bub bam/ gan rkyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so/ /sprin chen po dang / yul ngan chen po dang / char pa dang / ser pa dang / ston dang / dpyid
dang / dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma phog go /tha na byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma bskyabs so/ /dbang po'ang ma bkag
go /dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs so/ /gang dag der 'ong ba grong gi gzhon nu'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ rtswa thun nam/ shing thun
nam| lci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rdul khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtsen te/ de la sa skud do/ /der byang chub sems dpa' lo drug po
de dag gis lus ngan pa dang / god pa dang / rid par gyur te/ de'i rna ba gnyis su rtswa'am shing bal bcug nas sna'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to/ /sna'i bu ga gnyis su
bcug nas rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to/ /rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to/ /khar bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byin
to| |snar bcug nas rna ba dang khar 'byin to/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do/ /smon lam
yang 'debs so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ston cing lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dag theg pa gsum la yongs
su smin par byas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim byung ba/ /yon tan dag dang ldan pa de/ /sems can don dang phan pa'i phyir/ /thabs
dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes/ /snyig ma lnga yi dus kyi tshe/ /chos dman mos pa'i 'jig rten po/ /las dang bya bor 'jig rten du/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'dir skyes par gyur//
mu stegs tshogs kyis rab tu gang / /ltad mo dang ni ltas su lta/ /lus la gnod pa bya ba byed/ /byis pa de dag dag par sems/ /g.yang sa me dang mya ngam 'jug/
sgren mo sa dang lci bas skud/ /lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir/ /gdung ba lnga la brtson dang ldan/ /lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang / /mi mkhas kha cig lag pa ldag /
bum pa khar gzhong las mi len/ /sgo dang ka bas chod mi len/ /gang na khyi yod pa nas min/ /'dug ce'am tshur shog ces las min/ /khyim nas kha zas gcig
len pas/ /bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems/ /mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho/ /nya dang sha dang 'o ma spong / /ldam ldum sre da pad+ma'i rtsa/ /gzegs dang ba lang
lci ba za| |rtsa ba 'bras bu lo ma dang / /ku sha tshal bu la ba pags/ /srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu/ /glen pa 'di bden gzhan rdzun snyam/ /lag pa sgreng bar byed
pa dang / /skra bsgreng ral ba bsgreng ba dag /lam las rab tu rnam par nyams/ /las min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod/ /rtswa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal/ /tsher
mar nyal zhing cog pur 'dug /kha cig rkang pa gcig pus 'greng / /gdong bstod nyid dang zla ba lta/ /chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka dang / /rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang / /shing
dang ri yi rtse mo dang / /rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /glen pa de dag gnod mang gis/ /lus ni yongs su skem par byed/ /log par lta dang ldan pa dag /myur du ngan
song rnams su ltung / /nga ni bka' thub brtul zhugs dang / /dka' spyad gang zhig lha dang mis/ /spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i/ /dka' spyad
drag po rtsom snyam sems/ /bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis/ /blta bar nus pa ma yin pa'i/ /rdo rje lta bur brtan gnas pa/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan
bsam gtan byed/ /mu stegs brtul zhugs pa yis/ /dga' ba'i lha mi 'di na yod/ /de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag po
brtsams/ /sa steng ci yang ma bting bar/ /skyil lo klung ni bcas te 'dug /rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru gcig /za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston/ /dbugs dbyung
rngub pa rnam par spangs/ /stobs dang ldan pa gso ba med/ /lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog /nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed/ /rtog dang rnam par
rtog med pa/ /g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med/ /nam mkha'i khams su khyab pa yi/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /de ni nyi las grib mar ram//
grib las nyi mar song ma byas/ /lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang / /sdig sbrul sbrang bu
skyo ba mi byed/ /rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi phyir/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed
pa min| |gzhan du snying rje sems kyis ni/ /'jig rten don mang ched du sgom/ /grong gi byis pa ba lang rji/ /shing thun dag dang rtswa thun dag /de la rdul khrod 'dre snyam
sems/ |de las yis skud byed cing / /mi gtsang ba yang 'thor bar byed/ /de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang / /g.yo ba med cing 'khrug med par/ /mkha' khyab bsam
gtan bsam gtan byed/ /mtho ba med cing dma' pa med/ /lus ma bsrungs par chos mi reg /bshad ba mi byed gci mi byed/ /sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lta/ /
sha dang khrag rnams bskams gyur te/ /pags pa rtsa rgyus rus pa lus/ /sgal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang / /lan bu blas pa ji bzhin no/ /gang dag lhag par byas lha
dang / /lha min gnod sbyin dri za klu/ /yon tan ldan pa mngon sum pas/ /nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed/ /ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di/ /mkha' khyab bsam
gtan bsam gtan byed/ /de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces/ /smon lam dag kyang 'debs par byed/ /snying rje'i blo yis 'jig rten gyi/ /don mang phyir byed ma gtogs
par| |bdag phyir ma yin bde blos min/ /bsam gtan ro ni myang phyir min/ /phas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom/ /mu stegs blo nyams zil gyis
mnan| |mgo reg byang chub ga la yod/ /byang chub bskal mang rnyed dka' zhes/ /'od srung la ni tshig smras pa'i/ /las dang bya ba rab tu bstan/ /skye bo dag ni dga'
bya'i phyir/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /lha mi khrag khrig bcu gnyis chod/ /theg pa gsum la rab tu btul/ /de yi ched du blo gros bzang / /mkha'
khyab bsam gtan bsam ma gtan byed/ /dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //dge slong dag /bdud sdig can yang byang chub
sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe phyi bzhin 'brang ste glags ltas skabs btsal kyang nam yang glags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/ /de glags
ma rnyed nas yid chad de yid la gcags bzhin du song ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang / /nags tshal gel ba sgra med dang / /lteng
rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na/ /chu klung nai rany+dza na der/ /spong ba'i phyir ni brtson pa byas/ /rtag tu mthu rtsal brtan pa po/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /brtson pas
rab tu brtul de la/ /bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig/ smra bar byed cing 'ongs par gyur/ /kye srog gces kyi 'tsho bar gyis/ /gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur/ /
gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa/ /de dag byas na mya ngan med/ /khyod ni mdog nyams dman par gyur/ /khyod ni shi la thug cing 'dug/ 'chi ba'i cha ni stong snyed tsam/ /cha
gcig tsam zhig gson par zad/ /sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin/ /me yi sbyin sreg sbyin sreg byos/ /'on kyang bsod nams chen por 'gyur/ /spong ba yis ni ci zhig
bya| |spong ba'i lam ni sdug bsngal te/ /sems dul pa ni bya dka' zhes/ /de tshe bdud kyis de skad tshig /byang chub sems dpa' de la smras/ /de skad smra ba'i bdud
de la| |byang chub sems dpas 'di skad smras/ /sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po/ /khod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs/ /nga la bsod nams cung zad kyang / /don du gnyer
ba med do bdud/ /gang dag bsod nams don du gnyer/ /de la de skad smra ba'i rigs/ /'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas/ /mi 'chi snyam du nga mi sems/ /tshangs
par spyod la gzhol gyur pas/ /phyir ldog par ni mi bya 'o/ /chu klung dag gi chu rgyun kyang / /rlung gis rnam par skem byed na/ /spangs pa nyid kyi khrag tsam lta/ /'di
yis ci phyir skam mi 'gyur/ /khrag ni bskams par gyur pa dang / /de yi 'og tu sha skam 'gyur/ /sha ni zad par gyur pa dang / /phyir zhing sems
ni dang bar 'gyur/ /phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang / /ting nge 'dzin kyang ngas par 'gyur/ /nga ni de ltar gnas pas na/ /tshor ba dam pa thob gyur kyang / /
lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ /sran thub dag par gyur la ltos/ /nga la 'dun pa yod gyur cing / /brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod/ /nga yi brtson 'grus bskyod
nus pa| |'jig rten de ni ngas ma mthong / /srog chad shi ba ches bla ste/ /'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min/ /g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste/ /pham nas gson pa de lta min//
sngar ma dpung las mi rgyal te/ /dpa' bo dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal yang de ni rlom sems med/ /bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal bya/ /'dod pa khyod kyi dang
po'i dpung / /mi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin/ /khyod kyi gsum pa bkres dang skom/ /sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa yin/ /rmugs dang gnyid ni lnga pa ste/ /'jigs
pa drug par brjod pa yin/ /khyod kyi the tshom bdun pa ste/ /khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa yin/ /'thob dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang / /log par grags pa gang
thob dang / /bdag la bstod par byed pa dang / /gzhan la smod par byed pa dang / /de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu/ /lhung ba'i bdud kyi dpung yin no/ /dge sbyong bram ze kha cig
ni| |'di na glags lta 'khod par snang / /khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyis/ /'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba/ /so btang ma byas snod chus bzhin/ /shes rab kyis ni
de dag gzhig/ dran pa legs par nyer bzhag ste/ /shes rab legs par bsgoms byas nas/ /shes bzhin du ni spyod par bya/ /blo ngan khyod kyis ci byar yod/ /de skad
ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid ma rangs nas yid la gcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// //'phags pa rgya
cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang
dag kha cig 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang / lus la gdung ba byed de/ sdug bsngal drag po/ tsha ba/ mi bzad
pa| yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas de dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba myong ngo snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ spyod pa 'di dang /
sgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du ma byas te/ 'di ni byang chub
lam ma yin/ lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/ byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi
ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod do snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ngas pha'i skyed mos tshal du shing dzam+bu'i grib ma
la 'dug ste 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug
bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin snyam nas de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/ nga'i rnam par shes pa rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /ngas 'di snyam
du bsam ste/ 'di ltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya mi nus so/ /gal te nga 'di ltar lus ngan zhing nyam chung bzhin
du mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi snying por song na ni/ ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la snying brtse bas byas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di'ang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyi/
ngas kha zas rags pa bzos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ de nas gdod byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ de na lha'i phu gang dag nga la mos pa
de dag gis nga'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas nga ga la ba der 'ongs te nga la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig/
bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong dag /ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag ni zas mi bza' bar bdag nyid kyis dam bcas la/ /
bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni zas mi za ba yin par shes te/ nga la mos pa'i lha'i
bu 'di dag gis nga'i ba spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/ nga shin tu rdzun smras par gyur to snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rdzun smra ba spang ba'i
phyir lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags pa bza' bar sems btud do/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug gi bar du brtul
zhugs dang / dka' thub nyams su blangs nas stan de las langs te kha zas rigs pa 'di lta ste/ bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud kyi
dang / ha ra nu kha'i khu bcud dang / zan dang / 'bras chan dang / 'dren mar bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /dge slong dag/ de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam
du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta mas lam 'di dang / sgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong pa'i khyad par gang yang mngon du byed
ma nus na/ kha zas rags pa 'di zos te bsod snyoms la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te/ mi gsal ba byis pa yin no snyam du bsam nas byang chub
sems dpa'i gan nas song ste/ grong khyer wA ra NA sir song nas drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags su gnas so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du dka'
ba spyad pa spyod pa na grong pa'i bu mo gzhon nu bcus blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so/ /lnga sde bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gro byas shing rgya shug
'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru gcig dang / til 'bru gcig dbul ba'ang phul lo/ /grong pa'i bu mo bcu ni bu mo stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / stobs sbed ma
dang / shin tu sdug dang / sde las rnam par rgyal dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i phreng ba can dang / mdzes ma dang / rdza byed ma dang / skra lcang lo rgyas dang / ral bu can dang / legs
skyes dam zhes bya ba ste/ gzhon nu ma de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas
rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas mdog dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la dge sbyong mdzes pa/
dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to/ /dge slong dag /de na byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub
nyams 'og tu chung bar bya ba dang / /ngas rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin gcig bzhin du bram ze brgyad brgya la zan byin zhing 'di skad du bdag
gi zas zos pas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam yang btab bo/ /dge
slong dag /lo drug 'das nas ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ gal te bdag gis 'doms yog 'ga' zhig bsten na re stes snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /de'i
tshe grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas de sha na'i ras kyis dkris te dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa
de ngas mthong nas ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te dgus nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / de nas sa bla'i lhas bar snang gi
lha rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid por te phyag dar khrod pa la sems
btud pa ngo mtshar te/ grogs po dag /'di ni rmad du byung ba'o/ /bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
la sgra bsgrags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o/ /'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan
pa la'o| |dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o/ /'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris
pa'i bar du'o/ /skad cig de dang / thang gcig de dang / yud tsam de la grogs po dag /'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal srid bor te phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang / brjod pa gcig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags
par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/ gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo/ /de nas de nyid
du lhas lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang / der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur te/ deng sang du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di
snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis chu ni rnyed na/ gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bkru ba'i rdo le ba cig rnyed na re stes snyam pa dang / skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo leb
bzhag nas de la byang chub sems dpas phyag dar khrod pa de bkrus so/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam
pa| 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang kho bos bkru'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid
kyis bkrus so/ /de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang / bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing bu gad pa mthon po zhig sprul to/ /rdzing de'i
gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang / lha mo la phan gdags
pa'i phyir shang de'i lha mo la smras pa/ lha mo/ shing gi yal ga smod cig /des kyang shing gi yal ga smad nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'jus te byung ngo / /byung nas kyang
shing sgrub byed pa'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas drubs te/ deng sang du'ang de la phyag dar khrod pa drubs pa zhes ming du grags so/ /de
nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des lha'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon btsos pa/ rung ba/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub
sems dpa' la phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang / de na
lha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi grong na dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang
gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyams 'og tu chud nas de kha zas rags pa bzang po bza' bar sems kyi/ sngon khyod kyis bdag gi zas zos nas
byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyi
bya ba de gyis shig /dge slong dag /de nas grong mi dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du nyid
khur byas pa/ bzang po mchog tu 'gyur ba/ snying po can blangs te/ blangs nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras gsang ba gsar ba dag dang / phru pa gsar bar blugs nas thab gsar
par btsugs te kha zas de sgrub bo/ /de sgrub pa na snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yu drung 'khyil pa dang / pad+ma dang /
sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo / /de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/ byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas
byang chub 'thob par 'gyur du the tshom med do snyam pa dang / rgya mtsho pa shes shing cho ga shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der phyin par gyur nas des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob
pa nyid du lung bstan to/ /de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de tshos pa dang / thang la bzhag ste me tog gis gtor/ spos chus gtor nas gus par stan bting ste bran
mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ gong ma/ song la bram ze bos shig /ngas ni 'o thug sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o/ /jo mo/ /legs so zhes de'i ltar
mnyan nas shar phyogs logs su song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo / /de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su song na yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong
ngo / /de bzhin du nub dang / byang phyogs logs su song na'ang de dang der des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo / /de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis
gzhan mu stegs can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur bas 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo / /de nas de slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang dang gang du
mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong mdzes pa dga' ba las/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi gda'o/ /legs skyes mas smras pa/ de nyid bram ze
yin te| de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/ gong ma song la de nyid bos shig /jo mo/ /legs so zhes smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis
la gtugs te legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i
khyim du sang ste stan bting ba la 'dug go /dge slong dag /de nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi can gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste byang
chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu byin pa 'di bdag gis deng zos te the tshom
med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de blangs nas grong pa'i
bu mo legs skyes ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe/ gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/ des smras pa/ khyod snoms shig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo la
ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so/ /legs skyes mas smras pa/ ci dgyes su mdzod cig /bdag ni snod ma mchis par su la'ang zas mi stsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpas zas de thogs te lteng rgyas nas byung nas dro la bab pa dang / klu'i klung chu bo nai rany+dza na'i ngogs su song ste/ zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas byang
chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar phye ba'i phyir klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du zhugs so/ /dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' 'khrus byed pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag 'di
lta ste| byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dag klung du ldugs shing lha'i me tog kha
dog sna tshogs dag kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro/ /de'i tshe klung chen po nai rany+dza na lha'i spos rnams dang / me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi
gnas su khyer ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skra dang ag tshom gang yin pa de dag kyang grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas mchod
rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' klung nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la blta'o/ /de nas klung nai rany+dza na'i klu'i bu mo gang
yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/ yid las byung ba'i seng+ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/ grong pa'i bu mo legs
skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas ci tsam dgos par 'o thug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so/ /'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur
bor ro| |bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas mig stong pa grong
khyer 'jig pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur bsgyur te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po de dbrog tu brgal na ma nus nas rang
gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te bslangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer ro/ /khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i
dge 'dun gyi dus ston byas te/ deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du snod chen po'i dus ston byed do/ /seng+ge'i khri de'ang klu'i bu mo de nyid
kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /dge slong dag/ byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa zos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams
kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang pa'ang byung bar gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo drug bar du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chud byas bcom ldan blo gros 'di snyam
sems| |gal te bdag ni 'di ltar ring bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa/ /shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad
mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni/ /de dag na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtse ma byas 'gyur/ /bsod nams ngan don tsam dang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag
ngan pas ye shes tshol/ /de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas/ /kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed pa byas
nas ni| |shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsam/ /grong pa'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de/ /
'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lta'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed/ /de ni lha yis bskul ba thos nas de tshe 'o thug sbrang rtsi can blangs te/ /klung gi
'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis nai rany+dza na'i dogs na 'dug /bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhi ba de/ /lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang
srong dag gis bskor te nai rany+dza nar 'ongs/ /pha rol brgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar bsam nas ni/ /thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten snying
brtse phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'khru/ /bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag /klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don du
chu la gang bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri med des pa bkrus te ngogs na 'dug par shes gyur nas/ /lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu
de mchod phyir khyer/ /dur smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha yi bu yis de la byin/ /rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung dogs
na 'dug /klu yi bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng+ge'i khri yang bshams/ /de la 'jig rten dag gi mig byed yid kyang rab tu zhi ba de 'dug nas/ /blo gros
ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byin/ /rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gis gsol zhes byas/ /blo gros ldan
pas ci tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni tshur bor te/ /de ni grong khyer 'jig pa lha yi bla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer/ /gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas
rags pa dam pa zos pa de yi skad cig la/ /de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal yang snga mkho bzhin du gnas/ /legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag
la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas/ /seng+ge ngang pa'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros kyis byang chub shing drung chas/ /nai rany+dza na'i
le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung nai rany+dza nar khrus byas te zas zos nas lus kyi mthu stobs
bskyed de/ bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung ga la ba der skyes bu chen
po'i stabs gang yin pa'i stabs des song ste/ mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i
stabs dang / mi dngom pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / ya yo med pa'i stabs dang / 'che ba med pa'i stabs dang / rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / sdod pa med
pa'i stabs dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khyor ba med pa'i stabs dang / 'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang / ha cang mi
sdod pa'i stabs dang / mi g.yos pa'i stabs dang / rtab rtab po med pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang / dri ma med pa'i stabs dang / dag ba'i stabs
dang / zhes sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med pa'i stabs dang / chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / seng+ge'i stabs dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i
stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la mi reg pa'i stabs dang / rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo dra bas 'brel
cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang / ri rdob pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar
nas 'od zer phyung nas sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / pad+ma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang / sngon dag pa legs par spyad pa'i
'gros kyi stabs dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng+ge'i khri la bzhud pa'i stabs dang / rdo rje ltar bsam pa brtan zhing mi phyed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad
gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i stabs dang / thar pa'i lam ston pa'i stabs dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan
pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs phas kyi rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa'i stabs dang / mun pa'i ling thog dang nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor
ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong pa rnams zil gyis
gnon pa'i stabs dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po na dpa' bo gcig bu'i stabs dang / rang byung zil gyis non pa'i stabs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
thob par byed pa'i stabs dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i stabs dang / zhib rdul med
pa| bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chas so/ /
dge slong dag /de ltar klung nai rany+dza na dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der rlung gi sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to/ /char sprin rnams kyis
spos chus chag chag btab bo/ /me tog kyang chal mar bkram mo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
shing byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to/ /gang dag de'i nyin par btsas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po logs su mgo bstan te nyal
lo| |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'dud par
gyur to| |klung nai rany+dza na nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon bar bkod par
gyur to| |lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ lha'i gdugs
dang / rgyal mtshan dang / de don gyis legs par brgyan pa sprul to/ /mda' rgyang gang tsam/ mda' rgyang gang tsam zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas
mtho ba mngon par sprul te/ shing ta la thams cad rin po che brgyus las phan tshun 'brel bar 'dug go /shing ta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing spos chus yongs su gang
ba| gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po la sogs pas gang ba/ rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che
bai DUR+Yas them skas brgyan pa/ chu sreg dang / bya gar dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so/ /lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad
khri ni spos chus chag chag 'debs so/ /lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma lha'i dri bsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro/ /shing ta la thams cad kyi
mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go /rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo tsan+dan dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjes
su 'brang ba'i bdug pa'i pog phor thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur to/ /rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par
gyur to| |dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu skyod/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/ sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrog /me
tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/ gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/ rnga bo che brgya stong ni rdung / rta dang / glang po che dang / glang khyu ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/ bya
ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis
brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo / /gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de
la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma
bor ba| go cha sra ba mnabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad char phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang
chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i
rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon
chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs
pa| sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig
rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pas pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral
ba| mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/
chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs
su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad
pa dang | sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs
su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyi/ de la grogs po dag /khyed byang
chub sems dpa' la mchod ba dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig /de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
smras so| |gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshangs
pa'i lam snang ba/ /bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur/ /thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul zhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs
par bya| |de la skyabs su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te/ /lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
lo drug bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud/ /kun kyang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis/ /de ni stong
gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste/ /brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med/ /gang btsas tshe na zhing rnams
bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur pa/ /de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud/ /gang gi spyi
gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing / /gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la/ /gang gi
gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing / /gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dong / /gang dag blo gros
brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang / /nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing kun dang dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang / /gzhan
las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi ba 'chi med thob 'dod dang / /gal te sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis/ /gang
gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang / /khang bzang skar khung bsil khang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang / /
me tog phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa skyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang / /rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs//
dge slong dag /de ltar stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/
gyo mo dang rdo med pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul mang ba/ rtswa sngo zhing 'jam pa g.yas su 'khyil
cing g.yung drung 'khyil pa/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin to/ /de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen
po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chu na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin
dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to/ /byang
chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa brgyan par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur
snang bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar dag dang / ri nag po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo / /byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i
bu ut+ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu mut+ka li zhes bya ba dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang / dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / snang
byed dang / dri ma med dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi tog dang / 'gro grub dang / mig thogs pa med dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan
dang | pad+ma'i 'od de/ lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go /de
dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim
bdun gyis ni bskor/ shing ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa rim bdun gyis ni bskor/
dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang / gser gyi tshong tshong dag dang / dzam+bu'i chu ba'i gser gyi pad+ma dag gis ni khebs par byas/
snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdugs/ rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang
ba| mngon du mchod pa/ lha yul ba dang / mi yul ba gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye ba dang /
thang las skye ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag
na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying
po der snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul bar gyur te/ de dag lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed par gyur to/ /bkod pa de dag mthong nas
shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod
pa ched du brjod do/ /byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi 'di lta ste/ 'od ma dang / snyan ldan dang / yid bzang dang / mdangs ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po
de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me
tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dang sbom phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu 'gel ba/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun pa
srid tsam du mtho ba/ de dang 'tsham par 'gel ba/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i
shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing
phyi rim bskor ba/ shing yongs 'dus brtol dang 'dra ba/ mig gis blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do/ /gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba/ snying po yod pa/ mi phyed pa/ rdo
rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od
des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to/ /mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to/ /ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag dbang po
ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to/ /mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to/ /
'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to/ /bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to/ /sems can dbul po rnams
ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to/ /nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams ni lto 'grangs par gyur to/ /skom
pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /zhum pa nyam chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / chags pa dang / tha ba dang / gnod sems dang / phrag dog gi gnod pa
med par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang
ldan zhing gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes bskyed par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar/ /dmyal ba mi bzad snang ba yi/ /sems
can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams/ /phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa/ /thub chen 'od kyis reg
pas na| |de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes/ /yi dwags 'jig rten yi dwags rnams/ /bkres skom nyen pa ji snyed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /
de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur/ /mi khom thams cad chad gyur cing / /ngan 'gro rnams kyang bskams par gyur/ /sems can thams cad bder gyur te/ /lha yi bde
bas rab tu tshim/ /mig dang rna ba med pa dang / /gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams/ /de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing / /yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur/ /
'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang / /gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun/ /zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan/ /smyos pa dag ni dran ldan
zhing / /dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan/ /nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing / /bcing bas bcings pa grol bar gyur/ /ser sna med cing dgra med de/ /gnod sems dang ni rtsod
pa dag /phan tshun byed pa med gyur te/ /de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas/ /pha dang ma dag bu gcig la/ /ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems can phan tshun
du| |de tshe bu phangs bzhin du sems/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dra yis/ /phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang / /gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis
mi khyab gsal/ /ri bo nag po rnams dang ni/ /khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur/ /rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun/ /gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang / /lag mthil lta bur
gyur pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/ /zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas/ /thams cad rin chen nyid du snang / /byang chub snying po'i rim gro pa/ /lha
ni de ltar bcu drug yod/ /dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang / /byang chub snying po brgyan par gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na/ /bkod pa chen po gang yod pa/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /de dag thams cad der yang snang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /rang rang
gzhal med khang rnams la/ /dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur/ /'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas/ /lha dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur/ /bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir//
phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs 'dzer/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /brtson pa bya ba med par yang / /de yi yid la 'dod pa dang / /bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//
ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang / /sngon spyod tshe na rdzogs gyur pa/ /las de'i rnam par smin pa yis/ /'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di byung / /byang chub shing gi lha mo
bzhis/ /lha yi shing ni yongs 'du ba/ /de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /byang chub snying po brgyan pa byas/ /byang chub snying po'i bkod pa gang / /lha yis mngon par
'dus byas pa/ /yon tan de dag tshig gis ni/ /thams cad brjod par yong mi nus/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba rnam par dag
pa| dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba bskyed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ sems can la dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog
tu dga' pa thams cad bskyed pa des klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang phyir bdag gi gnas 'di gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lhang nger gyur pa las/ /ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba mthong
ba dang / /ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon med pa yi dri med 'od mthong ltar/ /mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig 'byung du the tshom med/ /
sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyim ni shin tu mun pas gang / /khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gis rgya cher 'od kyang yong mi snang / /me dang nor bu dag dang
dri med glog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang / /brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang na/ /de ring khyim 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra
ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la/ /sems kyang dga' ba bskyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur to/ /lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la
bsil bar gyur pa las/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shin tu gsal/ /klu yi me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig
do shal dang / /rgyan dang gdu bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la/ /klu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna
tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga bzang / /brdung zhing 'gro bla kun gyis mchod 'os phan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'deng / /de ni langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig
phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / /de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig /lha dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod
sbyin rnams kyis bskor/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing 'dong ba mthong / /klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog
la mchod byas te/ /gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug /klu yi bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la
mchod pa byed/ /me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing sil snyan rnams kyang byed/ /klu yi rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams
kyis bstod/ /'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs/ /bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de
'dra ste/ /de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phang brnyes par 'gyur/ /gang gi don du sngon chad dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la/ /gang
gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms/ /gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi smon
lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud/ /ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba
stong dag khyod la bskor ba rab bgyid cing / /ji ltar tsa sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang / /ji ltar ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' las mchi
zhing tshul du shis ldan par/ /dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni bskor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/ /ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar
mchis te/ /ji ltar ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye rgu sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang / /ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyi rgyun tshad bser ma'ang dal bus ldang ba las/ /srid pa gsum
du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa yi ded dpon de ring 'gyur/ /ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang / /tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams
bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang / /gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'dir lhags las/ /srid pa gsum du skye rga
thar pa mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal por de ring byon/ /ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la/ /bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig
dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs/ /ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs brtol byung ste/ /de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom
pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud/ /de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod
pa'am g.yos ma nus/ /mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par
mdzes/ /rgyu skar zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar ltung gda'/ /ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skam par 'gyur yang
gda'/ /skyes bu mkhas pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'/ /khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi
gda'/ /gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang / /byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel brgya chen rnyed par gyur/ /bur bcas bdag
dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las thar gyur cing / /glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi/ /dge slong dag /de ltar klu'i rgyal
po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba klu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs
pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang / pog phor rna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs
len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag gis kyang bstod do/ /'khrul pa mi mnga' mi bsnyengs mi 'dzem bag mi tsha/ /ma zhum mi dman rab tu dgyes pa gdul dka' ba/ /ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam
pa mi mnga' ba/ /chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba 'dul mdzad pa/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad
sman pa mchog /gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo / /ji ltar lha
tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar gyur te/ /me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang / /'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las/ /de ring rgyal bar 'gyur
gyi rab tu dgyes par mdzod/ /shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs/ /bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drol/ /sngon gyi rgyal dbang
rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar/ /byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ /khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal ba bye mang du/ /'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du
dka' ba spyad pa mdzad/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la da bab kyi/ /shing dbang drung du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang
chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo/ /de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsam ste/ rtswa bting nas bzhugs so/ /snyam mo/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya
stong bar snang la 'khod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so de de bzhin no/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de de
bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /dge slong dag/
byang chub sems dpas lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa sngo ba/ 'jam pa/ shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dga' ba/ /lcang lor 'khril bar 'dug pa/ g.yas
su 'khyil pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag brnga zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
kyang byang chub sems dpas lam bor te rtswa tshong bkra shis pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa tshong bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun shes par
byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / mi chod pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / snum pa dang /
go bar byed pa dang / skul ba dang / tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / sha sha bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang /
snyan pa dang / rnar bde ba dang / lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa sel

ba dang / ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya ku na la dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang / gnod
pa med pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang
ldan pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang / zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas

kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'joms pa dang / seng+ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / klu sgra sgrog pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / rtab rtab po ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang /
mi bshol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang / dus las mi yol ba dang / chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / mnyen pa dang / thogs pa med pa
dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrog pa dang / bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang /
thar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las mi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs
pa dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bkra shis rtswa dag nga la myur du byin/ /de ring nga la rtswas ni don chen
'gyur/ /dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su/ /byang chub dam pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur/ /gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du/ /sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang gtong byas dang //
tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub rab spyad pa/ /de ni de ring nga yis thob par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs/ /bsam gtan stobs dang
de bzhin shes rab stobs/ /bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam thar stobs/ /de ni de ring nga la grub par 'gyur/ /shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul
dang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs/ /so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i stobs/ /de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ring nga la rtswa sbyin byas na ni/ /khyod la bsod
nams stobs ni mtha' yas te/ /de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/ /bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab
tu mdzes thos nas/ /dga' zhing mgu la yi rang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni/ /rtswa 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs/ /mdun du 'dug nas rab tu
dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad smras/ /gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa/ /mchog gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam 'thob na/ /yon tan chen
po'i rgya mtsho grags pa dpag med khyod bzhes shig /bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang rgyar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ brtul zhugs dka' thub
rnam mang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad par/ /bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gang tshi blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags/ /de nas rgyal
pa thub pas rdul med 'gyur zhes lung stan to/ /bkra shis gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na/ /srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za/ /gang
tshe nga yis byang chub thob shes bdud rtsi rnam par dbyes/ /khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur/ /'dren pas shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtswa ni spar
gang blangs/ /seng+ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas sa ni rab tu g.yos/ /lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis/ /deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg
par 'gyur snyam sems/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na lha'i bu rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems
dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par gyur to/ /de na byang chub
kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa'ang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad stong pa'ang
yod| byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum pa'ang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag
tshad lnga 'bum pa'ang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa'ang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin
po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa'ang yod do/ /byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na'ang ji ltar 'dug pa'i seng+ge'i
khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba bshams par gyur to/ /byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni pad+ma'i khri stan bshams par gyur to/ /kha cig gi
drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no/ /kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng+ge'i khri de dag thams cad la 'dug par kun tu snang ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i yid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng+ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug gi /gzhan gyi khri la ni ma yin par shes
so| |ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad dang / lha dang mi thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems
dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo / /de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' rtswa spar gang thogs te/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te bdag nyid kyis rtswa'i rtse mo ni
nang du bstan rtsa ba ni/ phyir bstan nas rtswa'i gding ba kun nas bzang po bting ste/ seng+ge lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / brtan pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta
bu dang / mthu lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung lta bu dang / ye shes can lta bu dang / bla na med pa lta bu dang / khyad par lta bu dang / mngon par 'phags
pa lta bu dang / grags pa lta bu dang / brjod pa lta bu dang / sbyin pa lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzod pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / bsam gtan lta bu dang /
shes rab lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bsod nams lta bu dang / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs lta bur skyil mo krung bcas nas rtswa bting ba de la shar phyogs
su bltas te 'dug nas lus drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yi dam brtan po byas so/ /stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni bskams kyang rung / /pags
pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung / /bskal mang rnyed dka' byang chub ma thob par/ /stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya 'o/ /byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i
le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris drug gi lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa mi 'byung grang snyam ste/ shar phyogs logs su
gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su nga bsrungs par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang
chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas 'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
klas pa| nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa'
bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'
la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyams bai DUR+Ya sngon po dag las byas pa zhig tu bstan to/ /'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du'ang byang chub sems
dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa bstan to/ /sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing sems can tshul du shis pa'i
gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig /'di ltar rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig ces 'dzer to/ /sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa'
des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sprul te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe
sdang rnyog pa gang yin bag chags bcas bton pa/ /gang gis lus las 'od phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni med par byas/ /gang gis bsod nams
ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni bskal pa mang por kun spel ba/ /shAkya thub pa thub pa chen po dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes/ /de nas lho phyogs
na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs
brtsegs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying
po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad
dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo/ /de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer te/ gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs
bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang gis
rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag /byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med pa bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul/ /de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa
phan mdzad sred med bu yi mthu ldan pa/ /yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas/ /de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi phreng ba nags
tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang
po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
de bkab bo/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzer te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes
'dzer to/ /de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen tog /rin chen dam pa rin chen
grags pa de chos dgyes/ /dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes/ /byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur te de yi mchod pa 'di/ /de nas byang phyogs
na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zil du rlag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun
du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun tu bstan to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa'
kha cig 'di skad 'dzer te/ bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /
gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam sbyangs shing / /gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag sbyangs la/ /gang
gis khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa/ /de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed/ /de nas shar lho'i
phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi
snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams
cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsegs pa de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha min dang / /
gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bgos/ /yon tan can de yon tan ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes/ /yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs/ /de nas
lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub
kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams
der rin po che'i mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i mkha' rten de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang gis rgya mtshor
bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnams dag dang / /khang bzang skar khung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang bzhon pa mkha' rten brgyan/ /me tog phreng ba mdzes
dang 'dun sa dag dang skyed mos tshal rnams dang / /rkang pa lag pa mgo dang mig btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug /de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na de
bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs
'brug bsgrags dbyangs zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub
kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i a ga
ru'i sprin mngon par sprul te 'khor gyi khyams der tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char mngon par phab bo/ /dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su
bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /rig dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi chos kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab/ /dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed
char pa 'bebs/ /'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcas te gcod par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog
rgyas par dad par byed pa 'byin/ /de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems
dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang
chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thog
shing byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud nas me tog gi phreng ba dbyangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod
cing / /gus dang bcas pas dad pa che bskyed la/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/ /byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /de nas 'og gi phyogs
na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i
snying po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bai DUR+Ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+ma rnams
mngon du byung bar bstan to/ /pad+ma de dag gi snying po la bud med lus phyed snang ba/ kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bstan
te| lag pa g.yas g.yon na mgul gdub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing me tog dang dar gyi lnga
ldi dpyangs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan
thos dang / /rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud/ /khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med/ /yon tan ldan pa de la 'dud pa byos/ /de nas steng gi phyogs na de
bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba
'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sngon ma
mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu
chung dang / bzhon pa dang / shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya phyin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nam
mkha'i dkyil nas char chen por mngon par phab ste/ thams cad dga' ba dang / bde bskyed kyi sems can gang la'ang 'jigs pa'am gnod par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du
sbyar te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang / /phan par byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags gyur pa/ /'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyi
bkod rim dang / /rtsal dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gi dpe tsam nyon/ /kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu dpyangs byas te/ /nam mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin tu sgrog cing
lhags| |kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal med khang ston cing / /cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsug phud 'phyang zhing lhags/ /kha cig stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog
brjod cing / /sa las seng+ge lta bur shin tu sgrog cing lhags/ /kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing / /khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drar shin tu sgrog cing lhags/ /kha cig
rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing / /rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu sgrog cing lhags/ /kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing / /zla ba lta bur mkha' las
shin tu rgyas shing lhags/ /kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags/ /bsod nams tshogs bsags kha
cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i/ /dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags/ /kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen dra ba 'thor/ /zla ba zla bzang thang skyes rnam mdzes
man+dA ra| |paR+sha tsam+pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng / /byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor/ /kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la/ /sa bskyod nas
kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags/ /kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la/ /bar snang gnas te me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags/ /kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs
nas ni| |sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags/ /kha cig rin chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni/ /rgyang ring 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing
lhags| |kha cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te/ /yid zhi rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa/ /de dag ba spu dag las byams dang snying rje
dang / /dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byung lhags/ /kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi /lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lhags gyur cing //
de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te/ /brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor/ /kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar/ /dri za srin po mi 'am
ci yis yongs bskor te/ /glog ltar gsal ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/ /dri za mi 'am ci yi skad kyis brtan pa bstod/ /kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras
