cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/ rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so/ /snang ba byung ngo / /
de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas rga shi med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ skye ba med
na rga shi med par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags
pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
snyam du sems te/ gang med pas zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te 'du byed med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag snyam pa'i bar du'o/ /des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ma rig
pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba nas skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'gag par
'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/
rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so/ /snang ba byung ngo / /dge slong dag /ngas de'i tshe 'di ni zag pa sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa
ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /zhes
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa'i zag pa'o/ /'di ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o/ /'di ni lta ba'i zag pa'o/ /'dir
zag pa ma lus par 'gag go /'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni ma rig pa'o/ /'di ni ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni
ma rig pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'dir ma rig pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur te/ nub
par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni 'du byed 'gog
par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa
'gog pa'o/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs so/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs
kyi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni skye
mched drug go /'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni reg pa'o/ /'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni reg pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag
pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni tshor ba'o/ /'di ni tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni tshor ba'i 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di
ni sred pa'o/ /'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni sred pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'i
kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni len pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni len pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di ni srid pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni srid pa 'gog
pa'o| |'di ni srid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di ni skye ba'o/ /'di ni skye ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni skye ba 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
mo| |'di ni rga ba'o/ /'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni rga ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di ni 'chi ba'o/ /
'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di dag ni mya
ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba
nas/ 'gog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni sdug bsngal lo/ /'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni sdug
bsngal 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas nam gyi
cha smad skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod tsam na skyes bu dang / skyes bu dam pa dang / skyes bu mchog dang / skyes bu chen po dang / skyes bu khyu mchog dang /
skyes bu glang po dang / skyes bu seng+ge dang / skyes bu skyes mchog dang / skyes bu dpa' bo dang / skyes bu rtul phod dang / skyes bu cang shes dang / skyes bu pad+ma dang / skyes bu
pad+ma dkar po dang / skyes bu ljid khyer ba dang / skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pas 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / blta
bar bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rig pa gsum thob bo/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag /bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas kyi| me tog gtor cig ces byas so/ /de na lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas de dag gis de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag /sngon gyi yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda mdzad cing brda mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brda ma mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cig /dge slong dag /de
nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur par mkhyen nas shing ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ der bzhugs nas lam gyi rgyun ni chad
do| |rdul ni nye bar zhi'o/ /zag pa ni bskams te/ yang mi zag go/ lam ni chad de/ yang mi 'jug go /'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched
du brjod do/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog gis gtor te/ de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to/ /
dge slong dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mun pa mun nag dang ni bral/ sred pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ lta ba ni bzlog/ nyon mongs
pa rnams ni rnam par dkrugs/ zug rngu ni phyung / mdud pa ni bkrol/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bsnyal/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng / bag la nyal rnams ni bton/
chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/ yang dag
pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni bsngags/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni smad/ ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung / sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par
gzigs/ sems can gyi spyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/ bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar ba ni grub/ sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung / sdug
bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar par mdzad pa por ni gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/ rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni/ brnyes/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang
dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer med par ni gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba
dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la byang chub kyi snying po de nyid na bzhugs so// //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo bam po bco lnga pa/ dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi sems can thams cad skad cig de dang / thang gcig de dang / yud tsam de la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos
snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mun nag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu
g.yos| kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu
'khrugs so/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ chos kyi dgab pa dag kyang bskur ro/ /chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur te/ rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung
ste| de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams kyang
kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur te/ sems can mkhas pa'i pad+ma ye shes kyi mtsho las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung ngo / /thugs rje chen po'i
sprin yang dag par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyed pa/
dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya
ste| skyes bu seng+ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te/ /ston pas bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas ni/ /gang tshe stobs bcu sa rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur tshe/ /phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur/ /chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa/ /zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyel tam|/
bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dpung de/ /shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom/ /khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis
gdugs rnams bskur/ /des pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul/ /khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes/ /srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa
myur du phob/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyangs te/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra yi gsung du brjod pa na/ /bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs
rgyas| |dper na mar dang mar gyi nying khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin/ /dge slong dag /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
pa mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin
pa chen po dang / seng+ge ltar mi bsnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang / rig
pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang / sdig
pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang
dag par 'das pas dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang spra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mnga' ba'i shin
tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du/ /bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas/ /ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga'
'bros mi mdzad/ /'dis ni bskal pa bye mang du/ /sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/ /byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs/ /des na 'di ni do mod mdzes/ /byang chub dam pa tshol
pa na| |'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/ /brgya byin tshangs pa zil du brlag /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /bzod pa'i stobs
kyi go mnabs te/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du blangs/ /des ni gser mdog 'od dang ldan/ /'di yis bskal pa bya mang du/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni/ /gzhan
dag phyir bsnyil mdzad mdzad de/ /des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal/ /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis/ /thub pa'i dbang po yang dag
mchod| |des na do mod 'di la mchod/ /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /shes rab dang ni gsan pa bsags/ /sems can bye bar phan yang btags/ /des na byang chub
myur du brnyes/ /'di ni phung pos bdud las rgyal/ /'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal/ /'di ni lha yi bdud las rgyal/ /des 'di mya ngan mi 'da' 'o/ /'di ni shin tu lha yi lha//
lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os/ /bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i zhing / /'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa/ /'di ni sbyin gnas dam
pa ste| |'di la sbyin pa btang na de/ /byang chub dam pa thob bar du/ /bar ma dor ni chud mi za/ /'di yi mdzod spu mdzes pa yis/ /zhing mang bye ba gsal
bar bgyid/ /nyi zla dag kyang zil du brlag /sems can rnams la snang bar gyur/ /'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te/ /gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'i gzugs/ /
mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan pa bzhed/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os/ /'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste/ /zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshogs/ /sems dang ldan
dang sems med pa/ /mang po dag la rang byung gzigs/ /'di snyan shin tu rnam dag ste/ /lha yi dag dang mi yi dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi chos smra dang / /mtha' yas pa yi sgra
rnams gsan/ /'di yi ljags ni yangs pa ste/ /ka la ping+ka 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i/ /chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan/ /bdud kyi sde rnams
gzigs gyur kyang / /de yi thugs ni 'khrugs mi mnga'/ /lha yi tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang / /shin tu thugs gzhungs dgyes mi mnga'/ /'di yis mtshon dang mda'
rnams kyis/ /bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags/ /bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/ /sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo/ /gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du ni/ /de yi sku la gnod
ma byung / /de yi skabs su byams mi mnga'/ /zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma lags so/ /gang dag khyod las chos thos nas/ /sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi/ /lha dang mi rnams de dag ni/ /
rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags/ /rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba/ /khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar/ /kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog /
skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pha ma mdzad de/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad kyis/ /
'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /bsod nams rnam smin bde sde sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub//
bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po thob/ /de bas bsod nams bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi
chos mnyan pas kyang chog bar su zhig 'dzin/ /skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin/ /sems can don bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin/ /byang chub
sems dpas lag pa brkyangs te tshig brjod pa/ /mchod pa byas kyi rang rang dag gi zhing du dengs/ /kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sna tshogs bkod
pas rang rang dag gi zhing du dong / /dpung rnams phan tshun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol/ /
dpung bcas bdud las rgyal te bdud rtsi reg shog ces/ /sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon/ /dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang
chub kyi shing drung na seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de/ de dag ni
bskal par yang bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa ni lag mthil lta bur mnyam par gnas par 'gyur/ /'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa 'od dang
ldan pa byung / /lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud/ /seng+ge sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong / /stong gsum shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang / /
ri yi rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud/ /stobs bcu'i gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud/ /'di yang mi yi seng+ge byang chub snying por rol/ /sku las 'od zer
brgya stong dag ni rab bkye ste/ /rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi/ /de nas skad cig yud tsam mi khom bskams par gyur/ /sems can gang la'ang tha
ba rgyags sdang gnod pa med/ /'di yang mi yi seng+ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol/ /nyi zla nor bu med dang glog dang lha yi 'od/ /'od dang ldan pa'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me
min| |'gro ba gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong / /'di yang mi yi seng+ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol/ /phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos/ /de
yi bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin du dkrugs/ /bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo gang 'bri ba/ /'di yang mi yi seng+ge gdan la rol pa lags/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang
chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do/ /'jig rten gsal bar
mdzad pa byung / /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la/ /nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa/ /khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal/ /bsod nams
dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs so/ /dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzogs/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i tshim mdzad 'gyur/ /sdig pa mi mnga' 'dam las rgal/ /gau ta ma ni thang la bzhugs//
sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis/ /khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po khyod 'phags te/ /'jig rten dag na zla ma mchis
'jig rten chos kyis khyod mi gos/ /chab na mchis pa'i pad+ma bzhin/ /'jig rten ring nas gnyid log 'di/ /mun pa'i phung pos gtibs pa la/ /khyod ni shes rab sgron ma
yis/ /rab tu sad par mdzad pa sbyong / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni/ /nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba la/ /nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag
byung / /'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas/ /mi khom rnams ni stong par 'gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni mi dag kyang / /bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /skyes bu khyu mchog des
pa khyod| |lta bar gang dag 'dong bgyid pa/ /de dag bskal pa stong rnams su/ /nam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur/ /gang dag chos nyan 'gyur ba rnams/ /de dag mkhas shing
nad med dang / /zag dang phung po zad pa dang / /'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur/ /nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni/ /kun kyang len pa ma mchis par/ /myur du rab tu grol
'gyur te/ /dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu thob/ /de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/ /sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os/ /de dag yon phul mi chung ste/ /kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu
lags| |dge slong dag /de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
dang | phreng ba dang / phyug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shin tu snyan/ /thub mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog /byang chub rab mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes/ /dbyangs
kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod skyabs khyod gling khyod ni dpung gnyen te/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad/ /khyod ni sman pa'i dam pa zug rngu 'byin/ /
gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog /mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod/ /byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs/ /mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phob la/ /lha
mi rnams kyi gdung bzhi bar mdzod/ /khyod ni srid gsum mi gos pad+ma 'dra/ /khyod ni mi g.yo mi bskyod lhun po 'dra/ /khyod ni thugs dam mi g.yo rdo rje bzhin/ /yon tan mchog kun
mnga' ste zla ba 'dra/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de
bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang
chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas spras pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan/ /mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog mnga' ba/ /dran dang ldan
zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'/ /mnyel ba mi mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri gsum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma bral/ /'jig rten gsum du grags shing
rig pa gsum brnyes pa/ /rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum gyi mig sbyin pa/ /spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus ngan rnyog pa bsal ba rab tu zhi
thugs ldan/ /thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi ba/ /khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad pa
btang snyoms dgyes/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rang spyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol byon/ /bden pa bzhi po ston pa rnam thar dgyes
pa po| |grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol mdzad pa/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdud po 'dir lhags pa/ /shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams pas
pham mdzad nas/ /khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes/ /g.yon can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la
sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la pa der song ste phyin pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bla bre
chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
par bstod do/ /khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste/ /bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig gcig la pham
par mdzad/ /khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de/ /thub pa don kun 'grub pa 'jig rten gsum
gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bdud kyi bu mo bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing
g.yo ma nus/ /mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed mdzad de/ /byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags/ /
byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzad tshe na shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang / /phangs pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin skyed mos tshal dang grong khyer dang / /yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang
rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang / /dbu dang spyan dang ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes/ /nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te
bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos nas/ /sems can bya ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams/ /dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral
bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa/ /khyod kyis smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ /smra ba'i khyu mchog
'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams de/ /bdag cag thams cad dga' mgu yid gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs/ /sangs rgyas
rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/ /de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog /
dge slong dag /de ltar bdud kyi bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu
'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dzam+bu gling gi gser gyi pad+ma dag gis
mngon par gtor te spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma 'khrul rnam par ma 'khrugs pa/ /mun rdul bral zhing
'chi med rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur/ /lha yul mi yul pa yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /dka' ba
mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel/ /shin tu dga' ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod/ /sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa dri ma shin tu mnga' bas/ /lha
dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal/ /pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa/ /lha dang mi yi srid par
dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba/ /shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phyi/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgyu ba mdzod/ /srid
pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin rgya chen 'dor sel te/ /lha mi blo gros 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul bar mdzod/ /zla ba bzhin du mkha' las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu
ba| |srid pa gsum 'dir rmad byung mig dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog /lha dang mi yi srid pa dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'/ /'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i
dga' la dgyes pa po/ /'khor la sgrog pa 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags/ /dge
slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul rab 'phrul gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la dar gyi lnga ldis g.yogs nas spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dri ma rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi snang ba yang dag
'phags/ /gti mug dang ni lta dang ma rig 'joms pa mdzes dang dpal gyis rgyas/ /log pa'i lam la dga' ba'i skye bo 'di dag 'chi med 'god mdzad pa/ /'jig rten 'dir byung
mchod rten lha yul pa dang mi yul bas mchod pa/ /khyod ni gso ba'i sman ba mkhas pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin pa po/ /lta dang nyon mongs pa dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal/ /
lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel ba ste/ /de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni sa la rnam par rgyu/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang me dang de bzhin nor bu
dang | |brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dpal stug spyan sngar lam me ma lags te/ /shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/ /khyod kyi ye shes
rmad byung mngon sum gyur bas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan bden dang bden min gsung / /dul ba thugs zhing dbang po thul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs
ldan pa/ /ston pa lha dang mi yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston mdzad pa/ /shAkya thub pa mi yi khyu mchog lha mis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes mnga' ba ye shes
bka' mchid mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa/ /dri ma gsum bsal rig pa gsum dang rnam par thar gsum ston pa po/ /thub pa blo gros ji ltar
gdul ba skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa/ /stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas
pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas lha'i bu yongs su
dga' ldan dga' ldan kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i
de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas bzhugs tshe der ni khyod kyis rgya
chen chos kyang bshad/ /khyod kyis bstan pa de ni da dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chad/ /khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed
mi 'gyur/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten sgron ma khyod pa mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad sbyangs//
gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs tshe 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs rab tu zhi/ /gang gi ched du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad/ /khyod kyi smon lam de ni
rab tu rdzogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor/ /chos 'tshal ba dag chos mnyan bgyi zhes te/ /srog chags stong phrag mang po sdod cing mchis/ /'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor
du gsol/ /srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgral du gsol/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par
bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de
spyan snga nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin de bzhin shes rab kyis/ /khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga
la lhag/ /mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub snying po lha yis gang bgyis pa/ /bkod pa mdzes pa de dag
mthong lags te/ /ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod pa/ /de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags/ /khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te/ /
gang gi don du dka' ba mang po spyad/ /shin tu g.yon can sde dang bcas las rgyal/ /khyod kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes/ /phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur//
shes rab sgron mes 'jig rten gsum po gsal/ /khyod ni rab rib sel bar 'gyur ba ste/ /'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa/ /khyod la bstod pa bskal bar brjod kyang
ni| |khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /de ltar rab 'thab bral
la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dan bkod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa ma 'khrul kha na mtho mi mnga' rtag
tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra/ /phyogs bcu dag tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po/ /thub pa khyod kyi sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang
dag mchod pa mdzad/ /de yi yul de yis ni byang chub shing drung bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur/ /tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal
mtshan tog /rga shi 'joms par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig rten dag mig sbyin pa/ /thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba/ /shAkya khyu mchog
'gro bdag gi chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te/ /shes rab stobs dang thabs
dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang / /stobs rnams de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te/ /stobs dang ldan pa de ring byang chub
snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur/ /dpung tshogs mtha' yas mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de/ /nyams par mi 'gyur grang zhes lha
rnams thams cad rab tu dngangs shing skrag par gyur/ /khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis bsnyengs par ma gyur sku yang g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/ /khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos
te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur/ /ji ltar snga ma rnams kyis seng+ge'i khri la byang chub dam pa brnyes gyur pa/ /de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas
mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du gyur ma lags/ /yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes/ /des na khyod ni 'jig rten
dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing / /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la
mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
bu rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas me tog a ti muk+ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / paR+shi ka dang / d+ha nu ka ri'i phreng ba dang /
chun po thogs te lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs len pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu gsung snyan dbyangs ni yid du mchi/ /zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba/ /'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa/ /thub mchog
dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mi rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba/ /sgra skad gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun/ /khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas na/ /mi yi sgra
skad thams cad zil gyis non/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi/ /mi min dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed/ /rnyog pa ma mchis snying gis chos thos nas/ /de kun 'phags
pa'i rnam par grol ba thob/ /khyod ni mi mkhas rnams la brnyas mi mdzad/ /mkhas pa'i rgyags pas nam yang rgyags ma gyur/ /khyod ni 'gying ba mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /rgya mtsho'i
dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin/ /de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na/ /mi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /pad+ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin pa po/ /de ltar
'jig rten kun la mchod sbyin mdzad/ /de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la
mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bar snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i
ba dan rnams dang / rin po che dang / dar gyi lnga ldi dang / rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang / mu tig gi chun khor dang / me tog gi lnga ldi sna tshogs rnams lus
phyed phyung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang / zla gam rnams kyis legs par brgyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa mkhas la bdag cag mchis nas ni/ /'gro ba'i spyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing / /sems can dag pa khyod kyi spyod bltas na/ /de ltar
khyod kyi thugs gcig 'khrul ma mthong / /mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa/ /mi yi 'dren pa de dag nam mkha' khyab/ /'di ltar de dag nam mkha'i lus
lags pas/ /gzhal med khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis/ /bar snang nas ni me tog char bab pa/ /stong chen byur bur rab tu gang gyur pa/ /de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur
bab kyang / /'bab chu rgya mtshor bab pa bzhin du gyur/ /gdugs dang me tog rna rgyan me tog phreng / /me tog tsam+pa ka yi lnga ldi dang / /rgyan phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang 'thor/ /lha
yis gtor kyang 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ /bar snang thams cad lha yis gang gyur te/ /'di la skra tsam gzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis/ /rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa bgyid
kyang ni| |khyod la rgyags pa'am ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas
thal mo sbyar te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sa
gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te byugs nas spos chus chag chag btab ste/ me tog gis chal bar bkang nas ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi bla bre bres te de bzhin gshegs
pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /stong gsum rdo rje lta bur mi shigs gnas par gyur/ /nga 'dir pags pa sha dang rus pa rkang bskams kyang /
byang chub ma reg nga ni 'di nas mi ldang zhes/ /rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub snying por bzhugs/ /gal te mi yi seng+ge khyod kyis stong gsum kun/ /byin gyis ma brlabs na ni gang dag
rkang mthil gyis/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams bskyod pa de ltar shugs che ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhags tshe ma lus zhig par 'gyur/ /sa phyogs gang du sems can dam pa 'chag
pa ni| /sa yi lha yis rnyed pa rgya chen legs par rnyed/ /'jig rten rdul rnams ji snyed khyod kyis snang bar mdzad/ /stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyod sku smos ci 'tshal/ /'og gi chu yi
phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang / sa yi steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ji snyed ba/ /stong gsum sa rnams thams cad bdag cag gzung bar bgyi/ /khyod la kun
'bul ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad du gsol/ /gang du khyod ni bzhugs sam 'chag gam mnal ba dang / /gau ta ma bde bar gshegs pa'i sras bo nyan thos gang / /chos gtam
smra dad gang yang de dag nyan pa dang / /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /de ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /mngon par bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa
gsum pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la lha rnams kyis bstod cing skyil mo krung ma
bshig /spyan mi 'dzum par shing gi rgyal po la gzigs shing bsam gtan dang dga' ba'i zas kyi bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to/ /
de nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i
lha'i bu rnams kyang spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub kyi shing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos chu'i bkrus so/ /lha dang
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la phog
pa'i spos chu des rang rang gi lus la bskus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed do/ /lha'i bu la sogs pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin kyang
spos chu de dang ma bral bar gyur te/ spos gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed do/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa yid la byas pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba des
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des de bzhin
gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs
pa dgung bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ dge slong dag /de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ni dga' ba'i zas bkod pa zhes bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs
pa zhag bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
mngon par bstod do/ /zhabs ni 'khor los khyab pa po/ /pad 'dab rdul med stong gzi ldan/ /lha yi cod pan zhabs gtugs pa/ /dpal stug zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde
gshegs zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de tshe lha bu de sems dga'/ /lha min rab tu zhi byed pa/ /yid gnyis sel ba'i tshig 'di smras/ /shAkya'i rigs la dgyes skyed pa/ /
chags sdang gti mug mthar 'byin pa/ /zhus pa rnams kyang mthar 'byin pa/ /lha min dogs pa bsal du gsol/ /dpag med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas stobs
bcu ci slad du/ /rgyal ba dog sa'i snying por ni/ /dgung bdun skyil mo krung ma bshig /'dab brgya rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ci zhig gzigs na dgung bdun du/ /mi yi seng+ge rnam
dag spyan/ /spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa mdzad/ /gang gis shing rgyal drung du ni/ /skyil krung ma bshig dgung bdun bzhugs/ /smon lam 'di ni khyod kyi 'am/ /smra ba'i seng+ge
kun gyi lags/ /tshems ni mnyam zhing rnam dag pa/ /stobs bcu'i zhal ni dri rab gda'/ /ma nor legs par bka' stsal to/ /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod/ /zla 'dra'i zhal
gyis bka' stsal pa/ /ngas bshad lha yi bu nyon cig /ngas ni dris pa de yi lan/ /cung zad tsam zhig bshad par bya/ /dper na rgyal po phyogs gang du/ /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis dbang
bskur ba/ /zhag bdun par du sa phyogs de/ /mi 'dod rgyal po'i chos nyid do/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba yang / /gang tshe smon rdzogs dbang bskur ba/ /sa yi snying por zhag bdun du
rgyal ba skyil mo krung mi 'jig /dper na dpa' bo dgra tshogs rnams/ /ma lus pham byas lta ba ltar/ /byang chub snying por sangs rgyas kyang / /nyon mongs bcom nas gzigs pa mdzad/ /
gti mug byung ba'i 'dod dang khro/ /de dag 'gro ba'i dgra 'dra ste/ /chom po chos ni bzang 'dra ba/ /de dag ma lus ngas 'dir bshig /nga 'dir nga rgyal rnam dgu dang / /gnas med
rlom sems rab tu bcom/ /zag pa thams cad rab tu spangs/ /nga yi ye shes dam pa skyes/ /ngas 'dir sred pa'i sred rgyu dang / /ma rig bya min byed pa de/ /bag nyal bcas rtsa dra
ba rnams/ /ye shes gsal ba'i me yis bsregs/ /ngas 'dir nga dang nga yi dang / /nyes zhags ring 'gro rtsa bu ga pa/ /sgrib pa'i mdud pa dam po de/ /ye shes mtshon gyis bcad par gyur/
ngas 'dir ring nas nga'i ldan pa/ /slu ba tha ma rnam 'jig pa/ /len par bcas pa'i phung po de/ /ye shes kyis ni yongs su shes/ /gnyis su rmongs
pa log 'dzin pa/ /tha mar dmyal 'gyur de dag rnams/ /ngas 'dir ma lus bsal bya ste/ /phyin chad nam yang skyer mi 'gyur/ /ngas 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba yi/ /me yis sgrib
pa'i nags tshal bsregs/ /byin ci log ni rnam bzhi yang / /nga yis ma lus nges par bsregs/ /'du shes skud pas brgyus pa yi/ /rnam rtog phreng ba gnod byed pa/ /ngas
'dir byang chub yan lag gis/ /phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bzlog /bgrod dka' drug cu rtsa lnga dang / /gti mug sum cu dri ma can/ /sdig pa dag ni bzhi bcu ngas/ /sa yi snying
po 'dir bsal to/ /sa yi snying por 'dug nas ngas/ /sdom pa ma yin bcu drug dang / /khams ni rnam pa bco brgyad dang / /khyab pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bsal/ /nyon mongs chu bo
nyi shu dang / /'gro ba 'jigs pa nyi shu brgyad/ /brtson 'grus mthu dang brtul ba yis/ /nga 'dir de dag shin tu 'das/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsgyings sgrog pa/ /lnga brgya ngas
'dir yang dag rtogs/ /brgya phrag stong du tshang ba yi/ /chos rnams nga yis yang dag rtogs/ /ngas 'dir bag nyal ma lus pa/ /dgu bcu rtsa brgyad rtsar bcas mtha'/ /kun
nas ldang ba'i lo ma rnams/ /ye shes me yis nges par bsregs/ /dogs dang yid gnyis kun 'byung ba/ /lta ba'i chu yis gang gyur pa/ /mi dge dogs can sred pa'i klung / /shugs
drag ye shes nyi mas bskams/ /tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag spangs/ /sgyu dang ser sna phrag dog sdang / /nyon mongs dgon pa deng 'dir bcad/ /'dul ba'i me yis rab tu bsregs
'dir ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de/ /ngan 'gro nyam ngar 'dren byed pa/ /'phags la skur ba 'debs pa'i tshig/ ye shes mchog gi sman gyis skyugs/ /ngas 'dir ye shes yon tan dang /
ting 'dzin thob nas du ba dang / /cho de 'don dang mya ngan dang / /smre ba ma lus mtha' mar phyin/ /ngas 'dir bden tshul ting nge 'dzin/ /thob nas chu bo sbyor ba dang / /mdud pa mya ngan
zug rngu dang / /rgyags dang bag med kun las rgyal/ /ngas 'dir nyon mongs gzings pa yis/ /srid pa'i ljon shing rtog rtsa brtan/ /dran pa'i sta res ma lus par/ /bcad nas ye
shes me yis bsregs/ /nga 'dir nga snyam nga rgyal te/ /khams gsum dbang byed stobs che ba/ /g.yon can ye shes ral gris bcom/ /lha min dbang la dbang po bzhin/ /dra ba ma
lus sum cu drug/ 'jug pa sa yi snying po 'dir/ /shes rab ral gri stobs ldan pas/ /bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba bag nyal bcas/ /sdug bsngal mya
ngan 'byung de dag /ngas 'dir shes rab dam pa yi/ /thong lcags kyis ni ma lus bton/ /rang bzhin gyis dag sems can gyi/ /shes rab mig 'dir nga
yis sbyangs/ /ye shes mig sman chen po yis/ /gti mug ling tog rgya chen bsal/ /'byung khams bzhi po rgyags pa yi/ /chu srin gyis dkrugs sred yangs pa/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho
dran pa dang / /zhi gnas nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskams/ /ngas 'dir yul gyi shing gi tshogs/ /rnam rtog du 'thul chags chen me/ /rab tu 'bar ba rnam thar chu/ /bsil ba'i khu bas
bsad par gyur/ /ngas 'dir bag la nyal ba'i sprin/ /ro myang glog 'dra rnam rtog 'brug /brtson 'grus stobs kyi rlung shugs kyis/ /'das te kun tu gtor bar gyur/ /ngas
'dir dran pa dri med pa'i/ /ting 'dzin thob nas sems spyod dgra /srid pa'i 'khon rgyud ma lus par/ /shes rab ral gri'i stobs kyis bcad/ /ngas 'dir rgyal mtshan mchog
'chang ba/ /shing rta glang po rtas mtho ba/ /gzugs bsgyur bdud dpung brtson pa'i sde/ /byams pa thob nas rnam par bcom/ /mi sdug ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /ngas 'dir
dbang po drug gi rta| /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas brtan pa/ /rtag tu rgyags yan ma lus btags/ /smon med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /ngas 'dir rjes su chags pa dang / /khong
khro ba dang 'thab pa dang / /rtsod spang ma lus mtha' mar phyin/ /stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /ngas 'dir phyi dang nang dag gi /rlom sems kun dang rtog pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa
yongs su zad/ /mtshan med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /lha mi srid pa'i rtser thug pa'i/ /bde ba thams cad ma lus par/ /nga yis 'dir ni yongs su btang / /ngas 'dir rnam thar
gsum thob nas/ /ngas 'dir shes rab stobs kyis ni/ /srid pa dag gi 'ching ba kun/ /ma lus kun las grol bar gyur/ /ngas 'dir rgyu mthong gyur nas ni/ /rtag dang mi rtag 'du shes
dang | /bdag dang bdag med bde sdug bsngal/ /rgya yi 'du shes gsum las rgyal/ /ngas 'dir las kyi rnam pa dag /skye mched drug rtsa kun 'byung las/ /byung ba thams cad shing
dbang drung / /mi rtag pa yis bsnun te bcad/ /ngas 'dir ye shes nyi ma yis/ /gti mug mun pa'i rnyog pa dang / /lta gyur rgyags dang khros gang ba/ /yun ring mun pa bsal snang
byas| |ngas 'dir brtson 'grus stobs kyi grus/ /'dod dang chags pa'i chu srin can/ /ngan 'dzin lta ngan sred rlabs chu/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las rgal/ /gang rtogs chags
dang gti mug dang / /sems kyi rnam par rtog bsregs te/ /phye leb nags mer lhung 'dra ba/ /ngas 'dir de ni rjes su rtogs/ /nga 'dir ring nas song ba yi/ /bskal pa dpag
med bye khrag khrig /'khor ba'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa/ /gdung ba med nas ngal yang sos/ /'jig rten phan phyir rga shi dang / /mya ngan sdug bsngal
mthar phyin pa/ /phas rgol kun gyis ma thob pa/ /bdud rtsi de ni ngas 'dir rtogs/ /sred las byung ba'i skye mched kyis/ /sdug bsngal phung pos sdug bsngal ba/ /phyis mi
'byung ba 'jigs med kyi/ /grong khyer 'dir ni ngas phyin to/ /ngas 'dir nang gi dgra chen po/ /khyab pa de dag rjes su rtogs/ /rtogs nas rab tu bsregs te ngas/ /de dag yang
byung gnas med byas/ /bdud rtsi'i don du bskal pa ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig rang gi sha /mig dang rin chen mang btang ba/ /de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dpag
med pas/ /gang sangs rgyas de ngas 'dir rtogs/ /gang gi snyan pa nyams dga' ba/ /sgra ni 'jig rten rnams su grags/ /rten nas byung ba'i 'gro ba stong / /sems kyi skad cig
gcig la 'jig /smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer 'dra/ /de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/ /gang gis lag pa'i mthil du ni/ /shing tog bzhag bzhin 'jig rten khams/ /thams
cad mthong ba'i mig mchog de/ /nga yis 'dir ni dag par byas/ /sngon gyi gnas ni ngas 'dir dran/ /rig pa gsum yang thob par gyur/ /bskal ba khrag khrig dpag med pa/ /
gnyid kyis log las sad bzhin dran/ /lha mi nor zhing 'du shes log /phyin ci log gyur gang 'bar ba/ /de yang de bzhin ma nor bar/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nyid khu 'thungs/ /gang
gi don du stobs bcu po/ /sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/ /byams pa'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /gang gi don du stobs
bcu po| |sems can kun la snying rje bsgoms/ /snying rje'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /gang gi don du stobs bcu po/ /sems
can kun la dga' ba bsgoms/ /dga' ba'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /gang gi don stobs bcu po/ /bskal pa khrag khrig btang snyoms
bsgoms/ /btang snyoms 'di yi stobs kyis rgyal/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /stobs bcu gang+gA'i bye ma bas/ /rab tu mang bas gang gsol pa/ /sngon rgyal seng+ges
sngon gsol ba/ /bdud rtsi'i nyid khu ngas 'dir 'thungs/ /rga shi mtha' mar ma phyin par/ /skyil mo krung ni mi gzhig ces/ /sder bcas pa yi bdud mdun 'dir/ /nga yis tshig ni
gang smras pa/ /ye shes rdo rje brtan 'bar byas/ /nga yis ma rig pa yang bcom/ /stobs bcu nyid ni thob par gyur/ /de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig /nga yis dgra bcom nyid
thob ste| |nga yi zag pa ma lus zad/ /bdud kyi sde yang bcom par gyur/ /de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig /sgrib pa lnga yi sgo glegs rnams/ /nga yis
'dir ni thams cad bcag /sred pa'i 'khri shing rnams kyang bcad/ /nga 'dir skyil mo krung gzhig go /de nas mi yi zla ba de/ /dal gyis gdan las bzhengs nas su/ /dbang
bskur chen po bzhes nas ni/ /seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs par gyur/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis rin chen snod/ /steng nas spos chu sna tshogs kyis/ /stobs bcu yon tan
mthar phyin pa/ /'jig rten rtsa lag sku yang bsil/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams dge /lha mo khrag khrig lhan cig tu/ /kun nas rol mo stong dag gis/ /mchod pa gzhal
du med pa byed/ /de ltar lha yi bu dag ni/ /sa yi snying por zhag bdun du/ /rgyal ba'i skyil krung ma bshig pa/ /rgyur bcas rkyen bcas gzhi dang bcas/ /dge slong dag/ de
ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
so| |ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la gdan de nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhag bdun pa
gnyis pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyang ring du 'chag pas 'chag go /zhag bdun pa gsum pa'i tshe ni de bzhin
gshegs pa ngas 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal
mthar phyung ngo| zhes byang chub kyi snying po la spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs so/ /zhag bdun pa bzhi pa'i tsha ni de bzhin gshegs pa shar gyi rgya mtsho nas nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar du mi
ring ba'i 'chag pas 'chag go// /'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdor/ /bam po bcu drug pa/ /de nas bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol/ dge slong dag/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdig can/ nga'i dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan/ dul ba/ gsal ba/ byang ba/ bag tsha ba med pa/ mang du thos pa/ chos
kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa/ bdag nyid slob dpon du sgrog pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba byung ba rnams chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad de
dad par byas nas cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston par nus pa dag ma byung gi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /sdig can/ ngas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dang /
chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bzhag par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi
bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /sdig can/ nga'i 'khor bzhi po dul ba/ gsal ba/ byang ba/ bag tsha ba med pa nas cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston pa'i
bar du nus pa dag byung bar ma gyur gyi bar du/ de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/
phyogs gcig tu song nas 'dug ste mgo smad nas mdas sa la ri mo 'bri zhing bdag gi yul las 'das so snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo dga' ba dang /
mi dga' ma dang / sred ma gsum gyis bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig ji ltar thugs mi dgyes/ /mi dgyes gang lags bka' stsol dang / /'dod chags
zhags pas de bcings nas/ /glang po bzhin du dgug par bgyi/ /bkug nas de ni myur du yang / /khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de ltar thugs ngan 'o brgyal 'or/ /dgyes pa rgya chen
brnyes par 'gyur/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jig rten dgra bcom bde bar gshegs/ /'dod chags dbang du de mi 'gro/ nga yi yul las shin tu 'das/ /de bas nga ni mya ngan
che| |de nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa snga nas kyang shes mod kyi/ bud med kyi mi brtan pas pha'i tshig ma mnyan te/ bu gcig
btsas tsam gyi na tshod kyis dar la bab par bsgyur nas mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de dag
yid la ma mdzad par de dag rga bas 'khogs par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de dag pha'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ni chags pas mi bkri ste/ /nga yi yul las
shin tu 'das/ /de bas mya ngan nga che zhes/ /yab kyis bdag cag gsungs pa med/ /gau ta ma ni brlag pa'i phyir/ /bdag cag rnams kyis gang sprul pa/ /gzugs la gal te de lta
na| |de yis de snying 'gas par 'gyur/ /yab/ bdag cag gi lus rga bas 'khogs pa 'di ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas byin gyis
brlabs ni gzhan du sgyur bar byed nus pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu dag gi 'jig rten dag na mi de ngas ma mthong / /myur du song ste thub pa de las rang byas nyas pa shogs
shig dang / /de ni khyed kyi bsam pa bzhin du sngon gyi lus su bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /de nas de dag dong ste bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la sku brnyas bgyi bar bsam pas/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ji ltar byis pa rnams dang / ji ltar glen pa rnams dang / ji ltar mi gsal ba mi mkhas shing ma 'tshal ba rnams ltar bdag cag nongs pa can du gzung du gsol//
bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag cag nongs pa can du gzung du gsol/ zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la bzod par gsol to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la tshigs su
bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ sen mos ri la bru ba dang / /so yis lcags ni bca' ba dang / /mgo yis ri ni dbug pa dang / /gting mi dpog la dpog par 'dod/ /de lta bas na/
bu mo khyed nyes pa can du ngas gzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyes pa la nyes par mthong nas 'chags shing phyin chad kyang sdom par byed pa de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul
ba la 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/ gzhag bdun pa lnga pa zhag bdun yul ngan chen po byung ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na
bzhugs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang / rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
la lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang / rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes shar phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po gzhan
mang du lhags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bka' bo/ /shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan
'das kyi sku la grang ba dang / rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po rnams lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis
lan bdun du dkris te mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo/ /klu'i rgyal po'i lus kyi phung po de ni ri'i dbang po lhun po ltar mthong por gnas par gyur to/ /klu'i rgyal po de
dag gis kyang ji ltar nyin bdun mtshan bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la reg par gyur pa de lta bu'i bde ba de dag gis sngon nam yang ma rnyed do/ /de nas zhag bdun 'das nas
klu'i rgyal po de dag gi yul ngan med par shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las lus bkrol nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po btang bzung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su zhugs so/ /zhag bdun pa drug pa'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas nas shing n+ya gro d+ha skyong gi drung du
bzhud do/ /klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha skyong gi bar du klung nai rany+dza na'i dogs su dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / nyan thos rgan po dang / gau ta ma
dang / gcer bu pa dang / kun tu 'tsho ba pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das gau ra mas zhag bdun pa yul ngan chen po'i dus 'di bde bas
bde bar 'das par byas sam zhes 'dzer to/ /dge slong dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /chos thos pa dang mthong ba dang / /dben
par dga' ba bde ba yin/ /srog chags 'byung po rnams la bsdams/ /gnod pa mi byed 'jig rten bde/ /sdig pa rnams las rab 'das pa/ /'dod chags bral ba 'jig
rten bde/ /nga snyam nga rgyal gang 'dul ba/ /de ni mchog tu bde ba yin/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre
sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar gzigs nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sgra reg ro dang gzugs dang dri rnams kyis/ /'jig rten 'di ni kun tu gdungs par gyur/ /srid pas 'jigs kyang srid pa'i sred pa yis/ /phyi
zhing srid pa tshol bar byed pa yin/ /zhag bdun pa bdun pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe byang phyogs pa'i tshong pa ga gon dang bzang
po zhes bya ba mkhas pa gsal ba spun gnyis rnyed pa chen po rnyed nas zod rnam pa mang po thogs te 'gron pa phal po che dang / shing rta shin tu gang ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho
phyogs nas byang phyogs su dong ngo / /de gnyis la glang bu cang shes legs skyes dang / grags pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/ /de gnyis la thogs pa'i 'jigs pa med de/ gang du
glang bu gzhan mi thar pa der de gnyis gtong ngo / /gang du mdun rol na 'jigs pa yod pa der de gnyis phur pa la btags pa bzhin du 'dug go /de gnyis la lcag gis mi 'ju'i/ me
tog ut+pa la sbar gang ngam/ sna ma'i me tog gi phreng bas de gnyis 'ded do/ /shing sgrol rgyu dang nye ba zhig tu shing 'o ma can gyi nags na gnas pa'i lha mos byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis
brlabs pas de dag gi shing rta de dag thams cad mi 'gro ste/ 'breng ba la sogs pa shing rta'i cha rkyen thams cad kyang chad grugs so/ /shing rta'i
'phang lo rnams kyang lte ba la thug par sa'i nang du nub ste/ thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrims kyang shing rta de dag 'gro bar ma gyur nas kha cig ngo mtshar dang / skrag par gyur
te| shing rta 'di dag thang la'ang thogs par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod/ 'di'i 'gyur ba ni ci zhig yin snyam nas de dag gis glang bu legs skyes dang / grags
pa de gnyis 'dren du bcug ste/ me tog up+ta la sbar gang dang / sna ma'i me tog gi phreng bas bdas kyang 'gro bar ma gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir
'di gnyis kyang mi 'gro ba las mdun na 'jigs pa 'ga' zhig 'byung du gdon mi za'o snyam nas de dag gis sa 'khru ba rta pa dag sngar btang ngo / /sa 'khru ba rta pa rnams slar
log nas 'jigs pa ci'ang med ces smras so/ /lha mo des kyang rang gi gzugs bstan nas ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs phyung ngo / /glang bu de gnyis kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa ga la ba de logs su shing rta drangs pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa me ltar rab tu 'bar ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan gyis legs par
brgyan pa/ nyi ma shar nas ring por ma lon pa lta bu dpal gyis 'bar ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di ci zhig/ tshangs pa 'dir phyin tam/ 'o na te lha'i
dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'on te rnam thos kyi bu'am/ 'on te nyi ma dang zla ba'am/ 'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig gam/ rlung gi lha zhig snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas na
bza' ngur smrig rnams bstan to/ /de nas de dag gis ngur smrig bgos pa 'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ bdag cag 'jigs pa med do zhes smras te/ de dag dad pa thob nas yang
phan tshun du smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'di ni dus su za ba yin na/ cung zad ci yod/ smras pa/ sbrang rtsi dang / skyo ma dang / bu ram shing bshus pa yod do/ /de dag gis sbrang rtsi dang /
skyo ma dang / bu ram shing bshus pa khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba
byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs
brtse bar dgongs te spyan gzigs 'di bzhes su gsol/ /dge slong dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis lag pas 'di blangs na ni ma legs na/
sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis snod ji lta bus bzhes snyam nas mkhyen pa 'jug par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa'i skabs kyi dus la bab par rig nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bzhi nas rgyal po chen po bzhi gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi thogs te lhags nas de bzhin gshegs
pa la bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag bzhes su gsol zhes phul lo/ /de dag dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs
nas de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so/ /de bzhin du dngul gyi bzhi dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / sbug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa bzhi bzhi dang / rin po che thams cad
las byas pa'i lhung bzed bzhi thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul na'ang dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so/ /dge slong dag /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lhung bzed rnam pa ci 'dra ba dag gis bzhes snyam dgongs na/ rdo'i
lhung bzed rnams kyis bzhes bar mkhyen nas de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i thugs bskyed pa dang / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal po chen po gzhan
gsum la smras pa/ grogs po dag /sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi byin ba dang / de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsam ste/ 'di spyad par bya'o/ /
snyam pa dang / de nas sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam par snang byed ces bya ba des bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye snod 'di dag spyad par mi bya bar/ /'di dag chongs shig
mchod rten grags par gyur/ /shAkya thub ces bya ba'i rgyal ba 'byung / /de la lhung bzed 'di dag dbul ba gyis/ /grogs po dag gis shAkya thub pa la/ /snod dbul ba yi
dus dang tshod la bab/ /glu dbyangs dag dang sil snyan sgra phyung ste/ /mchod pa byas nas lhung bzed dbul bar bya/ /snod de chos kyi rang bzhin mi shigs pa/ /snod 'di rdo ba'i
rang bzhin bzhes su rung / /gzhan gyis blang bar bzod pa ma yin gyi/ /da ni bdag cag de dag len du dong / /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang gi gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te me
tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len cing rang rang gi lag tu lhung bzed de dag thogs nas de
bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ lhung bzed de dag lha'i me tog gis bkang nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo//
dge slong dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po dad pa dang ldan pa bzhi po 'di dag gis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed
bzhi phul na/ bdag la ni bzhir mi rung la/ ci ste gcig gi blangs na ni gsum yang mi dga' bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag blangs te lhung
bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pa brkyangs te rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la tshigs su bcad
pas bka' stsal pa/ bde bar gshegs la lhung bzed phul cig dang / /khyod ni theg pa mchog gi snod du 'gyur/ /nga 'dra dag la lhung bzed phul ba ni/ /dran dang blo gros nam
yang nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las lhung bzed bzhes so/ /bzhes nas
kyang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs la lhung bzed 'bul/ /nam yang dran dang shes rab nyams mi
'gyur| |bsil dngos go 'phang sangs rgyas thob bar du/ /bde bas bde bar dus rnams zad par byed/ /dge slong dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar
dgongs te rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung las lhung bzed bzhes so/ /bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dag sems
de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /khyod kyis yongs dag lhung bzed phul cig dang / /khyod kyi sems ni myur du dag par 'gyur/ /lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na bsngags par 'os/ /dge slong
dag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po las lhung bzed bzhes so/ /bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la tshigs su
bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ skyon med sems dang dad pas skyon med snod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims skyon med cing / /tshul skyon med la rab tu phul zhig dang / /khyod kyi sbyin
pa bsod nams skyon med 'gyur/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang las lhung bzed bzhes so/ /bzhes
nas kyang mos pa'i stobs kyis lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /nga yis sngon gyi srid par snod kyi rnams/ /bzang byas 'bras bus
rab tu bkang ste byin/ /de nas lhung bzed dbyibs legs bzhi po 'di/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha bzhi rnams kyis byin/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtan pa dam pa'i don de dgongs pa de//
zhag bdun byang chub shing mchog gzigs nas ni/ /seng+ge'i stabs 'dra mi yi seng+ge de/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu bskyod nas bzhengs/ /glang po'i dbang ltar
kun tu dal gyis gshegs/ /rim gyis sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung byon nas/ /lhun po lta bur g.yo ba mi mnga' bzhugs/ /thub pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin rnams dgongs/ /
de yi tshe na ga gon bzang po sbun/ /gnyis dang tshong pa'i tshogs dang shing rta ni/ /nor gyi gang ba dag dang lhan cig tu/ /sA la'i me tog nags tshal rgyas par zhugs/ /drang
srong chen po'i gzi yis skad cig tu/ /srog shing thug par 'phang lo sa nang nub/ /de dag de 'dra ba yi gnas mthong nas/ /tshong pa'i tshogs ni 'jigs pa chen po skyes/ /de
dag ral gri mda' dang mdung thung thogs/ /nags na ri dwags bzhin du su zhes tshol/ /sprin med 'od zer stod ldan 'dra ba'i rgyal/ /zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra ba mthong / /khro ba
spangs shing rgyags pa bsal nas su/ /mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di ni su zhes dpyod/ /mkha' las lha yis 'di skad tshig smras te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan don mdzad/ /nyin
bdun mtshan bdun bza' dang btung ba dag /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'di ni ma gsol to/ /gal te bdag gis nyon mongs zhi 'dod na/ /sku dang thugs bsgoms 'di la bshos gsol
cig /de dag gis ni sgra snyan de thos nas/ /rgyal la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/ /dga' nas de dag grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /rgyal la bshos gsol bar ni gros bcad do/ /dge
slong dang / /de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po gnyis kyi ba'i khyu mtha' 'khob kyi 'or zhig na gnas so/ /de nas de'i tshe ba de dag bzhos nas mar gyi nying khu byung bar gyur to/ /de nas
ba lang rdzi de dag gis mar gyi nyid khu de khyer nas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de dag gi tshul smos te/ btsun pa dag mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ khyed
kyi ba thams cad ni bzhos na/ mar gyi nying khu byung na 'di ci dge ba zhig lags sam/ 'on te ma lags/ de na bram ze zas la brkam pa'i rang bzhin can dag 'di skad ces 'di ni
dge ba ma yin te/ bram ze rnams la mchod sbyin chen po bya dgos so/ zhes 'dzer to/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po dag gi tshe rabs snga ma'i snag gi gnyen
mtshams bram ze rma bya zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa des bram ze'i gzugs su sprul nas tshong pa de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis sngon ni
smon btab pa/ /byang chub brnyes nas de bzhin gshegs/ /bdag cag rnams kyi bshos gsol te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog /smon lam de ni rdzogs zin gyi/ /byang
chub brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs/ /de la zhal zas phul cig dang / /gsol nas 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /khyed kyi ba mar nying khu byung / /shin tu bkra
shis skar ma bzang / /drang srong chen po de yi ni/ /bsod nams las kyi mthu 'di'o/ /de ltar tshong pa bskul nas ni/ /rma bya rang gi gnas su song / /ga gon zhes ni bya la sogs//
thams cad yid ni mgu bar gyur/ /ba stong 'o ma ji snyed yod pa dag /de kun ma lus par ni bsdus nas su/ /de yi steng nas spris ma bzham byas te/ /de dag rab tu gus par
zhal zas sbyor/ /rin chen gzhong pa tshim byed ces bya ba/ /srang gcig la yang 'bum phrag gcig ri ba/ /gtsang mar rab bkrus dri ma med byas nas/ /zhal zas kyis ni kha
da chad du bkang / /sbrang rtsi dang ni rin chen gzhong thogs te/ /sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung song ston pa la/ /btsun pa bzhes te bdag cag sman yang thogs/ /zhal zas gya nom pa
'di mnabs su gsol/ /spun gnyis po la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /byang chub zhugs pa'i sngon gyi bsam mkhyen nas/ /ston pa bzhes pa mdzad de zhal zas gsol/ /gsol
nas gzhong pa nam mkha'i dkyil du bor/ /lha yi bu pho rab tshangs zhes bya ba/ /de yis rin chen gzhong pa mchog de blangs/ /des de da dung tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na/ /lha gzhan grogs
dang lhan cig mchod pa phyed/ /de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po de dag la 'di dag gis rab tu dga' bar mdzad do| /lha yi bkra shis don sgrub
cing / /phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des/ /khyed kyi don rnams 'grub gyur cig /thams cad myur du mthun par shog /phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar/ /lag pa g.yas na
dpal yod shog /g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig /yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog /tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing / /phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams/ /rnyed pa
chen po rnyed gyur cing / /de dag bde ba skyed par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur
cig /smin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang nabs so dang / /rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste/ /de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong
ba grags ldan pa/ /shar phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste/ /de ni dri za kun gyi bdag /
nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la
nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma
dang / /don grub ma dang mi pham dang / /dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang / /dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar
shog /shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /gzhi 'dzin zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa/ /de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen/ /de yang khyed
la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed
de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni/ /me
bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin/ /sa ri dang ni sa ga ste/ /de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan//
de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /'phags skyes bo zhes bya bar brjod/ /de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag /gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang
yod la| |mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /
lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma/ /grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang / /legs par langs dang rab snga dang / /legs
par sad dang bde sgrub ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rtag tu gzi brjid kyis
kyang 'bar/ /rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /
lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la
skyong gyur cig /lha mtshams dang ni smon dang yang / /brtson 'grus brtan ldan snubs dang ni/ /chu stod chu smad byi bzhin dang / /gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig
rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes/ /de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag
chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po
che| |de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni/ /pad+ma dkar dang
skya rengs dang / /cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang / /rol dang nag dang stobs myur srid/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs
cha na| |nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod/ /nyi ma zla ba rnams kyang nub/ /nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin gyur/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed
cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /byang phyogs su ni
'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /khrums stod dang yang khrums smad dang / /nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / /bra nye de
ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /mi
la zhon pa lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste/ /nor bzang lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //
dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rab chags lha mo stong
lha mo| |sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can/ /rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang / /re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /byang phyogs logs
kyi phyogs cha na/ /spos ngad ldang ba'i ri po yod/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas/ /rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /
phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/ /phyogs bzhi
dag na bdun bdun gnas/ /lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis/ /phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas/ /dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad/ /yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad/ /dbang por
bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur/ /ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog /gnyen la blta ba bkra shis gyur/ /gnyen gyis
blta ba'ang bkra shis shog /dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgya chen dang / /dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas/ /thams cad du ni bkra shis dang / /bdud rtsi shis
pa thob par shog /tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang / /zag pa med pa rnams par grol rnams dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying brtses srungs/ /ston brgyar mtshungs par tshe ni
skyong bar shog /rnam 'dren zla med 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /de dag mthun par sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsungs/ /khyed rnams kyi ni dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /sbrang rtsi 'byung zhes
bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa rgyal ba yis/ /lung bstan chags med 'di ni dang po yin/ /phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mang / /gang dag lung
bstan de dag phyir mi ldog /rgyal bas lung bstan pa ni 'di thos nas/ /sems ni mgu zhing mchog tu dga' gyur te/ /de dag spun dang grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos
la skyabs su dong / /ga gon dang / bzang po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung na bzhugs pa
dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gcig pu dben par gshegs te nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma ngas
thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'di ni/ zab pa/ zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ brtag mi nus
pa| rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ 'phags pa mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ phung po thams cad bor pa/ kun tu rig pa/ nges par rig pa/ tshor ba thams
cad 'gog pa/ don dam pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ bsil ba'i dngos po/ len pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa ma yin pa/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/ 'dus
ma byas pa/ yul drug las shin tu 'das pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa/ sgras brjod du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ dmigs
pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ zhi gnas kyi lam gyis chod pa/ stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gog pa/ mya ngan las 'das
pa ste| gal te bdag gis chos 'di gzhan dag la bstan la/ gal te de dag gis ma shes na/ de ni bdag ngal ba dang / log par brtsal ba dang / chos bstan pa don med par 'gyur
gyi| bdag snying las chung khur kha rog par gnas par bya snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /zab zhi rdul bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas/ /bdud rtsi'i chos ni
bdag gis thob par gyur/ /bdag gis bstan kyang gzhan gyis mi shes te/ /mi smra nags 'dabs gnas par bya ba snyam/ /tshig bral ngag gi lam gyis
mi gos pa/ /de bzhin nyid chos rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/ /sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba rab grol ba/ /mchog rab ngo mtshar che ba dam pa shes/ /don tshul 'di ni yi ge rnams kyis
su| |shes par mi nus mdzangs pas rig pa yin/ /sngon gyi rgyal la lhag byas sems can rnams/ /de dag chos 'di thos na yid ches 'gyur/ /'di na chos ni gang yang yod min te//
yod med gang yin de ni yod ma yin/ /gang gis rgyu dang bya ba brgyud shes pa/ /de la yod pa'am med pa yod ma yin/ /bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par ni/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i
gan nas bdag gis spyad/ /'on kyang gang na bdag dang sems can dang / /srog med bzod pa de ni bdag ma thob/ /gang tshe 'di na skye 'chi gang med pa/ /chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin bdag
med pa'i/ /bzod 'di bdag gis thob pa de yi tshe/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bdag lung bstan/ /'jig rten kun la snying rje mtha' yas nga / /gzhan gyis gsol ba btab la
nga mi sdod/ /skye bo 'di dag tshangs la dad pa ste/ /de yis gsol ba btab na 'khor lo bskor/ /gal te tshangs pas nga yi rkang par gtugs/ /rnam pa bzang po 'tshal 'gyur sems
can mchis/ /rdul phral gya nom chos shod gsol btab na/ /de ltas nga yi chos 'di gzung 'os 'gyur/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi mdzod
spu nas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'od phyung ngo / /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs
pa chen po gtsug phud can sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes te/ bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud cing chos
mi ston par shes nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag song la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs pa gtsug phud can
gyis de'i tshe de ma yin pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
