dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas sus nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/ sems can nyon
mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang
dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi
don gtan la bab par bstan pas sems rangs par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bdud sdig can la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /sdig can/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin gyi/ khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig /sdig can/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang / de skad ces smras pa dang / sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ nyi shu po 'di
dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul yin no/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam par grol ba 'dod cing 'khor bas
skrag pa rnams la bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/ /stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba'ang bdud
kyi las so/ /'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /bsam gtan skyed cing bsam gtan las rnam par ldog
pa tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sbyin gnas tshol zhing tshul khrims
'chal pa rnams la khro ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /zab mo'i gtam 'chab
cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /rab tu brtson pa'i
bsngags pa brjod kyang sems can mi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa'ang bdud kyi
las so| |lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /nyon mongs pa ma lus par
zad par tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing snying rje chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa'ang bdud
kyi las so/ /thabs dang mi ldan par dge ba spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mi tshol gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang phan
pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dogs te chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /'jig
rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa skal pa
mnyam pa rnams la mi bsten/ mi bsnyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mi mnyam par dga'
ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba'am/ rgyal po'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gi longs spyod dang / nor dang / rin
po che dang / dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi bsten/ mi bsnyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni lha'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi
las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing thos nas kyang rnam
par spong ba de dag byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 'khor ba na yongs
su mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa shes pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang / tshe rabs tshe
rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa
dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas sems can sdud cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu med pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po
thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i
bu mtshams bzang gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni sdig
can| khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig legs par rnyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
mi gang 'byung po babs pa de ni mi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar blta'o/ /lha'i bu/ de bzhin du kho bo'ang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs
nas ston gyi/ 'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i rtsal du ni mi blta'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi seng+ge'i khri la
'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos ston pas dga' bar ma gyur tam/ bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na/ kho bos ni
bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par shes so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod par gsol cig dang / de nas gtong bar
'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol mi dgos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dag 'khrug cing
khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ci 'dra/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / khong khro ba med
pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas g.yo med pa'i bzod pa dang / dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse
zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa med pas ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar song ba dang bral bas stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang / chos nyid la rton
pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel
bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjes su srung bas ngo byed pa'ang med la mi mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i
chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa
rnam pa bcu gnyis so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod gal te bkrol na/ dga' bar 'gyur ram/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ kho bo dga' ste/ mchog tu dga'o//
de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bdud sdig can thong zhig dang / rang gi gnas su 'gro'o//
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod su zhig gis bcings/ gang las dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/
'jam dpal/ bdag ni sus bcings mi shes so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod ji ltar bcings pa med pa la bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du
byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la
sdug par 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa
la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes so/ /sdig can/ khyod dgrol na/ gang nas dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag ni gang
las kyang mi dgrol lo/ /smras pa/ sdig can/ de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba'ang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa me gtogs par gang las kyang
rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de/ de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de bsdus pa dang / sdig can
de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gis shes so/ /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so/ /legs so/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyi/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
yul du blta'o/ /de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sems can
rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gal te sems can rnams
na bar ma gyur na/ sman pas kyang bya bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu/ gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par
mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang byung na/ sangs rgyas 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba byung na /
sangs rgyas 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang de
bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos bskyed pa de gang / chos bkag pa gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes
nas chos gang yang bskyed pa'ang med/ bkag pa'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ sangs
rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la'ang kun tu mi spyod pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na
lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ /lha'i
bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing sems
can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod
pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro
ba dang / tha ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i chos de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus gces pa'ang mi 'dor ba na'o/ /
lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms
par zhugs par shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang
ba'i phyir shes rab kyi rnam par dpyod pa na ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o/ /lha'i bus
smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la dga' ba'ang mi skyed la/ mi dga' ba'ang ma
yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar
gyur pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad sgyu
ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems
dpas chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang / gzhi med par shes pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
pa| nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos na mi dngangs/ mi skrag /skrag par mi 'gyur zhing go cha chen po mi
'dor ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' des pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du
bsrings pa'ang ma yin la sred pa'i bag la nyal gyis nye bar bsnyen pa'ang ma yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba
yin| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing tshig ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa
na'o| |lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mthun par 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang mthun pa'i phyir sems can
thams cad kyis bsgo ba las mi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad dang mthun par gnas pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes
shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nang yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol tu rgyu ba la'ang
rgyu ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chags pa thams cad la'ang spyod la/ chags pa thams
cad la zhen pa'ang med pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba bsten pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod
pa na'o| |lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzan pa na'o/ /
lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chog shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes
pas chos gang yang mi len pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la'ang gnas la/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la sems can thams cad kyi
nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par yang snang ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rang dgar rang dbang can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/ ye shes kyis dbang byed kyi/ nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji
ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing gzhan la'ang ma thos pa'i chos thos par
byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam dmigs pa thams cad las 'byung
ba rab tu shes kyang chos thams cad 'phro bar yang mi byed/ mi 'phro bar yang mi byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa
yin| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la/ rang gi sems
kyi spyod pa la'ang mi lta zhing / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la sems can thams
cad kyi dbang po rnams la'ang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing / sgra skad brag ca dang mtshungs par yang shes nas mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis bshad
pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbyor pa phun sum tshogs
pa| dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa de dag gis kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ de dag ci
la mos par 'gyur/ bsam pa ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis bgrod pa
gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste/ gnyis su med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing / ma
rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba'ang tshol la/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred
pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags
kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang / zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe
sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang / gti mug gi mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / gti
mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu shes pa na ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs
su shes par mi byed/ kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/ 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed/ lam sgom par yang mi byed la/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pas 'phags pa'i bden
pa bzhi rjes su rtogs te/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med/
sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge slong tshul bzhin la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/ 'gag par mi byed/ gnas
par mi byed do/ /gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa
sgom pa ste/ lha'i bu/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ gdong mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas
brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na bdud rnams kyi skabs med do/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gi bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la gcags
bzhin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar
bdag gis shes pa ltar na/ gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas spong ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa med
do| |lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim de dag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong
ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par
'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji
skad smras pa bzhin te/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi
dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / bzod pa 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa
bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lha'i bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zungs shig /bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu 'od mang po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan

la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga tA d+hiSh+ThA Na satwA ba lo ke na bud+d+ha k+She tre ni rde sha na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas lha'i nor
bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng+ge'i khri bkod pa na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
zag pa zad pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa/
thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis
thogs pa/ thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal
dang / glog gi tog dang / dri med 'od dang / tsan+dan dang / bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad kyang
sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgya stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa
lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa
gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu
dang / gang pa bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i khri la
bzhugs par rig nas rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos
dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mor byas so/ /kha cig gis lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das sems can thams cad la dmigs pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing / gzugs thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur nas sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni/
mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to/ /gos med pa
rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur
to| |dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod med pa de dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang
ldan par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang bskul nas thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du
skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /sems
can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /sems can gang dag
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas sems can thams cad la
byams par gnas pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten
rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/ de dag mun pa
chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral
bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te mtho ba dang / dma' bar gyur to/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
'dus te 'dug par gyur nas des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang
chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing 'dus pa chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang
po dag lung ston pa'ang kun tu snang zhing chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams
cad la snying rje skyed la/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus
shig /rigs kyi bu/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can sdig pa byed pa/ dbul ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa/ rga ba dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/ longs spyod chung ba/
lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/ tshe thung ba/ blo chung ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag 'byung ba yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag gi don
du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde
ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems
can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/ nyam chung ba/ mdog
ngan pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung ba mchis te/ de dag ni/ ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig la
gcig 'gum par 'gyur la/ gcig gis gcig gi nor dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing / gad mo dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro gar dang /
rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes par bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag
rgyu de dang / gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du bdag de dag gi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin
gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs par 'tshal gyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang / ma gzigs pa dang / ma gsan pa
dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam nyan par 'tshal ba dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / shes rab dang ldan
pa'i rang bzhin can gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po lhags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyur cing / slar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das/
bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te tshig mthun
par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs par bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan
gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te/ snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de
bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/ ngas kyang lung bstan pa thob bo/ /
rigs kyi bu/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/ thams
cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod nyid dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas ri
mo dang / mchod pa dag byas te/ de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma ngag gis lung bstan pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag thob par gyur
nas 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / re ba thams cad grub pa dang / nad rnams dang bral bar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad
spangs pa dang / gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor ba dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams
kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos
dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi
mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing / sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag byas shing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes brjod cing phyag 'tshal
bar byed pa dang / lags so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par
'gyur ro/ /de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nad rnams dang bral ba dang / tshe ring ba dang /
blo brtan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / brtan pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal po thams cad dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang / rgyal bu thams cad dang / blon po thams
cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / sems can gyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang yo byad mang
por yang 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi kha nas tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /mig ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro/ /de dag la lha rnams srung bar yang
'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /phrag dog med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed
par yang 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / bsnyen bkur
byas te yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ming tsam thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung
bstan pas lung bstan pa yin te/ de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa'ang yin pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom
bskyed par mi bya'o/ /gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin
pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / longs spyod med pa dang / blo med pa dang / sred pa che ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / klad
pa na ba gang yin pa dang / zan chad pa gang yin pa dang / gos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang / reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas
pa gang yin pa dang / spyo ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /des
kyang 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams la sdig pa me dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor
bshags par bya'o/ /bsal bar bya'o/ /mi bcab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi
bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
dag dang / pha ma dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par
'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
dmus long du 'gyur ba dang / bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten
dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams
cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed
bar byed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par longs spyod pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba chen por byed pa dang / bsam pa dang 'dod
pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / las thams cad zad par byed pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu che bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / me dang / chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang
sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
mo dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i
'khor de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / ras bcos bu zung dag
gsol te/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ma te/ lo ka bi lo ke lo a ti krAn+te/ satwa a ba lo ke ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha te/ sarba a sha pa

ri pU ra Ne/ d+yu ti na d+ha re/ na ra de ba pU dzi te ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na da de/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/ sarba lo ka ma su khA b+ha ba tu/ pUrba k+Sharma k+Sha pa ya tu/ rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ sarba ye b+h+ya ta thA ga ta
a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swAhA/ kye rigs kyi bu dag /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /ngas
kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/ grogs po dag /gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad
'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog
dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher
byas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la
re re nas dbul bar bya'o/ /des na de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob
par yang 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang / stobs dang /
mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
par gyur nas de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
dam 'cha' ba mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de bzung
lags so/ /bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ deng slan chad bdag gis mngon 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs de grags
par gyur tam/ glo bur chud par gyur pa de'i lus nyam nga ba'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/ bro nad dam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba'am/ sems gdung ba'am/ dus ma
lags par 'grum pa'am/ chab kyis 'jigs pa'am/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa'am/ dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa'am/ mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung
po'i 'jigs pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dgra rnams sam/ mi dang / mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho 'tsham pa'am/ rnam par gtse ba'am/ gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni
gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig /bdag gis chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /
ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang / mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam

bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba be d+hi satwa nAM/ a ri ha hA na/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ badzra kA yaM/ badzra ba la/ badzra te dza/ hUM hUM/ badzra pA Ni/ ta thA

ga ta A dz+nyA pa lA ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyAM/ sarba bya d+hi na sarba pA paM nA sha ya/ de hi me/ yi the ba si taM pha ra ma/ yan ya me ba a b+hi prA yan tsa mi tan+ta me ba sa mraM d+h+ya tu/ he he/ tu ru tu ru/ A gats+tsha/

A gats+tsa/ ma bi lam+ba da ri sha ya/ badzra kA ya/ da ri sha ya/ badzra krA yaM/ bud+d+ha a d+hi sh+ThA ne na swAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po
thams cad kyang rab tu dngangs so/ /lha thams cad dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
gam| rig sngags 'chang ba nyid dam/ tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen par bgyis la dgung zla yar gyi ngo
tshes brgyad la tsan+dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gang du dgod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying gar sku gdung stsal pa/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ rig
sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bgyis la/ gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing gdugs mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la/ de nas tshes brgyad
nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang gzhag par
bgyi| phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / skyems dang / 'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la rad pa dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas dus
gsum du bdug spos dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mchod pa bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
bgyis nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o/ /des na sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dog sa
g.yo ba dang / 'od zer kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang yang
dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad ma mchis pa dang / tshe ring pa dang / sdig pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur zhing yon tan stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /'gum pa'i tshe
na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /bdag mthong bar yang stsal bar bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes
bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so/ /legs so/ /phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi med pa dang / yid gnyis med pa dang /
the tshom med par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / mi rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
skyes pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing
sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par
'gyur pa'o/ /'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/ nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sdig pa spyod par byed pa/ shes nas sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems
can de dag la chos ston par byed cing / sdig pa thams cad las zlog bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su
rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang / sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/ yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i
phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i
sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par
'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyang mi 'tshol lags na/ de dag gi
bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dka' ba spyod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu mo dang /
chung ma dang / bran dang / bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba
snga ma 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa'i bsod
nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa
byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nges kun chub par byas shing bshad
pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'bri pa dang / yi ger 'brir
'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston
par byed pa dang / nyan par byed na/ de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri
ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni/ de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba
dang / bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /
mtshon cha dang / spyo ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi
gzhi de dang / mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung
bar 'gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra 'kho nar mthong zhing / dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/ dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag de
nas shi 'phos nas kyang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na/ lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstan pa ma thob
pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / gzung ba dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger
'brir gzhug pa dang / dad par yang mi nus la/ chos smra ba de la'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar yang mi nus so/ /rigs
kyi bu| gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor
de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos smra
ba de dang / chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par bgyi bsrung bar bgyi ste/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur
lags so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag /legs so/ /legs
so| |khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig /gnod pa byed pa dang / brnyas pa dang / gshe ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / mtshon 'byin pa dang / rgya 'gal bar byed na'ang lus dang / srog
la mi ta bar byas la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ yi ger 'bri bar bya/ yi ger 'brir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams
cad kyis rim gror bya'o/ /yul phyogs de dang / gling de dang / grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o/ /
rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bskal pa
grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar/ /rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig /yon tan
nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa/ /de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/ /gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni/ /bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin
gos dang rgyan/ /spos dang phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te/ /nyan cing klog la yi ger 'bri byed pa/ /de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te/ /bde bar
gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs/ /rtag tu bag yod dgon par rten byed cing / /sems gzhan med par bsam gtan dag sgom dang / /sdug pa'i
bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing / /lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba bas/ /gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/ /mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin
byed pa ste/ /de yi ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spangs/ /'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste/ /gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa/ /de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing / /
de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin/ /'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing / /ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan/ /de la nam yang sdig pa yod min
cing / /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong / /de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /sems gdung lus lan ba'ang de bzhin du/ /klad pa na bas thams cad
zad 'gyur zhing / /de ni nam yang rnam par ltung mi 'gyur/ /des ni mthong ba'i chos la'ang yon tan kun/ /ji ltar bsam zhing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag
tu dge slong pho mo dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni/ /mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ltar/ /chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te/ /mdo sde 'di ni
rtag tu gzung bya zhing / /'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/ /spos dang phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis ni/ /bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'brir yang gzhug /phyi ma'i dus la rga
nas gdungs gyur la/ /'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g.yen spyo zhing / /sems dmyal yi dwags rnams su yongs 'khyams dang / /za ma ma ning smad par bya ba dang / /dmus long nyid
dang ro dang khyi yi dri/ /rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye bar byed/ /phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la/ /khro bas zil non rtag tu ser sna can/ /sangs rgyas chos la gus par
ma byas pas/ /de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la/ /der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing / /de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing ston
byed pa| |de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya/ /gang gis de la yongs su spyo ba dang / /smad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa/ /de ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa yin/ /'dzin la phu dud
byas na nga la'ang byas/ /de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang / /gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'bri zhing klog byed pa/ /de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing / /tshig 'jam snyan pa rgyun du brjod
par bya| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te/
bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so/ /de nyan cing bzung la bcangs shing bklags te
gzhan dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'brir stsal na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs
pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ des ji ltar bsam pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
kyang byang bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar
'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba
byin te| rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyi shod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so//

na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kA nAM/ na ma AR+Ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/

shAn+te/ pra shAn+te/ sarba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo kA ya/ kA ru ci ka/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta ma ma na si ku ru/ bya ba lo kA ya/ mA ma/ sma ra sma ra/ yan+ta yA bUrba/ sad t+ya a d+hiSh+Tha naM kri taM/ te

na san t+ye na pa tsa ne na/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ha k+She ta ma pa ri sho d+ha yA/ ma me kash+tsi de ba he thaM ka ro tu/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/ ma hA te dze/ ya na ma ma

kA ya du sh+tsa ri ta ma bA/ wA ga du sh+tsa ri ta ma bA/ ma no du sh+tsa ri ta ma bA/ dA rI d+r+ya ma bA/ tad sarba dak+ShA pA ya/ a lo kA ya/ bi lo kA ya/ ta thA ga ta da ri sha nan tsa/ a ha ma d+hi ka dak+Sha mi

bo d+hi sa t+ya da ri sha na ma/ d+ha d+hu ma/ dad sa swa me da ri sha na ma/ sarba me ku sha lA a b+hi bar+d+han+tu/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nan/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma
ma satwa/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa de swAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing ga zha'i sgra chen po dang / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to/ /
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod sems can thams
cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/ las thams cad phyang bar phyed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i
gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzugs 'di legs par smras so/ /bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang /
kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la
tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyogs su spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / bum pa gang ba
dag gis phyogs de dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod pa byas nas lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
me tog phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod nas yi ger bri bar bya'o/ /'bri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun
mong du byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang / gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems
dang / snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o/ /tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'ang de
bzhin bya'o/ /cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur zhing
dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe de nyid la'ang lus bde pa 'thob par 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro/ /des yi ger 'brir bcug nas kyang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su
bstan te bzhag la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du
sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing / gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba/ bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas
pa grogs po yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te dus
gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag kyang phul la/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa
brgyad rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la gtor bar bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje la'ang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o/ /phyogs bcur phyag
byas la nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang / steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna
tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o/ /des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
zhing sems 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o/ /cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar
bsnyen pa byas la de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la bdug spos dang / tsan+dan dang / pog dkar po dang / ga bur dag kyang gzhag
mar me kha bzhi/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dar dang / ba dan sna tshogs dag dang / gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par
brgyan la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chen dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang / gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go /sna ma'i me
tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir gtor ro/ /de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas
la| re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/
'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing
de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang /
mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/ dgra thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
blon po rnams kyang de la lta 'dod cing gces spras byed par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs par 'gyur/
nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang
ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / cho ga shes pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang / 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang / byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu
'dod pa dag gam/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs chen po'am/ gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs la gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs/ klog par yang rdo mi thogs/ mchod par yang rngo
mi thogs/ yi ge bri bar yang rngo mi thogs/ yi ger 'brir stsal bar yang rngo mi thogs/ dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/ /gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal
te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g.yengs pas nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par
'gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang / gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir stsal bar gyur na'ang
de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste/ de ni las de nyams su myong bar bgyid
cing the tshom skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na/ re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par
'gyur lags te/ de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang / the tshom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod par byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sha m+b+hi na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
cag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / re
ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ na maH

sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ s+yAd ya the dan/ ha ha/ hi hi/ hu hu/ sa ra sa ra/ la hUM la hUM/ shA g+h+rIM/ ma hA bid+yA/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skri te/ ha sa ha sa kiM tiSh+Tha si/ kiM kiM tiSh+Tha si/ kan ka

bi tsi tra/ a ba ra Na bi b+hU Shi tAng+ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba aR+than me sA d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ aR+than sA d+ha ya/ aR+than de hi me/ sarba satrA nAM sid+d+hiM/ hA hA/ pad+me

pad+me| ma hA pad+me/ bi sha de bi sha de/ ma hA bi sha de/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ b+ha bo b+ha bA ya/ ta ma haM g+ho re/ tan me bid+ya ma pra yo dza na ya/ sid+d+hiM ku ru/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na
swAhA| bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang / nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi dbang phyug chen
po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des chos brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma
bkum pa skra bsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa
snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo
rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad dang / me tog phreng ba dang / zla gam dang / se mo dos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni gnod
sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing
yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rad
pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang
bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lag na rdo rje la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir
yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / chan sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna
tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing / re re nas gnod sbyin mo
chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o/ /de nas zla ba nya'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang chog 'di nyid dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor ba dag dang / bdug spos
dang / ga pur dang / pog dkar po dang / tsan+dan dang / shing mu sa dag kyang dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag der rang gi
gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / nam mkha' la mchis pa dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid
dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang /
dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so/ /des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su
spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o/ /mchod rten dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dang ba mi
phyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid ba zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te bdag gis ma stsal bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /gal te sangs rgyas la ma dad par gyur pa dang / yid gnyis su
gyur pa gang lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags
pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma le legs so zhes bya
ba byin te/ sring mo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi
'di lta bu 'di dag smras zhing dam bca' ba'ang byas pa ni/ yang khyod legs so/ /khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god nus par 'gyur gyi/ khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna
tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar
bgyi zhing / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyi/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su

gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nI/ tad+ya thA/ oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+ThA d+ha ne/ d+hA na dza ye/ bri bri/ bri d+hA ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri ti ka ri/ nA nA bi bi d+ha/

pa sha bsta/ A yu d+ha d+ha ra ni/ yu yu A yuSh+pa la na/ ta thA ga ta nAM/ sma ra bo d+ha tsit+taM/ ma bi lam+ba/ de hi me ba ra na/ shaM khi ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag lus la
gnas par bgyis na/ de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / gzi brjid 'phel ba dang / longs spyod 'phel pa dang / dbang phyug 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang
du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa phyogs gtsang ma'am/ lha'i gnas su ci 'byor ba'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la bdug spos dang / pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/ dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /
des par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo/ legs so/ /legs
so| |yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ /sring mo/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs
byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'bri ba de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyid
pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar bgyid
pa| dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyon
nam| dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs
ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang /
dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'khrug slong dag lus rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ de'i
yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyi/ de'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ tad+ya thA/

oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+ThA d+ha ne/ d+hA na dza ye/ bri bri/ bri d+hA ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri ta ka ri/ nA nA bi bi d+ha/ ba sha bsta d+ha d+ha ri ni/ yu yu a yuSh+ThA la le/ ta thA ga ta nAM/ sma ra bo d+hi
tsit+taM/ ma bi lam+ba/ de hi me pa ra na/ shaM khi ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin
gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos dang /
spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/ ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis
shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /gang la la bdag rang gi gzugs mthong
bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su
bzung bas tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o//
g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu
mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'chal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang / bgrang phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs
'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gcang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdud dang bcas
pa'i gnas su me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma
dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchong pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa
dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya
rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing / re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzungs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi/ dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang
stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / dus ma lags par
'gum pa bzlog pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams
pa skye ba dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal pa'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
dag la the tshom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang bdag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis
par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| sring mo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yun ring
du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni/ yang khyod legs so/ /sring mo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig /de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab
tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo/ legs
so| |legs so/ /khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo da chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir stsol ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchid ton du bgyid pa des
