bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yi/ khyod kyis ji ltar
bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa'am/
ma dgongs pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa las bsod
nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gos dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser dang /
nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba
dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba
nyid yin zhing / lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang /
yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams
cad las yongs su thar bar kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi ched kyi dpe mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs
'di dang / chos smra ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / gang gi phyir dbyig yungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ me
tog gcig gam/ 'bras bu gcig gam/ ba dan nam/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ spos sam/ gos sam/ rgyan gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ yi ger 'bri
ba'am| yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/ bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par
rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos
dang | me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod par byed/ rje par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chags dang / skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten
'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa de ni/ de pas chos bsod
nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la/ sems can thams cad la sbyin
pa byin zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa'ang de lta ma yin no/ /de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
blon po chen po dang / blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrog par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa
dang / don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas
te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don
'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing / lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang /
bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa gang yin pa de
ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang dag par bshad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshen lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang /
rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po snod du gyur pa/ mchod pa byed pa/ 'dzin par byed pa/ klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dang par 'gyur/
yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang dang / shar dang / nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na'ang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dad par mi byed pa dang / yid
ches par mi byed pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / brjed nges pa dang / bu smad dang / bran mo dang / longs spyod dang /
dbang phyug dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro dang / gar dang / glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing / phrag dog dang / ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed
pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul
rnams las yongs su mi thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag
gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yid la'ang gzung bar bya'o/ /khrag khrug dang / 'khrug
klog dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dag dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gnag nad dang / phyugs na dang / mi nad dag dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang /
gnod pa sna tshogs dag la'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o/ /rgyal mtshan btsugs pa me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra
sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/ der yams kyi nad dang / gnod
pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal la to/ /sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas
gang gsungs shing / /sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhig kun dga' po/ /sangs rgyas chos dang
dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ /gang gis khams gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/ /mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni/ /sbyin pas de yid dper yang mi phod do/ /gang gis sangs rgyas la
ni dad byas te/ /tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur/ /gang zhig me tog gcig
tsam 'thor byed cing / /gos dang phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te/ /ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na/ /bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di la
mchod pa'i phyir/ /kaR+sha pa Ni'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing / /byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/ /byang
chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la/ /ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du/ /bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na/ /de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod
'gyur| |de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang / /sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te/ /mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya/ /bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad
par bya| |rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing / /sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la/ /sems dmyal yi dwags rnams su skye ba na/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod
par gyur ta re/ /'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la/ /yang dang yang du sngam pa 'dod byed cing / /bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur ba zhes/ /byis pa'i blo can phan
tshun rtog ga re/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor 'phrog pa/ /mi zad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing / /phyin
chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med/ /bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med/ /yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med/ /nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan/ /
kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi zad/ /ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas/ /de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi zad myong 'gyur bas/ /sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na/ /
byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dad mi skyed/ /de phyir rtag tu dge slong pha ma dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos khor zug dang / /mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing / /'dzin pa la yang
rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
lags te/ ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
bo| gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'phang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ rgyas par mi byed kyang / des ni khyod kyis nga la
nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid ma yin par yang mi 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang par mi byed/ klog par mi byed/
mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi byed/ yid la mi byed na ni des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos
nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis phu dud byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/ /dI ni phyi ma'i dus
phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri lan pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur to/ /lnga brgyas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags dgu khri ni/ nyon mongs
pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na rigs
kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'bri bar bgyid pa de dag
la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so/ /slad ma'i dus slad
ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / gar dang / bro dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yang ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas yongs su zin cing / mchod par mi bgyid/ ri
mor mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid/ glo ba chos par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid/ nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni ngal
ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas sdug bsngal ba yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / de'ang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/ /de lta lags pas na/ lus dang /
ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ sems can thams
cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags
so| |de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag dang / a la la zhes ca co dang / gzha'i sgra dag dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gi mchod
pa byas nas/ lags so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du
gnas par bgyi pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' po/ de'i phyir khyod
kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa
zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad
dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung can ma dang / 'phrog ma la
sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang / thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus
te gtan la phab pa/ ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya rat+nA lo ka nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa/ seng+ge'i sgra chen
po sgrog pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge
'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po bsod nams mngon bsgrags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan bkod pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan+dan snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka'
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' 'byung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges
par byung ba/ dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba
dang bral ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ khams gsum la ma chags pa/ g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa/ ting
nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa
nyid kyi spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid
du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ji
ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni nam
mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / ma spros pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnas pa med pa ste/ de ltar rtogs par bya'o//
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings
ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/ dngos po gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub kyi rnam pa ni tshad med de/ de ni tshad dang ldan par
bstan par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgyid dam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te
chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byis pa
so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi
bu| gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad
du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa
'di la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo
sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khor ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la
gnas pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na/ bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di la dri bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu/
khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun
tu bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras te/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal/ nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyi/ khyod byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang po la dris shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi
dbang phyug gi rgyal po yin gyi/ bdag la ma srungs shig /yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' kun
tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i dus la da bab par shes na dris shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal
ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i
don ni ma spros pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni
nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no//
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bstan pa 'di ni bstan tu med pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bstan du med na ci zhig bstan/ byang chub
sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bstan du med pa ni btags te bstan to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ btags pas ci zhig 'dogs
par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ btags pas ni dngos po yang mi 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na/ theg pa gsum po dag ji ltar bstan/ byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po lnga mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te spros pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni spros pa
dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub dang / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med
do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ rigs kyi bu/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so/ /legs so
zhes bya ba byin no/ /gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos bstan pa
'di lta bu'i rnam par 'tshal bar mi rung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rnam par dag pa'i sgo
bstan pa 'di legs pas smras lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'di
ni chos thams cad kyi rgya mthun pa yin no/ /'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no/ /de nas shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge mi dmigs/ tshig 'bru mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru mi snang / don kyang mi snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gang lags/ rnam pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags /
mtshan ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid
'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/ de'i phyir
stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba lter na/ nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu| nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa'am/ spyod pa'i byin
gyis brlab par bya pa'i nus pa dang mthu ga la yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shA ra dwa ti'i
bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pas/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci slob pa'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i
mchog yin nam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang
ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na/ de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag
dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod ni rgan rabs thu bo mchog yin gyi/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad
ma zer cig /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci yang thob par mi 'gyur/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de nyid
shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ngan ngon gyis kyang ri brag chen po rnam par 'jig go /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du khyod kyi
spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho po lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de nyid shes par bya
ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bal glang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung dus dul
bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed ga la nus/ de nas bcom ldan
'das la gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi dmus long gis ni bshul du mchi ba'am/ grong khyer mthong
bar yang rngo mi thogs na/ khyim nas khyim du mchi ba'i rngo lta ga la thogs te/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni
dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ da ci bgyir
yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de skad ma zer cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis
sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam
gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye rgu las sems can dgu khri nyis
stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha'
yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi
khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag go /phyogs gcig ji
lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chos kyi blo gros/ khyod de ltar byang
chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas 'di lta ste/ chos thams
cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang /
sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad brjod par bya
ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos
bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mthun par 'di dag
thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las brtsams te sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin
gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thogs pa med pa'i ye
shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chod pa med pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang / kha na ma tho ba
med pa dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / zhum pa med pa dang / 'phrog pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyangs te byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros
kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam
mkha' khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gang
dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang
yin| gang las bsam ste de skad smra/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig /
de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las
dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzhon nur gyur
pa dang / rgyal tshab dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po da dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
ba'i sras dag /'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba'am/ mdzes pa'am/
kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'am/ rgya che ba'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'am/ kun brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'am/ rjes su bstan pa'i
rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngam/ sems can sdug bsngal bdag mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes 'dod cing / thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i
gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las
dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang / mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa
dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dka'
ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la
'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang phrad pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal
'byor tu bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba
yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du
gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa 'thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni sems dang po
bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan
par bya ba'i sems dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang /
kun tu srung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag /'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung ma nod pa dang / kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mang du
thos nas rab tu dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par
dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dus shes par gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mi 'jigs par
gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /don shes par gyur nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar
bar bya'o/ /rmongs pa med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal
ba'i sras dag /'di ni las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa
gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de/ bcu gang
zhe na| 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo
ba med pa nyid dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
nyid du rtog par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir sbyor ba yang mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos
rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par gyur pa yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par dpyod pa
dang / zhing la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang / las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dag 'khor ba la rnam par
dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni
skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la
sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa
nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing /
gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag /'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i las gang ci rtsom yang de thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams
cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar
par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba dang / sems can
thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsol te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa dang / sems can grangs med pa dang / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can
mtshungs pa med pa dang / sems can gzhal du med pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / sems can
rang bzhin med pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang
bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag
pa'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la bsam pa phun
sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa
'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams rgya chung zhes 'chad pa'am/ sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can
zhe'am| sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul sla zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe'am/
chos kyi dbying rgya chung zhe'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce'am/ mi 'jig ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings
med ces 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po med
pa nyid dang / med pa nyid dang / rdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid
du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrog pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing / gong du gnas
gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa bcu thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod do
zhe'am| med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par
'byung ngo zhe'am/ nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am/ ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon to zhe'am/ ma
byon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o zhe'am/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'am/ mi zad do
zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste| kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/
bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /mang ba dang / gcig pa nyid dang / yi ge la don sgro btags pa
dang / don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma med pa sgro
btags pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pas
mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par
'gyur zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/
phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu
yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par sgrub
pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/
'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ dus ji lta ba
bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhon nur gyur
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang / sangs rgyas
kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi
zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas gang dag
thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di
la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa
yin| nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la
mkhas pa yin/ chos nyid rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la
mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs par bya ba la
mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod
par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kun tu dpyad pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur
ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par sgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub kyi
gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni rgyal tshab gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la dbang
bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon par sgrub
pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis rlob
pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba byed pa mang ba yin
sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems
can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed
pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag /rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man chad gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi las shes par
mi nus| ngag gi las shes par mi nus/ yid kyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das pa'i dus la rnam
par lta ba shes par mi nus/ zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus/ blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ sems kyi yul shes par mi nus/ ye shes kyi spyod yul shes
par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / chos kyi
dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed
pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni dbang bskur
ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam
par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'ur
'ur| rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem che ma/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem che ma mo/ /'khrug /rab tu 'khrug /kun tu rab tu 'khrug
go /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab pa/ lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi
char yang mngon par bab po/ lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i pad+ma'i
sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan phreng gi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma bkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /lha'i snang ba
yang rab tu byung ngo / /lha'i nga ro yang grag go /gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos
bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste/ lhag chad med do/ /tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don nyid ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi
rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bdag cag kyang ming chos
kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas
'dir phyin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis de dag thams cad du yang tshes bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te/ lhag chad
med do| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to/ /bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin
pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyin par gyur to// //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ /mdzes
shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa/ /rnyed dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /do zla
med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /kun brjod bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang / /sdug bsngal bzod glags 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog
byed| |yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi/ /byang chub don du brtan pa
sems 'jog byed/ /gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang / /rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang / /gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir//
byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/ /dge dang mi dge las rnams gang yod pa/ /de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /
byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /ting 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang / /de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa/ /de dag gnas skabs rtogs par
bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/ /ci 'dra ci 'dra de yi de dang der/ /rim pa de dag rtogs par bya
ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang / /lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad rnam gsum nas/ /bstan bcos du ma rtogs par
bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams/ /gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi/ /khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs
par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems de 'jog /chos 'dir kun tu 'gro bar gang gyur cing / /dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa/ /yang dag rang bzhin rtogs
par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang / /sems can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes/ /chags med mig ni
rab tu dbye ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na/ /sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang / /sngon gyi gnas rnams
rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /ji ltar 'gro ba sems can 'ching byed pa/ /kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i/ /nyon mongs zad pa
rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten gsum na tha snyad gang btags dang / /ngag la ma sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa/ /brda yi bden pa
rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste/ /stong pa mig yor rang bzhin ngo bo nyid//
don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang / /rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrug pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs kyis rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'od zer rtse mo re las 'od zer rnams/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu
'gyed| |de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa/ /de dag rang gi lag tu mngon
sprul te| |sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun/ /gnod pa med par lag pa'i
mthil bzhag nas/ /chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa/ /skra rtse'i thigs pa'i
nang du 'jug par byed/ /ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi grangs/ /gang yod de
dag ma lus bgrang byed cing / /phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'jig rten 'di na 'das dang de bzhin du/ /ma 'ongs sreg
pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa rnams/ /bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /
ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams//
skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab
pa| |skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ /rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams
rnams su/ /skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa brtan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten kun gyi sgra
rnams ci 'dra ba/ /skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing / /zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten gsum
po ma lus rtogs par byed/ /sems can kun gyi rab tu rnam par shes/ /lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems
'jog byed/ /zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang / /skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed/ /rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du
brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhig rang byung gi /chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i
phyir| |byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams/ /rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul byed cing / /yid las byung ba de dag rtogs bya'i
phyir| |byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/ /ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog /sems kyi skad cig
gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med/ /tshig rab
dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba/ /sems kyi
skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam/ /ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa
med| |dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin/ /gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su
rgyu byed cing / /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig rten tha dad par/ /'jig rten bdag por rgyal ba'i sras
'byung ba/ /gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrog par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /byang chub don tu srid par spyad spyod tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyar gang yin pa/ /de
yi bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /chos mchog chos rab phul tu phyin pa dang / /khyad par 'phags chos bla med gang yod pa/ /de dag byang
chub sems dpa' rnams la ston/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /tshe nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan med pa/ /'di na byang chub
sems dpa' sbyor bar byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad 'gyur ci 'dra ba/ /byang chub
sems dpa' de la ston par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang / /de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa
rnams| |de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
rab bskor ba/ /'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya/ /shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang / /ngan song sa rnams
dag tu gnod gyur pa'i/ /gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig byang chub don du sems 'jog pa/ /de ni
dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bstan/ /bslab pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin des byas pa/ /ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin/ /nad bral rnams kyis bstan pa ji bzhin
du| |'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir/ /de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa/ /'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no/ /phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde/ /gnyen
dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang / /kun tu srung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems/ /slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems/ /de 'dra dag la sems
gnas gyur pa de/ /lung nod kha ton byed par sbyang bar bya/ /mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug /mngon par gyur nas dge bshes sten du gzhug /dge bshes rnams la
bka' blo bde bar bya/ /dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya/ /dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya/ /'jigs pa med nas don la brtson par bya/ /don shes gyur nas
de bzhin chos brjod bya/ /chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya/ /rmongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya/ /'di ni
dang po'i las can brjod pa ste/ /byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste/ /'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras/ /byang chub
sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor/ /mi rtag pa nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang / /bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang / /de
bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang / /mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang / /'di dag thams cad rtogs pa med yin par/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rtog par
byed| |sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang / /rtag par bya phyir de ni gzengs kyang bstod/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas mu med ces/ /de ltar de ni dpyod du
gzhug par bya/ /'di na sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang / /phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /
de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug /rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba/ /de ni sangs rgyas sras po sbyor byed
la| |phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa/ /bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed/ /blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos
po rtogs/ /dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyes/ /de ni rang gi sa las yongs mi ldog /sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye/ /rtag tu chos la nges par
sems dang ldan/ /sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod/ /las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang / /rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das/ /rnam
par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes/ /de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brjod/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang / /ma byon dag kyang chos rnams
rnam dpyad nas/ /grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang / /rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni/ /dus gsum mnyam
nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes/ /nam yang mnyam nyid bye phrag 'phyed mi byed/ /de ni dus gsum tha dad med par 'jug /gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba/ /de na byang chub sems
dpa' bzhi ba ste/ /'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de/ /byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par
brjod pa yin/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ /bsod nams las dag brtsams pas mthar phyin byed/ /de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang / /'jig rten kun gyi rten
du 'gyur pa dang / /phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob byed dang / /snying brtse ba dang skye rgu dgrol 'gyur byed/ /'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'dren par byed cing rab tu dang
par byed/ /sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang che/ /'jig rten thams cad tha ma med pa dang / /de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs
med dang / /mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang / /stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang
snying brtser ldan/ /de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste/ /yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyis bstan/ /de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang / /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa
med| |shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /spyod
pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang / /sems can chung ngam yang na che 'o zhes/ /thos par gyur kyang bsam las nur ba med/ /sems can nyon mongs can nam rnam dag
gam| |gdul sla zhe 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am/ /chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe'am/ /'jig par 'gyur zhe'am chags par 'gyur zhe 'am/ /chos dbyings yod
ce'am med ces thos gyur kyang / /dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/ /nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de/ /sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin
tu nges| |mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / /dngos med rang bzhin rdzun zhing dben pa dang / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig yor 'dra ba yi/ /chos mchog zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan
par byed/ /de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod/ /'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe
na'am phyir mi ldog /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe'am ma 'das zhes/ /ma byon ce 'am ma byon ma yin zhe'am/ /byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam/ /de bzhin mtshan nyid
gcig gam mtshan nyid med/ /gcig dang tha dad rnam pa rnam pa dang / /don dam tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa/ /thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du/ /mi ldog byang
chub sems dpa' yid byed ces/ /mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang / /mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang / /rnam par bye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams/ /thos nas 'di
la mthar thug 'jug par byed/ /gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing /
ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston/ /pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtog byed cing / /de dag rnams kyi mos pa dpyod par byed/ /sems can dpyod dang rjes su mthun chos dang / /zhing
rnams 'jig dang 'chags pa rnams kyang shes/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shes thob/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed/ /bde gshegs bsngags pa'i
chos rnams thos nas kyang / /de la de ni nur bar 'gyur ba med/ /yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang / /de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam dpyod dang / /ji ltar skad cig grangs
med 'go 'gyur ba/ /zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya/ /de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed/ /lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston/ /de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'byams
klas dang / /skad cig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gang yin pa/ /sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji
bzhin shes/ /de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang / /spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang / /tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang / /'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon
mtha' dang / /brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag /ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin/ /pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshang 'byin te/ /de yang ji ltar kun tu spyad
pa dang / /gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang / /pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang / /dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang / /byin gyi rlabs dang gzhan
gnod ci 'dra dang / /chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste/ /'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin/ /de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste/ /ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan
du 'gyur ba med/ /tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na/ /tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs/ /dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste/ /thu bo khyad
'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can/ /skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung / /'di ni bsam pa bgrangs pas rtogs ma yin/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di
'dra ste| |'di na sems can la las zhing rnams kun/ /phra rab rdul du glags nas ma lus bgrang / /grangs med 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed pa/ /de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems
dpa' shes/ /'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi/ /sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems
de skye| |thog mar byang chub sems zhes gang brjod pa/ /de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de/ /'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na/ /de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ba shad pa
legs par smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na/ gang dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
te| de dag nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni/
de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la la zhig gis rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzigs su gsol/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur pa yang ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang
dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig /chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la 'i zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der
sgrogs shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas/ brgya byin
dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di skad brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad
cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang bstan par 'gyur gyi/ 'du bar gyis shig /khyod phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag /mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du
'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad
