du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi cang mi gsung bar gyur bas gnang ba mdzad do/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan
gsum du gsol ba btab na yang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang la la dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'debs pa
de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis
go bar mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod song la 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la gsol ba thob cig/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shing blag sha dang / sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar
'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dang dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs
pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gang yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ kho bo ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nus so/ /'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chung ngur 'dug cig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo nyan gyi/ khyod
kyi sa shod cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyi go bar byas so/ /de nas de'i
tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to/ /
rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /chos 'dod pa rnams dang / chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo mang po yang 'dus par gyur
to| |dge slong gi 'khor dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang /
'thab bral gyi 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og
min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa
'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa
dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran brtan dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung

dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs
pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to/ /khams kyi rgyal
po dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags/ de
ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ /song la 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gsol ba thob cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu /
dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di nyan par 'gyur ba su yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
skyong ba rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ste/ kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos nyan pa 'di dag ni sgyu ma byung ba sha stag na kho bos su la chos bshad/ nyan pa ni su yin/ 'chad pa ni su yin/ gnas brtan gyis
smras pa| skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig /kho bos mnyan to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/
smras pa| 'jam dpal/ bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ smras pa/ 'jam
dpal| stong pa nyid ni tshig med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te stong pa nyid tshig med pa yin na/ ci zhig bshad par bya/ btsun pa
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa yin te/ de dag ni bstan du med cing mnyan du med do/ /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ji lta bu bstan pa
de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma med pa bstan pa/ smon pa med pa bstan pa/ blang ba med pa bstan pa/ dor ba med pa bstan pa/ spros pa med pa bstan pa ste/ ma spros
pa bstan pa yin no/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga' nas mgrin
gcig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do zhes legs so/ zhes bya ba byin no/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar
gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor/ gzungs 'di ni skye ba med
par yid la bya'o/ /dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / dor ba med par yid la bya'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi drug cu
rtsa gnyis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal
mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ji 'dra ba zhig lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi
gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can tshul
khrims 'chal ba yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can thams
cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang dag par brjod pa
'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no/ /
rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya'o/ /'dre ba med pa mang du bya'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba
dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs
bshad du gsol/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / thugs brtse ba mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i
dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spro ba su yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong
dang | byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po
dang | byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa'
nor bu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rtag tu lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / byang chub
sems dpa' tsan+dan dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang /
byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu
dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdal ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag
tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i
snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi gdugs snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon
'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa dang rna ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan
'das| slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang dag
par bshad par spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'di ni bya
dka' ba ste| go cha 'di 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar gyur pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa chen po'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te
sngags bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM maM/ b+ha ra Te b+ha ra Te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra na
te swAhA| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos zhes lan gnyis lan gsum gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos chos zhes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don to/ /gzhi med pa'i don to/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to/ /chos
thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha'i gzhi'i don to/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don te/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i
gzhi'i don to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dkon mchog ta la le'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ /de skad ces
smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung ba dang /
kun tu gzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni
'di 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid
do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams
yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
smras so| |kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi dang byi la thams cad dam/ wa thams cad kyis
kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa gcig gi
mtha' yang rtog par mi nus na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta ci smos/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyong ba mdzad par de
bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/ chos smra
ba de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i
chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag la bdud
dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig
mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur pa las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang gang dag
mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni so thags ngan par 'gyur/ lce dang sna med par gyur/ rkang lag phyi phyogs su 'gyur/
lus nad pu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal/ 'di dag ni mi gti mug pa de dag gi
skyon du 'gyur ba'o/ /'jam dpal/ mdor bshad na/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go /gal te mir
skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la lus 'dze can du 'gyur/ mchu
'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ lus zhom par 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'gyur/ lus skam por 'gyur/ yi dwags 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang mi gti mug pa
de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ kha rog de skad ma 'dri zhig /'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
rten myos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di ltar chos nas slan chad kyang dam pa'i
chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
'jam dpal/ sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba yod pa'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun tu 'bar dang / rab tu 'bar dang / reg dka' dang /
drag po dang / mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu lum dang / lcags kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bstod dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab 'bar dang /
rul pa dang / rtag tu dri nga dang / rab 'joms dang / nges 'joms dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal/ mi gti mug ba de gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can
dmyal ba ni 'di dag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos
nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po/ khyod kyis zhu ba de legs par zhus so/ /kun tu bzang po/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan
par skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon
du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med/ dpag tu med de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po/ 'di lta bu chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste/ 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan
dngags sbyar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos so zhes
'dzer cing de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro/ /spangs nas kyang mthol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar
pa mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po
dang / bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro/ /gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe
rabs thams cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / ltag sgur dang / 'jing pa nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang /
rtag tu bkres shing skom pas nyen pa dang / lus bskams pa dang / kham nam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ thos na yang yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo snga 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la khros pa'i
sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar
shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa dang / ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ de nas nyan thos chen po de
dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag spangs nas bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu sngangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed
kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so/ /grogs po dag /nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/ gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag /
chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ sus kyang rnam par dkrugs par mi nus na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan
dag gis lta ga la nus te ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /dper na/ dkon mchog
za ma tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/
'di ni legs par gsungs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| 'jam dpal/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs pa
gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa'am/ tha na dge 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal gcig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo / /de
nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam/ ring pa
lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kha rog de skad ma 'dri zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtshams med pa lnga po dag ni
bla'i| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir
skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par
'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /e ma'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal
lo| |las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma gyur cig/ //bam po gsum pa| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de snyam ma sems shig /ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na/ 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi
bgo skal la spyod pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi /de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/ /
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngas ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gro
ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing / 'phags
pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang / log par lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung
ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems can
gcig gi don du yang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i/ /sems can gcig po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /
snyam ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs
bzang pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu la
sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te du zhing smre sngags 'don to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu gcig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni ma
yin no| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon
mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye
po'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs ni ma gnas te/ ma skyes/ ma 'gags/ 'gag par mi 'gyur ro//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te/ mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de
dag ni yod pa ma yin no/ /dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros
pa med pa'o/ /'on kyang sems can rnams dang mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams mthun par 'jug go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la
bsnyel ba mi mnga'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog dang / phul dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa
dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o/ /rab tu byung ba'am/ khyim pa'ang rung ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do//
gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de dag gi lce ni dpag
tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag lnga
brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ mi gti mug pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs
rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o/ /me tog dang /
bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /bsti stang bgyi'o//
bla mar bgyi'o/ /ri mor bgyi'o/ /mchod par bgyi'o/ /brjed par bgyi'o/ /gsol ba bgyi'o/ /bsti stang bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de'i slad du zhe
na| de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras te/ chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os dang / phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/ /de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kyang lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang / phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |rigs kyi bu/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di
legs par smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /
yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu/ tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /gzhan la phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshig ldan
pa| |shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog /yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs smras/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob bo/ /chos
gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang / rlom sems med pa ste/ kun tu bzang po/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis so/ /
kun tu bzang po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la dbang po gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / dkon mchog
ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye rgu las sems can dpag tu med pas gzungs thob par gyur to/ /dkon mchog ta la la'i
gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri
bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe sems can
mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la
zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/ lce na bar mi 'gyur/ sna na bar mi 'gyur/ so na bar mi 'gyur/ lag pa dang rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur/ klad pa
na bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur/ lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang mi ma
yin pa thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//
kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad pa'i tshe bdud bar chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo/ gang gi tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du
'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun tu 'bar bar mthong ste/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo/ /kun dga' bo/ sa phyogs
gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs gang
na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad du mchis shing mchis nas kyang sngar de bzhin gshegs
pa la phyag bgyis nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na/ nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta
bu bkol te nga la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa
yin mod kyi/ kun dga' bo/ ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin po che dkon mchog ta la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong na su mchis/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ mi'i 'jig rten dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
pa spyod pa na ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa brtsegs pa'i snying po gser bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las
mngon du thos te/ kun dga' bo/ bya dka' ba chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma myong nas ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung bstan to//
kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la/ phyis nga la phyag 'tshal cig /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag
thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /a la la chos/ a la la chos/ chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la la'o/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di'i ming thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta
smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la kye grogs po dag/
khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma
thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus long gis nyi ma'i snang ba mi mthong ba dang / ji ltar tshong pa thabs mi shes pa dang / ji ltar mi dbul po gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra ste/ de dag gi don du
ngas dpe 'di dag byas na/ ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang / sems can thams cad
kyi don du nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod spro'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi
stan las langs ma thag tu de nas de'i mdo la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu
'gul| kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem
chem mo| |'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sor mo bcu
thal mo sbyar te du zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spro lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khyod
ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi steng du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/
ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras
thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa dang / phul yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /'di ni nga'i ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /dus
dus su bsti stang gyis shig /rin po che'i sngon du chug la phrag la thogs shig /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni khyod la rjes
su bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu| kha rog de skad ma 'dri zhig /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ sems can mang po la sman par bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
gsol| bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po bshad kyi nyen cig /'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'di lta bu dang / 'jam dpal
dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan
thong la| phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /kun tu bzang po/ rab tu byung ba dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la chags pa/ gnas la chags pa/
lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de dag 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po/ mi gti mug pa de lta bu dag gi don du ngas mdo 'di
yongs su gtad kyi/ mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar
bgyi'o| |chos smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsti stang du bgyi'o/ /btsun par bgyi'o/ /rim gro bgyi'o/ /mchod pa bgyi'o/ /brjod par bgyi'o/ /gsol ba
bgyi'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par skul ba'i
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /yon tan pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi /yon tan kun bshad thams cad nga la nyon/ /nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la/ /dga' zhing mgu ba'i
yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ma ga d+ha 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung / /rang byung mi yi seng+ge bzhugs zhes grags/ /ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas/ /shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na
bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu zhing rdul snyed dang de thabs cig /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dpa' bo bskor/ /sangs rgyas phal chen zhes bya'o ting nge 'dzin/ /ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas/ /
mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu shar gyi phyogs logs nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul snyed lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung
'ongs| |de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas/ /sangs rgyas sras po dpal zhes bya ba kun/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed dang lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lhags par gyur/
der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa/ /'jam dpal grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal gyis dris/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ci/
de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ /rlog pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang / /bden yangs yon tan ldan gyi spyod yul gtsang / /sems can dam
pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang / /rgyal bas bsten pa bdag gis 'dir smras kyi/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan dang / /spyod pa
gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /yon tan mtha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya/ /rgya
mtsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin tu chung / /byang chub gzhir gyur ba yi rang byung sems/ /thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te/ /mtshungs
med kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams/ /bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi /yon tan chu bo
zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod bya ste/ /mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang / /sa chen rnams las
rdul phran gcig dang mtshungs/ /byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma yin gyi na ma yin gyi/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la/ /dad dang dang ba bskyed nas
sems skye ste/ /de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang / /bdag la bde dang snyan dang grags phyir min/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems
skye'o| |rtag tu sems can phan pa bya phyir dang / /zhing rnams sbyang dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / /chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang / /ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems
de skye| |rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang / /dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas/ /bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye/ /rgyal dang
rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing / /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed la/ /byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas/ /skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag
gyur pa rnams/ /bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing / /chos dang de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la/ /bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o/ /dad pa sngon 'dren ma
ltar skyed pa ste/ /yon tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed/ /dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams las sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin/ /dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems
dang byed/ /nga rgyal spang zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog /lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed/ /dad pa
rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed/ /dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar
byed| |dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi rdzi zhing / /nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin/ /dad pa rang byung yon tan rnams kyang tshol/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags
pa med| |mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin/ /dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing / /thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin/ /yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul
pa| |dad pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed/ /ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin/ /dad pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi/ /de
la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag tshul
khrims bslab pa yod mi 'dor/ /gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'dor ba/ /yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod/ /tshul khrims byang chub sems bstod byed pa ste/ /slob pa'i
sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyor/ /tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa/ /de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal la
mchod pa rgya chen byed/ /gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas dad pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu chos la dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan ngoms pa med/
gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa/ /de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dad gus pa/ /de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin/ /gang dag mi ldog dge
'dun rab dad pa/ /de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur/ /gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa'i/ /de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal/ /gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal
ba| |de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/ /gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs ba/ /de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su bzung / /gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs
bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen gsog par byed/ /gang dag dge ba rgya chen gsog byed pa/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po rgyu stobs gang ldan pa/ /de dag mos
pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur/ /gang dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin brlabs/ /gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems
kyang skye| |gang dag byang chub don du sems skye ba/ /de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/ /de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/
gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/ /de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs/ /mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa/ /de dag dad dang bsam
pa rnam par dag /gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa/ /de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog /gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa
spyod| |gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs/ /gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub pas mchod/ /gang dag
sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi phyed/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /gang dag
sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba/ /de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /de dag bar skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur//
gang dag bar skabs chos las mi nyams pa/ /de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /gang
dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod/ /gang dag 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa/ /de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /gang dag snying rje
chen po'i rtsa brtan pa/ /de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ /gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can/ /de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor/ /gang dag 'dus byas skyon
gyis yal bor ba/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /gang dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson/ /gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson
pa| |de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang dag 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo ba/ /de dag brtun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /gang dag brtun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag mngon shes
rnam par dag pa skyes/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam par dag skyes pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs/ /gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed
mkhas| |'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas/ /'gro ba sdud shes cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /gang dag bsdu ba'i
dngos po bzhir brtson pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed/ /gang dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa/ /de dag shes rab thabs la brten pa yin/ /gang dag shes rab thabs la brten
gyur pa| |dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/ /dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa/ /de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/ /gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa/ /
de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das/ /gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa/ /de dag mi ldog sa ni rjes su thob/ /gang dag mi ldog sa ni thob gyur pa/ /de
dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin/ /gang dag mi skye bzod pa thob gyur pa/ /'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung bstan to/ /'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun dang
mngon sum gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/ /de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga mkhas/ /rgyas gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs
pa yin| |gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas
lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod nams mchog gis gang lus rnams sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis
mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /gang dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa/ /de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras/ /gang dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang spras pa/ /de dag lus kyi
'od ni mtha' yas so/ /gang dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag 'od las pad+ma rnams kyang
'byung / /gang dag 'od las pad+ma rnams 'byung ba/ /de dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul
bar byed/ /gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul
mtha' yas so/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab
tshim par byed/ /gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa/ /de dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten
sems can 'dul/ /gang dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes
su 'brang / /gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed/ /
gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa/ /de dag tshig rnams rngod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo / /gang
dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems
kyis rnam par shes/ /gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang
'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing / /nyon mongs rgyu ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab tu phye bas
'jig rten rgyu/ /gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la
gnas| |gang dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa/ /de dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas
pa rjes su thob/ /gang dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur
thams cad ma lus nod par byed/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa/ /de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /
phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to/ /gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba/ /mthu brtan de dag nam mkha' lta bur
ni| |ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas/ /mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun gnas pa/ /mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lhar
bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par yod mi nus/ /mtshungs med gang dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa/ /de dag brtun pa kun dang mthong
ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do/ /gang dag brtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin pa sbyin byed kyi/ /sbyin pa thams cad
don yod 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus/ /chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge ba'i las lam rab tu spyod 'gyur te/ /dkon mchog mthu yang
dam pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje mkhregs pa'i rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams/ /mi zad mi 'grib 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha'
yas yon tan chu/ /gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur ba/ /der ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston/ /phyogs rnams gang na chos kyang med gyur pa/ /phyogs der chos kyi gter
ni ston par byed/ /de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtog cing / /de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu/ /zla ba lta bur snang ba rab ston cing / /thabs stong dag
gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de nas skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang / /ring
bsrel rab tu rgyas pa'ang dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa/ /sangs rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed
cing / /theg gsum sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mos pa kun gyis sgrub pa shes pa rnams/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med lus rnams dang / /lha mi lha min klu dang gnod
sbyin dang / /grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos/ /dpa' bo de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang / /rtags dang spyod dang sgra
skad 'jug pa dag /ji snyed thams cad ma lus ston par byed/ /de dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod pa byed/ /gang dag zhing bkod
bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yas so/ /gang dag
'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yas pa/ /de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyis rnam par 'phrul ba bsam mi khyab/ /gang
dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /
gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / /bzod brtson rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos/ /bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dang
shes rab dang / /thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /de dag phra rab rdul 'jug ting nge 'dzin/ /rdul rnams kun la mngon
par sgrub byed cing / /rdul gcig steng na zhing rnams bsam mi khyab/ /ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/ /rdul de'i steng du sangs rgyas bcu'i zhing dang / /sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang
kha cig ston/ /nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa kha cig dang / /yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/ /zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang / /la la steng g.yogs med dang mthun pa
dang / /la la 'chol ba smig rgyu lta bu dang / /la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams/ /ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa/ /de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston/ /drang srong ting
'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ /grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra 'o/ /de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed
cing / /lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas bkang ste/ /skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed/ /phyogs bcu dag na me tog phreng ba dang / /spos byug rin chen rin che ji snyed pa/ /de dag
byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'byin/ /gos dang phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /
gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla re rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs/ /phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang / /drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os
ba| |de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing / /byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod/ /phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa/ /rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi wang dang //
sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrog /phyogs bcu kun gyi dpe zla med rnams kyi/ /yang dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang / /
bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs pa/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrog /'od zer gang dag las dges yongs bsags pa/ /lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed
byed cing / spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du/ /'debs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod/ /'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i rgyan phreng bsam yas rab
'chang ba/ /pad+ma mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag /lag nas rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/ /me tog phal chen me tog bla re dang / /me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /me tog sna
tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /bdug pa phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang / /bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kun
tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen spos dang spos kyi bla re dang / /spos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram

byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phreng ba phal cher phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid

chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang / /phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phye ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /na
bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re dang / /na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /na bza' sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen gdugs
dang gdugs kyi bla re dang / /gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal
ba mchod/ /rin chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang / /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /
pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang / /pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /pad+ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyan phreng phal chen
rgyan phreng bla re dang / /rgyan phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyal mtshan mchog bkod
'od zer rab bkye ste/ /de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ /du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan par byed/ /nor bu'i dra ba sna
tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs/ /dar gyi lnga ldi ba dan rab dpyangs shing / /dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin/ /lag pa'i
mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams/ /rgyal ba gcig la de dag byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba ma lus kun la de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro
ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing / /bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo/ /thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /kha cig de
bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang / /sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang / /bzod pa mi bzod mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang / /kha cig
brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang / /bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang / /don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang / /spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i
gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang / /bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang / /bden dang brten dang rnam par thar sgo dang / /kha
cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang / /nyan thos theg pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang / /skyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang / /theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang / /kha cig mi
rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang / /zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul/ /'gro ba'i spyod
pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te/ /de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /gang dag kun tu rnam thar
sgo dag nas/ /bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag sus kyang mchan mar gzung mi nus/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra
'o| |de dag dga' ba bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa/ /dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ /bsam pa bstan nas sems
can 'dul par byed/ /gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang / /bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa/ /der ni kun gyis bsam bzhin bya ba yis/ /sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro
ba'i don rnams byed/ /de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang / /gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang / /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas/ /sbyin la
mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/ /brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing / /gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te/ /phreng bas spud cing spos kyis bskul
ba yi| |gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la/ /blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba/ /
gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing / /gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag ka la ping+ka'i sgra snyan dang / /khu byug ku nal ngang pa'i sgra skad dang / /
rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas/ /rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye brag sgo
mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ /don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed/ /bya ba kun
la grogs su gyur byas shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing / /'gro
ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/ /gang na mngon 'byung med cing chos med de/ /dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /der ni rgyal srid
'byor pa rab spangs te/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung / /de dag khyim dang 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ /'dod
pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang / /drang srong
rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par/ /yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /gang na sems can dpag med che ldan zhing / /bde bar ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /der ni rga bas
nyen cing nad bu can/ /bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston/ /'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la/ /'jig rten gti mug me chen rab
'bar zhing / /rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i/ /'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang / /chos kyi khyad par
bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas/ /
gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs tshul
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin/ /dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu/ /de dag snyan mngags
mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /zhags mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang / /sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun tu
ston| |grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag 'gyur/ /rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang / /sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos
cho ga mkhas/ /de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod sbyin sdong po dang / /lam gol dong ba rnams la lam
ston 'gyur/ /'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmos chos tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten
rjod par byed/ /'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang / /sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun/ /drang srong de dag
rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba/ /drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang / /mkhas pa de dag
rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can/ /gdung ba gau ta ma dang mi smrar spyod/ /gcer bu gos med lhur lan dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi slob dpon
mkhas par ston/ /de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang / /bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang / /ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba
yin| |nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dwags spyod/ /gle'u can dag dang mu stegs sum cu pa/ /de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /
lha yi shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang / /mu stegs nye reg yul du rgyu rnams su/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang / /bsam yas chos la de dag
dam pa mchog /tsog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba dang / /tsher ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang / /gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang / /de dag tu yang de dag slob
dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing / /bsnyen dka' mi zad drag shul dka' thub kyis/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug
bsngal spang bar 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis/ /de dag rnams
la bden pa ston par byed/ /la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag
la lha yi gsang tshig gis/ /la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / /don la rnam nges rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang / /bstan bcos thub
med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang / /klu yi nges
tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/ /la la srin po 'byung po sha za dang / /dri za grul bum lto 'phye che tshig dang / /mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar par
'dren pa byed/ /de dag bden dang dres tshig tshul shes te/ /de ltar rgyal pa'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin
rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ //bsam po bzhi pa ste/ /tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab
bkye ste| |'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med
ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing / /chos kyang yongs su bstan te lam bstan cing / /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod
rten bstan byas pas/ /des na mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi/ /'od zer 'od byed ces bya ba gtong zhing / /rdul dang mun pa thams
cad bsal byas te/ /'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir
sgron bzung bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang / /rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang / /spos dang
bcud len rin chen sgron ma dag /rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob/ /sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag
sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go cha gyon/ /gang dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go gyon pa/ /de
dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong khyer ston/ /stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru 'byin te/ /'dus byas sun byung
zhi ba bsngags byas pas/ /des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /'dod pa'i
yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing / /chos la mos pa'i ro ni don du gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/ /chos mos ro la don du gnyer gyur pas/ /bdud rtsi'i char
pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten skom pa'i sred pa rnam par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa chu dong dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa smad
cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/ /des na sred pa sel ba grub par gyur/ /dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/
dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa
rnams byas shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pas/ /des na dga' byed 'od zer grub par gyur/ /mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang
dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing / /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu 'o/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing / /chos la
dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med thob/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs
mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas la/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas/ /des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par gyur/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od
zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed/ /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin
de byed tshe/ /slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ /bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par
gyur| |ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis khong
du chud| |chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/ /don la nges pa'i ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na/ /des na ye shes ldan de'i 'od zer
grub| |shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos
la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing / /rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag /bstan pas shes rab
sgron ma de grub po/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhes/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi zad mdzod kyi gzungs ni thob gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan btags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrungs byas shing / /'gro ba chos kyis rjes su bzung byas pas//
chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par gyur/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul pas/ /longs spyod mi rtag mi brtan
shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur/ /ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can/ /nor rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'drar shes nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis
sbyin pa spel byas pas/ /des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /tshul
khrims rnam par dag la gnas gyur nas/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /dag ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul khrims la yang sems can mang 'dzud
cing | |byang chub sems kyang yang dag 'dzin 'jug pas/ /yongs gdung med pa'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi bzod sems can gang dag
des bskul ba/ /khro dang tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / /de dag rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig ldan rnams kyi nyes byas bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrugs
pa ma byas shing / /bstod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pas/ /des na bzod pa bkod pa de grub bo/ /sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /le lo'i sems can kyi
gang dag des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyon med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson pa
dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te/ /byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/ /sems
can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs bzung bas/ /des na sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od
thob bo| |zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rnam 'khrugs sems can gang dag des bskul pa/ /de dag chags med sdang med rmongs med cing / /rtogs par gyur
nas mnyam bzhag sems su 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan spyod can dang / /'dre ba yongs su rnam par spangs byas te/ /dgon pa rab zhi bsam gtan bsngags
brjod pas/ /des na zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub bo/ /shes rab bkod pa 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /shes 'chal sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /bden dang rten dang rnam
thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud 'gyur/ /bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud cing / /nyi ma'i sgron
me'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste/ /byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pas/ /chos
de gus par byas nas rab bshad pas/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /
sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam yas rnams/ /pad+ma dam pa rnams la bzhugs par mthong / /sangs rgyas che dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas
brjod byas shing / /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas/ /des ni sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jigs nyen
sems can gang dag des reg pa/ /'byung po gza' dang gsad brdeg bcing ba dang / /nad 'go 'jigs pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang
bskyabs dang / /srog chags bsod las bzlog pa byas pa dang / /'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas las/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /bde ba
kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /nad pa na ba gang dag des reg pa/ /rnam pa kun tu nad kyi sdug bsngal thar/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob/ /nad gsos 'bras
bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom byin pas de thob bo/ /sangs
rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /tshe zad tha mar gang dag des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs
shing 'gro/ 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ /dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / /'chi khar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas
ston pa'i 'od zer de thob bo/ /chos rab brjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos nyan klog cing yi ger 'bri ba byed/ /de
dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing / /'dun pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis
zhes| |brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten gsum
na sgra rgyud ji snyed pa/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsang bstod sgra yis drang srong che bstod de/ /rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don tu sil snyan dang / /sgra chen
dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la/ /rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub bo/ /'chi med sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pas/ /
bag med spyod pa thams cad rab spangs te/ /yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang / /'gog pa
rtag tu bde zhing zhi skyed ces/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob po/ /khyad par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi
tshul khrims khyad par dang / /ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thos/ /thub chen rgyal po'i khrims kyi mchog gyur cing / /ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces/ /
byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags brjod pas/ /des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des
bskul byas pa/ /rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul/ /skye bo nyon mongs
