rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/ /rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur/ /spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems
can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi
dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag /byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo/ /
sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /sil snyan bsgrags shing spos kyis bdugs pa yis/ /pho
brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/ /sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing / /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs
mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /des na sna tshogs bkod pa grub par 'gyur/ /shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par
byed| |mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/ /des na shin tu dang byed 'od grub po/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs
sprin rnams kun tu gnas/ /mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pas/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob/ /lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /gcer
bu gos yod rgyan dang ldan par gyur/ /gos dang bgo ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs dag /sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub/ /ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /
bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab
gtong zhing / /dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/ /dkon mchog gsum la gter bzhi'i mi zad pa/ /dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo/ /mig rnams
sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /de tshe long ba sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/ /
rna ba rnams sbyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna sbyong 'od zer
grub| |sna rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sngon chad mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /spos rab phul bas
sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lce rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod/ /mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnam spangs te/ /'jam par
smras pas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lus rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams
dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /lus btud byas pas lus rnams sbyong ba thob/ /sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan
par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na/ /sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /gzugs rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi
dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku mthong ste/ /sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyong 'od grub bo/ /sgra rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer
rab gtong zhing / /sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes/ /rkyen las byung bas brag ca 'dra 'o zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po/ /dri rnams sbyong ba'i
'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/ /spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin/ /ro
bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de
yin| |reg rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /reg na rtsu ba pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char/ /phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal
'gyur| |bcos bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs bshul bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang / /phreng ba bla re
phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /chos rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /byung
ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim/ /rkyen las byung bas ma skyes ngo bo nyid/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste/ /chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnas so zhes/ /brjod pas chos
rnams sbyong ba thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste/ /kun kyang las sbyor tha dad
tshul can no/ /ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ba/ /ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /
yon tan gang gis 'od zer gang grub pa'i/ /yon tan de grogs sngon chad gang gyur pa/ /de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste/ /drang srong ye shes rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /de
dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la/ /rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pas/ /de
dag kun gyis 'od zer de dag shes/ /gang dag bsod nams byas shing dge bsags dang / /gang dag yang yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan
'dun te don gnyer ba/ /de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul/ /dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang / /de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char/ /mig dang ldan
pas shar bar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/ /rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing / /mos
nyams phal pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /dper rgyan nor bu bzhon pa gzhal med khang / /bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug
pa spos| |de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi/ /phongs par gyur pa rnams la de dag med/ /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag mod/ /de dag yod kyang log par nyen gyur cing / /
mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas/ /dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni
yon tan che rgyur mi 'gyur zhes/ /de dag dogs dang som nyi mi skyed do/ /de dag g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnam 'phrul ba/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing / /phyogs
bcu kun tu do zla med rnams kyis/ /zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed/ /'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa/ /stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /
skyil krung bcas pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba 'di 'dra 'o/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan/ /'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs
byas shing / /sangs rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongs su bskor/ /de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas/ /drang srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams/ /yongs su smin byas
sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pa/ /de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/ /gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/ /skyes chen rnams
kyi chos nyid 'di yin te/ /rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig rab 'jug cing / /zham
ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra 'o/ /de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i/ /
ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing / /kha cig mnyam bzhag kha cig ldang bar yang / /phyogs rnams kun tu rang gi lus ston to/ /de dag shar
gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing / /nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang / /nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang / /
de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug /gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang / /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul
'di 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
gnas par snang / /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag pa bstan byas nas/ /dpa' bo nub kyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa
du ma rab tu byed par snang / /nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na bzhugs sangs rgyas/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /
zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang / /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas/ /dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum
rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang / /de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu brtan pa 'jug /kha cig mnyam bzhag kha
cig langs gyur cing / /'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang / /de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /gzugs kyi lam las bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gzugs
rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/ /de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin
te| |stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /
gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /sgra dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ /sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong
pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas
'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs/ /dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab stong cing
sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten
rmongs 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams dang ldan/ /ro mchog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par
rab ston cing / /lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig
rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i reg la zhugs/ /reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med
par rab ston cing / /lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas
'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /chos la gnas pa'i 'jug pa rab tu zhugs/ /chos lam rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa
byed pa med par rab ston cing / /sems kyi lam nas drang ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang / /
lang tsho shugs gnas rnams la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang / /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi
lus las ldang / /dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong ma yi lus
las rnam par ldang / /dge slong ma yi lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang / /dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /slob dang mi slob lus las
rnam par ldang / /slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang / /rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab
las rnam par ldang / /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam bzhag cing / /lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang / /lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam bzhag cing / /rdzu 'phrul chen
po'i klu yi lus las ldang / /rdzu 'phrul che glu'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus las rnam par ldang / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /
'byung po kun gyi lus las rnam par ldang / /'byung po kun gyi lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang / /spu sgo gcig la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /spu sgo thams cad
nas ni rnam par ldang / /spu sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang / /skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing / /skra rtse
kun gyi khyon las rnam par ldang / /skra rtse kun gyi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing / /phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang / /rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /ma lus rdul rnams
kun las rnam par ldang / /rdul rnams ma lus kun la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang / /rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing / /nor bu'i shing tog
dag las rnam par ldang / /shing tog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang / /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu yi
chu klung rnams las ldang / /rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid chen po me yi lam las ldang / /me yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /klung gi lam las
dran ldan rnam par ldang / /rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang / /sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lha kun gzhal med
khang las rnam par ldang / /lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam bzhag cing / /dran ldan de dag mkha' las rnam par ldang / /yon tan bsam yas bsags pa de dag gi /ting 'dzin
rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/ /bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /rgyal ba kun
gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang / /bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya/ /de dag 'dra
ba'i dpe lta cang med de/ /mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/ /bstan na myur du ston rnams shes par 'gyur/ /rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi/ /nyan thos gcig tu gyur
nas mang por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig gyur te/ /mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed/ /smad nas me 'bar stod nas chu yi rgyun/ /stod nas me 'bar
smad nas chu yi rgyun/ /'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab/ /da ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing / /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yang
'dor yang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed/ /nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod cing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dngo dag
dang | |mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin chen dang / /rgya mtsho chu klung rnams su gzugs brnyan ston/ /de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun
tu ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dbang / /dang ba'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag /de dag so so
rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong / /ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang / /go gyon bzhon dang theg par bcas su mthong / /gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang / /de
dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong / /'on kyang chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba/ /sems can rgya mtshor
ji snyed skyes rnams kyi/ /sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te/ /rang gi skad kyis skad kun tshim par byed/ /sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang / /skad rnams kun gyi sgra
yi tshul mkhas na/ /gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed/ /tum bu ra yi chung ma dbyangs ldan ma/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo yid
las byung ba de/ /bden dang dam bcas mi 'tshe dga' rnams kyi/ /sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste/ /dbyangs ldan tshogs bcas zhe sdang can de yang / /brtul zhugs grub
mthun dbyangs kyi yan lag gis/ /yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ /ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed/ /rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni/ /sna
tshogs gzugs mang mtha' yas ston pa byed/ /nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang / /khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/ /'dod chags dang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sgyu
ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam thar rab bslab pa/ /spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/ /rgya ldan
lha yis lha min pham byas na/ /de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhon bcas shing / /theg bcas dmag bcas go gyon bzhin du 'byer/ /'dod chags dang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang / /
lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang po sa srung bu/ /dbang po'i
'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de/ /mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul cing / /mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang / /rdzing bu chus gang bdun
bdun sprul par byed/ /rdzing de la yang pad+ma sna tshogs pa/ /rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul par byed/ /pad+ma de la'ang lha yi bu mo dag /sgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul par byed/ /de dag
rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/ /glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur byas te/ /lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing 'dra bar byed/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang longs
spyod kun yang mthun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang / /glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang / /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/ /
shes rab thabs kyi stobs la sbyangs pa rnams/ /ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed/ /sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus 'phrul te/ /rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog
byed cing / /rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston/ /ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms/ /sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang / /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/ /
'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'joms pa/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rab ston mi byed/ /brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul
'gyed tshe/ /lha min bye ba phyes pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul/ /lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya byin rang gi mdun na 'dug par shes/ /de ni
rdo rje 'chang bas bzung ngo zhes/ /lha min dbang po kun yang mgo myos gyur/ /'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing / /lus la go
bgos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i/ /brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/ /de yang bsod nams phal ba'i mthu stobs kyis/ /lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /
'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur ba/ /bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul/ /lha la skul ma 'debs pa lha yi rnga/ /lha las rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa/ /lha rnams
bag med gnas par shes gyur nas/ /rnga de nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrog ste/ /'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther thug min/ /tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla
mtshungs shing 'dra/ /srid pa thams cad rmi lam smin dang mtshungs/ /bag med thams cad dgra bcas mya ngan can/ /'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi'i lam ma yin/ /ji snyed su dag bag med
gnas gyur pa/ /de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin/ /sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams
gyis yul la rmongs/ /chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis zhes skul/ /rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang / /lha yi 'dun sa chos bzang 'dug nas su/ /gtam gang zhi zhing
'dod chags bral mthun pa/ /chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la rjod/ /rnga de gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang / /de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na/ /bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs
ni yongs ston rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyi/ /lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i rnga yi
sgra| |lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te/ /rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing / /skrag pa med de stobs kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha min
dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams/ /'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod la 'byer/ /de ltar sgra skrad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba/ /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po/ /nyon mongs
bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams/ /zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar byed/ /dbang po'i lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis/ /dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ /
gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes/ /gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ /lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang yang / /chos bzang mdun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug /lha
rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing / /brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam par 'phrul/ /brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang / /sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/ /
'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong / /
las dang nyon mongs kun tu zhugs pa yis/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings/ /chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang / /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed na/ /
dbang bcu dbang thob rnams lta ci smos te/ /'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhon/ /stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang / /stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na/ /
de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrog /tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /
'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam par gnas pa cis mi 'phrul/ /dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba/ /
skad cig gcig la thams cad bgrang bar byed/ /thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na/ /bslab pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bslab ste/ /byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams/ /
ci phyir skad cig gcig la sems kyis ni/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems mi shes/ /sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung / /
rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang / /rin chen rnam phye sa bon bkram pa'ang byung / /rlung las sprin byung char pa'ang kun tu 'bab/ /rlung gis sprin kyang rab tu zhi bar byed/ /'jig rten
lo tog 'phel ba'ang rlung byed de/ /rlung ni 'gro ba kun la phan pa skyed/ /rlung de pha rol phyin la ma bslab cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslab kyang / /'jig rten rnam smin
bsam yas ston byed na/ /dam pa thob nas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/ /bya skad ri dwags skad dang skyes pa dang / /
bud med bu mo khye'u skad ci snyed pa/ /kun gyi sgra snyan sems can rnams la sgrog /de ltar sgra snyan rang bzhin med shes nas/ /sgrib pa med pa'i spobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /'gro
ba kun la sgra snyan brjod byas nas/ /yid 'ong sgra yis 'jig rten mgu bar byed/ /rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro kun rgya dang mtshungs pas rgya mtsho ste/ /chu dang 'byung
po rin chen yod mi zad/ /chu rnams bzung bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgya 'dra ste/ /bsod nams bsam gtan rnam par thar rnams dang / /shes rab
ye shes yon tan kun mi zad/ /bsod nams yon tan gsog pas ngoms pa med/ /rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse ba na/ /sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/ /gling bzhi
bcas par sprin chen rgyas 'gengs te/ /de dag kun kyang sna tshogs bkod pa mang / /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam gling gi /gser gyi mdog gi sprin rnams rnam par sgrub/ /
'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/ /dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /'thab bral gnas su mthon mthing bai DUR+Ya/ /sum cu gsum du rdo yi snying po 'dra/ /skyong
ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/ /rgya mtshor rdo rje mi phyed mkhregs 'dra ba/ /mi ci'i gnas su spos mchog 'khrigs lta bu/ /klu yi gnas su pad+ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ /gsang ba'i
gnas su ngang pa'i bya gar mchog /lha min gnas su ri brag mdog 'dra ba/ /byang du gser gyi 'od zer mdog ston te/ /gling rnams gzhan du sna tshogs bkod pa ston/ /'dzam
bu'i gling du ri sngon 'dra ba ste/ /gang na ci mtho sprin rnams de bzhin no/ /dbang sgyur gnas su gser sprin des bstan nas/ /nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'phrul dga'i
gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang / /dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog 'dra/ /'thab bral gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /sum cu gsum du gser gyi 'od zer 'dra/ /
skyong ba'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /rgya mtshor mu tig dmar po'i mdog 'dra bkod/ /mi ci'i gnas su mthon mthing bai DUR+Ya/ /klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /
gsang ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /lha min gnas su rdo yi snying po 'dra/ /byang du nor bu skar mdog kha dog 'dra/ /gling gzhan rnams na'ang bkod pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /
'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba'i nor bu 'bar/ /sprin gyi mtshan nyid mthun pa'i glog kyang 'gyed/ /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs sgra sgrog /'phrul dga'i gnas su rnga sgra sgrog par byed/
dga' ldan gnas su sil snyan rol mo'i sgra/ /'thab bral gnas su lha yi bu mo'i sgra/ /sum cu gsum du mi ci mang po'i skad/ /skyong ba'i gnas su
dri za'i skad du ste/ /rgya mtshor ri 'thab sgra skad 'dra ba 'o/ /mi ci'i gnas su gling bu kun la sgra/ /klu yi gnas su ka la ping+ka'i sgra/ /gsang ba'i gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/ /lha
min gnas su lha yi rdza rnga'i sgra/ /mi yi gnas su rgya mtsho gling bu'i sgra/ /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su lha spos zhim/ /me tog sna tshogs bkod pa'i char yang 'bebs/ /'phrul
dga'i zla ba zla bzang 'dra ba yi/ /me tog man+dAr phreng dang byug pa 'bebs/ /dga' ldan gnas su nor bu chen po'i mdog /rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gtsug
gi nor bu zla ba 'dra ba dang / /gser mdog 'dra ba'i dar la'i char yang 'bebs/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan sna tshogs dang / /phreng ba rnams dang rgyan dang byug pa
dang / /mu tig dmar dang gser dang dar la dang / /sil snyan yid 'ong 'thab bral gnas su 'bebs/ /sum cu gsum du yid bzhin nor bu mchog /skyong ba'i gnas su tsan+dan
snying po'i mchog /gur gum sil ma lha shing ta ma la/ /spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog rab tu 'bebs/ /skyong ba'i gnas su klu yi dbang po de/ /nyams stobs skye ba'i kha zas skoms
gyi rnams/ /kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang / /de min rin chen bsam yas char yang 'bebs/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang / /char rgyun mi 'chad gnya' shing tsam dag dang / /
rnam rgyal chen po mdzod rnams mi zad pa/ /rin chen bkod pa mtha' yas char yang 'bebs/ /mi ci'i gnas su rgyan phreng sna tshogs dang / /pad+ma ut+pal ras dang rin chen dang / /me
tog paR+sha ma li'i phye ma spos/ /pi wang gling bu sgra snyan rdza rnga 'bebs/ /klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste/ /gsang bar nor bu rin chen skar mdog 'dra/ /lha min gnas su ral gri
mda' chen dang / /dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char pa 'bebs/ /byang du de ni rgyan phreng rin chen dang / /me tog paR+sha ma li tsam pa'i phreng / /kun ran gtsang dang a ti muk+ta 'bebs/ /
gling gzhan rnams na'ang sna tshogs char pa 'bebs/ /'dzam bu'i gling du chu gsal dang ba yi/ /char rnams chos bzhin phra ba'i rgyun du 'bebs/ /me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos
dang shing / /lo tog bde byed 'jig rten rnams su skyed/ /de ltar sprin bkod bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /glog 'byin 'brug sgrog bkod pa'i char 'bebs kyang / /gnas nas mi
g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /rgya mtsho'i chu na gnas pa de ltar yang / /klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho
zhugs pa'i yon tan phyug /rnam 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /bag tsam smos pa'i dpe tshul 'di dag gis/ /skyes chen de dag rnams
kyis brjod pa byas/ /dpa' bo de dag dpe rnams kun dang bral/ /de dag 'di 'dra'i rnam thar dbang sgyur ro/ /blo gros dam pa blo gros rgya chen ldan/ /ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo
gros can/ /ye shes mchog ldan khyad par blo can gyi/ /rnam thar mchog rnams 'di dag rnams kyis spyad/ /rnam thar dam pa 'di dag sus thos nas/ /yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig
rten sgrog byed pa/ /de dag ngo mtshar rmad byung chos ldan de/ /de dag dka' byed mi yi 'jig rten na/ /'di 'dra chos 'dir gang dag dad gyur pa/ /sems can so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na
dkon| |gang dag dge bsags bsod nams byas gyur pa/ /de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la dad/ /gang dag nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i/ /mi dag mi yi 'jig rten rnams
na nyung / /de bas rkyen gyi theg par rab tu nyung / /theg pa chen por de dag de bas nyung / /theg pa che la zhugs pa de dkon te/ /gang dag chos 'dir dad pa'ang rab dkon na/ /'jug
cing 'dzin pa smos kyang ci dgos te/ /gang dag de bzhin sgrub pa smos ci dgos/ /gang dag stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /phyi ma'i bskal par mgo bos 'degs byed kyang / /
chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/ /la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can la/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur yang / /chos 'di
dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/ /la las zhing bcu ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /lag pa'i mthil du bskal par mkhar 'dzin kyang / /chos 'dir dang
pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod
nams ci 'dra ba/ /bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur bas/ /gang gis chos kyi
le'u 'di bzung byas pa/ /bsod nams de ni de bas khyad par 'phags/ /rnam thar de dag rab tu bstan ba'i tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur/ /bdud kyi
gnas rnams mog mog byas gyur cing / /sgra rab phyung bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng+ge rnams/ /de dag kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te/ /phyag brkyang
mdzad nas yon tan mtha' yas pa/ /bzang po dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur/ /phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/ /rnam thar 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs/ /
khyod kyis legs bstan rjes su nged dgyes zhes/ /sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
bstan pa 'di dag bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang / mi
dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas 'di legs par bka' stsal to/ /kye ma de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa 'di
mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa 'di sngon ma thos so/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni shin tu dkon te/ sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa
ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/
tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la mchod rten lta bur 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam/ /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ rab tu byung ba rnams sam/ khyim na gnas pa rnams
sam| de bzhin du rgyal po rnams sam/ blon po chen po rnams sam/ khyim bdag rnams kyis gtse bar mi nus so zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde dkon mchog 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba lags
te| 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu nyid kyis sems can de dag gis kyang thos lags
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs
shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ slan chad mi bskyud par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams

cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan

dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal
po che las/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he
ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi mgon gcig pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thub
pa che| |yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod/ /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /sdug bsngal
thams cad sel pa po/ /ston pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bkra shis thams cad sbyin pa po/ /lus can kun gyi skyabs mdzad pa/ /kun tu bde ba sbyin pa po/ /zla ba bzang la bdag
phyag 'tshal/ /bkra shis thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/ /sems can kun gyi mgon po mchog /thams cad mkhyen la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /
rig pa thams cad legs bsgrubs pa/ /sangs rgyas thogs med rtogs pa po/ /gnod pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /don kun grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa
'gro ba'i gnyen/ /lha yi lha la bstod pa yi/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /mchog tu dge ba bdag gis bshad/ /don kun grub pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /shAkya'i skyes
mchog thams cad mkhyen/ /chos kun dbang phyug brtan pa pa/ /drang srong chen po yon tan mtsho/ /dgra bcom bde gshegs de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten kun
mkhyen pa/ /nyes pa'i dri ma kun las 'das/ /chos kyi snang ba mdzad pa'i mchog /'jigs med shAkya zas gtsang sras/ /bu ram shing pa'i rigs dga' ba/ /gau ta ma ste nyi ma'i
rigs| |thub dpal nyi ma'i rgyud bdag po/ /'jig rten mgon po stobs bcur ldan/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /nyes pa spangs pa drug bcom pa/ /mi 'dul kha lo
bzang po pa/ /rig pa grol ba mun sel ba/ /zhi ba dul ba dpang po thul/ /tshul khrims rnam dag dri ma med/ /'dod chags bral ba ser sna med/ /dpag tu med pa 'jigs med brnyes/ /
chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa po/ /mtha' yas dpe med gsum ldan pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ya mtshan stabs/ /'jig rten gsum gnyer gsum rig pa/ /dus gsum mkhyen pa
nyes gsum 'joms/ /cho 'phrul gsum dang ldan pa po/ /phung po gsum gyi lam ston pa/ /mtshon cha rtsod med rims nad med/ /bdag gi med pa nga rgyal med/ /tsher ma med pa
spros pa med/ /'jigs med kha na ma tho med/ /dpa' bo mchog sbyin mchog don so/ /smra ba'i seng+ge mi yi mchog /rnam par dul ba nyon mongs bral/ /rnam dag bdag nyid rnam par
'dren| |rig dang zhabs su ldan pa po/ /khyab 'jug kun rgyal rnam par mdzes/ /sems rdul dri ma mi mnga' ba/ /rdul dang bral ba rig pa'i mchog /zhi
bar mdzad pa sdig pa zhi/ /bsil bar gyur pa shis par mdzad/ /ston pa 'gro ba'i skyabs 'os pa/ /dpa' bo dag pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dpal
dang ldan/ /mig mkhan zug rngu 'byin pa po/ /shAkya seng+ge dge sbyong dbang / /dge ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas gtsang / /sangs rgyas chos drug rgyan mnga' ba/ /chos drug dri ma med
pa'i spyan/ /mngon shes drug dang ldan pa'i mchog /'gro drug rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/ /rang byung bde gshegs grub pa po/ /'jig rten kun la phan par dgyes/ /mnyam
bzhag shes rab mtshungs pa med/ /ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu dgyes/ /sems can kun gyi phan pa tshol/ /bden pa gsung pa dbang po bsdams/ /'jig rten kun la dge ba po//
sems can snying po kun gzigs pa/ /'khor ba'i dgon las rgal ba po/ /dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs gyur pa/ /dbang ldan yul las rnam par rgyal/ /bden pa bzhi ni
rab ston pa/ /pha rol gshegs pa grol mdzad mchog /'dren pa shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /bram ze tshangs pa thu bo btsun/ /gtso bo bde mdzad bde ldan pa/ /gsung mdzad rnam
rgyal bdag nyid che/ /rnam grangs 'jig rten zhi bar mdzad/ /sems can kun la phan pa po/ /snying stobs ldan pa kun gyi mchog /'jig rten mchod gnas 'jig rten mkhyen/ /
'jig rten snang ba snang mdzad pa/ /rnyed ldan 'jig rten bya ba 'das/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i lam du gshegs/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag chos kyi rgyal/ /ded dpon lags te 'od mdzad
pa| |skyob pa po ste rkang gnyis mchog /bzod pa gsung ba bzod dang ldan/ /gzugs bzang blo bzang zhi ba ste/ /mdza' bo bde sbyin ngang tshul bzang / /gser gyi mdog can 'od rab
gsal| |tshul bzang dge bar rab sbyin pa/ /sangs rgyas dpa' chen mi'i seng+ge/ /dpa' bo gcig tu mun sel ba/ /'joms pa med pa 'gro ba'i skyabs/ /rgyal ba bla ma mi mnyam
mnyam| |zhags las grol ba srid pa med/ /mi yi skye mchog nga rgyal bcom/ /spyan dang ldan pa kun tu gzigs/ /mi rnams mig ste gsung ba'i mchog /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
dam pa 'di/ /rtag tu gang zhig klog byed pa/ /de ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgal/ /go 'phang mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims te/ /nang par langs nas
mkhas pa dag /brjod dam yang na nyan pa 'am/ /yang na yid la sems kyang rung / /rgyal ba'i mtshan bstod dge ba de/ /bkra shis bsod nams mchog tu 'gyur/ /dag byed sdig
pa sel ba ste/ /don kun grub cing srung ba yin/ /sdig pa kun las rab tu grol/ /sdug bsngal kun dang 'jigs las grol/ /nyon mongs kun las
rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid ni bde bar thob/ /de ltar bdag gis thub pa'i yon tan mtshan bsgrags pas/ /dge ba rgya chen yang dag 'di bsdus gang yin pa/ /'di yis
'jig rten lha yul dang ni sa steng du/ /bde rnams thob nas bde ba mchog gis sangs rgyas spyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //
